Manager Response: Good Morning Jesus:  Thanks so much for your review feedback "...excellent location. Nice friendly staff, clean rooms!"  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive from guests, "friendly staff" is #2 ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you soon Jesus.  Safe travels.

Summary: Quaint hotel with a beautiful homey atmosphere. The grounds are beautiful with all the blooming flowers. Very clean, friendly staff and easy to get around. In walking distance to restaurants and some shopping. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Karen:  Congratulations on your new grandchild! ^_^  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Very clean, friendly staff....walking distance to restaurants....". Summary Heading: Rude and mean front desk staff
Summary: The person in this picture has zero customer service skills. NEVER STAY HERE !!! On our check in for a 2 night stay for 2 couples, the front desk only handed us one (1) card key because they said they ran out. When we came really late the second night of our stay because of double century cycling event, we canâ€™t wake up our friends anymore who are already sleeping in the room from exhaustion with all our belongings inside the room, this guy  refused us entry because he said we donâ€™t exist since the booking was under our friendâ€™s name !!!! He was very rude, mean, and did not even try to listen to our explanation on why we were locked out. We ended up sleeping in our car as it was already 3 am. I WILL NEVER GO BACK TO THIS LODGE !!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the opportunity to reply to your review.  As a matter of security the Lodge does not provide room keys to individuals that are not registered to stay with us. In this incident , a non-guest tried to gain access to a guest room at 3AM, the Front Desk Officer tried to help her; however, she did not answer questions correctly (What is the guests address? What is the guests phone number?).  In addition the woman trying to gain access did not have ID.  She became verbally abusive and threatening, all captured on lobby camera.  Guest identified as "unwelcome"

Summary Heading: Great place for a base for sightseeing in Southern California
Summary: The hotel room I stayed in was very spacious and had a great amount of facilities.  The continental breakfast was plentiful with a good choice of options available.  Yes there are a few signs of wear and tear but by no means was the room unclean and with the door open you can hear the traffic but that's the downside to having such easy access to the freeway.  I was on the end of the block by the road and slept very well, even the fire engines were minimal but then I'm used to city noise.  Overall I would stay here again and recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Sam:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Great place for a base for sightseeing....continental breakfast was plentiful...slept very well. Overall I would stay here again and recommended."  We look forward to seeing you again Sam, safe travels in 2023.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel suitable for exploring southern california
Summary: Stayed here for an extended time over the holidays - room was very neat and cleaned when required upon putting the 'clean me' sign on the door. we had a room on the second floor so had a small balcony and long windows , nice addition.  Breakfast is included for free so that is a good bonus even if it is just continental items, its good to get something to grab and go to set you up for the day. The pool area and the hot tub area is nice but the swimming pool looked a bit dirty and could do with a paint job plus its not heated so only used the hot tub which was nice to sit in at this time of year! Location is handy as it just right of the i5 so handy for traveling south to san diego, north to LA, and disneyland themeparks and near to the beach cities of laguna and newport. plenty
Room tip: ask for a second floor room with balcony
Manager Response: Good Morning Carson:  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review, and for your review rating of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate the detail in your feedback "Nice hotel....room was very net and cleaned when required upon putting the "clean me" sign on the door....Breakfast is included....walking distance to BJ's, In-N- Out....liked the Christmas decorations....".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  Travel safe in 2023 Carson.

Summary: The rooms were nice and cleaned well. A good deal overall for a quick visit and liked that I was able to feel comfortable and safe while in town. Would recommend if you are passing through or need to rest!
Manager Response: Hi Lexi:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your headline Great stay!  Super comfortable!" We appreciate your recommendation "Would recommend....".  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: Very comfortable stay.  Didnâ€™t get one of the upgraded rooms, but very clean and well laid out. Be forewarned that only one of the buildings actually has an elevator!  The continental breakfast was modest, but everything was super fresh.  Only got a glimpse of the gardens on our way out.
Manager Response: Happy New Year Linda:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feed back "Very comfortable stay....very clean."  We just finished our review of online guest reviews and we had 6,400+with "clean" as the #1 compliment.  Thank you for recognizing our housekeeping team ^_^.

Summary: My wife and I have stayed at Laguna Hills Lodge multiple times in the past 5 years. We always enjoy the continental breakfast, and we find our rooms have everything we need to relax at the end of our day after visiting friends and family.  We highly recommend Laguna Hills Lodge.
Manager Response: Happy New Year Bill:  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business!  We appreciate your feedback "...we find our rooms have everything we need....".  Safe travels Bill, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: I needed a local place to stay when I visit my daughter in Laguna Beach.  This place was perfect - convenient and priced right.  The room was clean and comfortable.  This will be my place to stay while daughter is in college for the next 4 years!
Manager Response: Happy Holidays Trish:  Thank you for your headline "Perfect and convenient!", and for your feedback "The room was clean and comfortable."  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment the Lodge has received in over 5,000 guest reviews ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you soon.  Safe travels.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel! Thankful they didnâ€™t have carpet in the room.  Location convenient - loved spending the day in Laguna Beach
Summary: Great Hotel staff, very friendly. - Thanks Mario, appreciate all your help. The location was close to everything. Loved spending the days in Laguna Beach.  They had 4 different buildings. Could park right in front of my room. Not confusing to get around and very quite.
Manager Response: Hi Karin:  Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your feedback "Great Hotel....Location convenient - loved spending the day in Laguna Beach.....Could park right in front of my room....very quiet".  Karin, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.  Safe travels.

Summary: The staff was very helpful. They called ahead of time to see what we needed if anything.  My wife canâ€™t do stairs and they gladly found us a ground floor room with parking right outside our door. We highly recommend this hotel. Manager Response: Happy Halloween Davide:  Thank you so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your recommendation "W highly recommend this hotel." Summary: Laguna Hills Lodge is our goto hotel in Laguna Hills.  We have stayed here many times and find it comfortable and a good value.  It has a nice gym, outdoor pool and jacuzzi.  Stays include a breakfast that includes cereal, fruit, juice, coffee, bagels, pastries, hard boiled eggs, and cream cheese.
Manager Response: Good Morning Richard:  Thanks so much for your review and  headline "Great Value".  We appreciate your detailed feedback "...comfortable...nice gym, outdoor poo and jacuzzi...includes a breakfast....".  As a family owned business we thank you for staying with us!  We look forward to seeing you again soon, BTW we decorate for Christmas ^_^.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay in Laguna Hills
Summary: Our room was clean and comfortable.  The pool and hot tub were fun.  The pool needed a cleaning.  The complimentary breakfast was good.  It would have been nice if there was a hot choice for breakfast such as scrambled eggs, potatoes or a self-serve waffle iron.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  There were complimentary newspapers at the front desk and breakfast room every day.  The location is perfect for dining places and access to I5.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Kenn:  Thanks so much for your headline "Excellent place to stay in Laguna Hills".  We appreciate your feedback "Our room was clean and comfortable", and your last sentence "We would definitely stay here again".  We look forward to your next visit Kenn, BTW we decorate for Halloween and for Christmas ^_^.

Summary: I booked this via the website. However, the 800 number is not the hotel's number and this is considered a third party reservation. When we needed to cancel one night, the clerk said we needed to do it via the third party. Not quite sure why the website is not connected to the hotel. The location is within walking distance of many restaurants. The room was well appointed.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback.  I checked your comments out and you called Guest Reservations at Laguna Hills Lodge (a 866 phone number) which is an independent travel agent, not the hotel as you mentioned. This is the first link that shows on a Google search; however, if you go one link down it shows Laguna Hills Lodge (a 949 Orange County phone number).  Guest Reservations charges you a commission, direct booking with the Lodge will save you money.  Hope this clarification helps ^_^.  Thank you for the review rating of 5 out of 5.

Summary: Don't let the photos fool you into thinking this is perched in some woodsy oasis. It's not.  It's located in the parking lot of a strip mall.  Let me say that again...  It's located in a PARKING LOT with other commercial and retail businesses.   Room is fine, nothing special.  I would not book this again.
Manager Response: Hello Gigi:  Thanks so much  for your review.  We are located next to Laguna Hills City Hall and across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall (lots of nice restaurants).  Regarding our garden, we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes in total, plus 80 bougainvillea / clematis.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Laguna Hills Lodge.  The property has an excellent location for visiting South Orange County and the freeway exit is conveniently located a couple of blocks from the hotel.  The area has a lot of budget friendly eating options within walking distance of the Lodge, we are particularly fond of Tacos de Birria Los Carnales!  The front desk staff provided excellent service and we really liked being able to check our bags for several hours after we checked out.   Our room had comfortable beds and all the amenities including a complimentary breakfast.    The price we paid (several months in advance) was very reasonable for the Southern California location, and we were just 15 minutes from the SNA John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Good Morning Matt:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...excellent location for visiting South Orange County.....excellent service....price we paid was very reasonable...". As a family owned business we thank you for your business ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Top notch service. The staff is very kind and always willing to help. Location is perfect,  many places to eat within walking distance of the hotel. Microwave AND refrigerator  located in all the rooms i have stayed in, cant beat that! Continental breakfast included which makes planning out your day much easier. Hotel presentation always up to par, meeting my exceptions.
Manager Response: Hello Kihei:  Thank you for your headline "Beautiful location and super convenient".  We appreciate your feedback "Top notch service" ^_^.  Safe travels Kihei, we look forward to seeing you again soon, BTW we decorate for Halloween and for Christmas.

Summary Heading: Budget friendly without cutting back on quality
Summary: Great service every staff member is friendly.  It's budget friendly, and the location is great because you're surrounded by lots of eateries, shopping, and convenience stores. I also appreciate having a refer, microwave, and coffee maker in the room.
Manager Response: Hello Rob:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your comments "Great service....budget friendly...and the location is great....".  BTW, guest feedback is very positive on several of the Five Lagunas Mall restaurant across the street including King's Fish House, IN-N-Out Burger, BJ's, and Ruby's.  Come back soon ^_^.

Summary: Great hotel- location and value  Stay here each time we go to Laguna Hills area.  Friendly staff.  Walkable to several eating establishments. plenty of parking and nice pool. Hotel is very well maintained.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your headline "Great hotel", and for your positive feedback on our location, value, and staff.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, BTW we decorate for Halloween and for Christmas ^_^.

Summary Heading: Motel located in Laguna Hills, about 20 mins from Laguna Beach and 5 mins from Irvine Spectrum
Summary: WELL PRICED FOR THE AREA  Laguna Hills Lodge (a motel) is a well priced hotel for the area, although we thought it was kind of average and didn't quite live up to the reviews.   It's a motel style hotel with wide hallways, manicured grounds, a small pool, sauna (unlocked at your request) and complimentary outdoor parking. It's about a 20 min drive to Laguna Beach and just off the 5 freeway.  Unfortunately the first room we were given stank of pot, so we went back to reception to request another room. They went to check the first room to verify our story and air it out and then managed to give us a different room. Although it wasn't the king bed we had originally requested, we were glad it didn't smell like pot. How could the maid not notice the room smelled of pot and not air it
Manager Response: Hello DWFR: Thanks so much for your review and comment "Well priced for the area".  Regarding guest reviews, the Lodge has over 6,000 online guest reviews, we appreciate the fact that our guests take the time to give us their feedback - the average score is 4.2 out of 5.0 ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: For years we have been fans of Laguna Hills Lodge because we feel it preserves the best of traditional hospitality.  Whoever supervises the design and maintenance of the garden really cares about it.  The garden view rooms are a great value, especially during the Spring and Christmastime.  They don't cut corners on little things: adequately-sized pads of paper and real ball point pens are in every room. Parking is included, and the included breakfast is a buffet.  The business center has two laser (not dot matrix) printers.  The rooms are reliably clean, comfortable, and of adequate size.  The washing machine and dryer in the pool area still charge a reasonable fee, and you can always get quarters at the reception desk.  During our recent visits (a total of 14 days in May and
Manager Response: Dear Staidthere: Thanks so much for your repeat business! As a family owned business we thank you for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your headline "Genuine hospitality", and all of your feedback "The garden view rooms are a great value, especially during Spring and Christmas time....rooms are reliably clean..." and much more.  BTW, we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 bougainvillea / clematis so spring is a special time at the Lodge when the roses re in full bloom.  Yes, we decorate for Christmas - it is so much fun ^_^.   We look forward to seeing you again soon, safe travels.

Summary: Amazing hotel with all the amenities one could ask for.  The grounds are beautiful, the pool and hot tub are great.  The gym was a nice surprise.  The rooms are nice with comfortable beds and good water pressure while showering.  Great restaurants within walking distance.  My girlfriend and I will stay here again and again.    Matthew C.
Manager Response: Hi Matthew:  Thank you for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your feedback "...grounds are beautiful.....pool great....comfortable beds and good water pressure....Great restaurants...walking distance...".  BTW, guest feedback is very positive on several Five Lagunas Mall restaurants, just across the street: King's Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJ's, and Ruby's ^_^.

Summary: Right off the I-5 so convenient but also not noisy. Very reasonably priced and nice lodgings, if slightly dated, including heated pool, nice breakfast, newspaper and comfortable room.  Would definitely stay here again if going to Laguna beach, which is 15 minutes away.
Manager Response: Hi Michael:  Thank you for your feedback "excellent price....not noisy...nice breakfast...".  We appreciate your recommendation "Would definitely stay here again....".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business Michael!  Travel safe this summer.

Summary: Very nice hotel close to the Festival of Arts in Laguna Beach CA, about 15 min. drive.  Breakfast was good, friendly staff and very clean facility. Laguna Hills is a nice community off I-15.  Easy access from the freeway. Good restaurants are close by and easy to get to.
Manager Response: Good Morning Stevent:  Thanks for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback "Very nice hotel close to the Festival of Arts in Laguna Beach....friendly staff and very clean...",  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive, "friendly" is #2 ^_^.  We appreciate your review score of 5 out of 5.  Please visit us again soon ^_^.

Summary: What a wonderful charmingly lush surprise right off the 5 Freeway. I canâ€™t say enough about this place. Itâ€™s reasonably priced, the grounds make it seem like a resort, the staff is efficient and courteous, the salt water pool & hot tub are divine. Even the patrons seem nicer and more relaxed than other places that I have stayed. They have an exercise room and separate saunas for men and women! There is a continental breakfast available for free and the grounds are so accessible. We were there to attend a scattering of ashes over the Fourth of July weekend. But I would go back just for a three day retreat. I canâ€™t praise this place enough.
Manager Response: Hello Marie:  Thanks so much for your review and all of the detail in your feedback.  We appreciate your comments "I can't say enough about this place....".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to your next visit, travel safe this summer.

Summary: Nice place.  Rooms comfortable good-sized. slept well. Pool heated . Good location.  Parking adequate. Price : better price then Laguna Hills. Right across street from mall.  Near restaurents. Also EV charging at City Hall next door.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review and for your headline "Great place", and for your feedback "Rooms comfortable..." As a family owned business we thank you for your business and for your review score of 5 out of 5.  Travel safe this summer, come back soon ^_^.

Summary: The room was clean and had a refrigerator and microwave.  The garden area is well kept and beautiful. The stay includes a continental breakfast which was nice.  The room was nothing fancy, but the location near my family in Laguna woods was a plus.  The room air conditioner was noisy until I realized I could turn the fan to a lower speed.
Manager Response: Hello Brenda:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Good location....room was clean....The garden area is well kept and beautiful."  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  It is summer so it is time for a vacation, please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: The staff is great Marco at the front desk is the best and has great people skills. The rooms where clean and the whole place is very quiet. I will come here again and tell everyone about it. Thanks for the great stay.

Summary: An absolutely darling Lodge, filled with fragrant flowers and butterflies, nestled in a quiet area of Laguna Hills. He was extremely kind and professional, as well as sensitive to the traumatizing incident we experienced at The Best Western Plus, Costa Mesa, prior to our check in at The Laguna Hills Lodge.   I suffer with back pain - the bed was amazing. The room was quiet, the pool gorgeous, deep, better than the crowded pools at The Welk Residence Inn by Hyatt where we stayed afterwards. I think that we would have been happiest staying at this Lodge, for our entire vacation, and regret not doing so. If I
Manager Response: Hi Colleen:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "An absolutely darling Lodge, filled with fragrant flowers and butterflies....A gem.". All of our mattresses are premium Simmons mattresses.  Colleen, please come back soon - it looks like we will all be enjoying a fun summer this year.

Summary: I have stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge many times and have found it to be a very reasonably priced hotel room, conveniently located in Orange County and near my Irvine office location, rooms are generally available especially to repeat customers, and the breakfast is a simple continental meal and is included in the room fare.  I would recommend the Laguna Hills Lodge to any business traveler coming to OC.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your headline "Clean, Convenient, Easy, Reasonably Priced."  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business!!  We appreciate your recommendation, and look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.  Safe travels business traveler.

Summary: I just moved from NY and Iâ€™ve been hotel hopping the last week and a half waiting for my apartment to be ready. This placeâ€™s grounds are beautifully kept! The roses all around the property are absolutely beautiful. In addition, I love the filigree railings and gothic looking doors and light fixtures. The pool is great on a hot day with laundry access and a gym to boot! Canâ€™t go wrong with a king bed and a continental breakfast! The front desk and housekeeping staff are aces. Iâ€™d tell my family to come stay here when they visit. Rooms are spacious and price is right!!!
Manager Response: Good Morning Britt:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your comments "...grounds beautifully kept!...I love the filigree railings. the front desk and housekeeping staff are aces."  We appreciate your recommendation Britt ' "I'd tell my family to come stay here...".  Safe travels, come back soon ^_^.

Summary: This a an older hotel but extremely well kept.  Clean, very friendly, easy access to the surrounding area activities and dinning.  The rooms are kept in excellent working condition, all your needs are considered and addressed, everything works in the room and the staff is there to help you when you need it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review rating of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback "....extremely well kept. Clean, very friendly....". We appreciate your comment on "well kept", many thank to our Maintenance Manager (Alberto) who has been with us for forty years.  Safe travels, come back soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Visiting my dad in Laguna Woods Village
Summary: I have used this hotel for the past 20+ years Stayed a week in an upstairs room facing East. This hotel continues to have excellent front desk staff, the rooms are always clean & up to date on all maintenance issues. The landscaping is a joy to walk through, Roses throughout. Enjoy
Manager Response: Hello Scott:  Many thanks for your repeat business, WOW twenty years!  This is the Lodge's 50th anniversary under our family's ownership ^_^.  We appreciate your feedback on our front desk staff and your comment "always clean".  "Clean" is the #1 compliment we receive.  As a family owned business we thank you again for your business!!

Summary Heading: Clean, relaxing hideway with A+ amenities.
Summary: When I travel i prefer hotels that offer hard surface flooring, free of dusty/musty carpets, and walk-in showers, and have a laundry facility, all at a reasonable cost.  Laguna Hills Lodge offers all of that, and a whole lot more.  Not only are the rooms spacious, with microwave, refrigerator, and large freezer, but they are set in a very relaxing landscape of greenery and flowers, with a private pool, spa, and even a sauna!  The staff is very welcoming, polite, and devoted to the needs of the guests.   For example, I was originally assigned a room with a tub, but when I asked if there was a room with a walkin shower, the host immediately transferred me to a room with a walkin shower. It was the most pleasant place I have stayed in a very long time, and at a much lower price
Manager Response: Hello Ken:  Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your comments "...rooms spacious...staff welcoming....It was the most pleasant place I have styed in a very long time....".  We are a family owned business and we thank you for staying with us.  2022 is looking like an excellent year ^_^, safe travels.

Summary: I wasnâ€™t sure what to expect when I booked this room for a two-day business trip, as I had never stayed here before.  My first impression was about how clean and neat the buildings are kept!  My room was the same wayâ€”-very clean and comfortable!  Nice to have a small fridge and microwave oven too!  The price I paid was actually less than other hotels I had searched out, and breakfast was included!  Nice selection of breakfast foods and fruit too!  I had the hard-boiled eggs and a muffin plus orange juiceâ€”-again, even the eating area is very clean and inviting.   There is also a heated swimming pool and a business center and a laundry room too! Really great!  I will definitely be staying here again the next time I need to stay in the Laguna Hills area.  Sincerely,  Douglas Massena
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and headline "Top Notch Accommodations".  We appreciate your comment "how clean and neat the buildings are kept!"  As a family owned business we thank you for staying with us!  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: This lodge is well managed, staff is very helpful. Check-in was fast. Room was clean and well equipped (mini fridge, microwave, flatscreen tv). Bed was comfortable. Pool is heated, a nice feature.  Minimal continental breakfast, however.   Location is convenient, with shops and restaurant within walking distance. Easy drive to Laguna beach, Irvine, and Orange County airport.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your headline "Clean comfortable convenient".  "Clean" is the#1 compliment the Lodge receives in online guest reviews ^_^.  We do have a convenient location just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive on several mall restaurants: King's Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJ's, and Ruby's.  Thanks for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Lovely room, very clean.  Really comfortable beds.  Staff was friendly, easy check in.  Wish we had stayed for breakfast, it sounded lovely.  I highly recommend this hotel and I do plan to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review and for your recommendation "I highly recommend this hotel...".  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thanks for your feedback on our rooms "Lovely room, very clean."  All of our rooms have been remodeled over the last three years, "clean" is the #1 compliment we have received in over 6,000 guest reviews.  Safe travels, see you soon.

Summary: I never write reviews, but Laguna Hills Lodge is a real find! It is everything the other reviewers have said: comfortable, clean, safe (right next to the police station and city hall), the front desk people are super nice (they try to make it a wining experience). The room is generously appointed with a microwave, and a real mini refrigerator that actually has a freezer compartment.  But what made Laguna Hills Lodge stand out is it has details of a higher class lodging: a safe big enough to put your computer in, really good fresh, fluffy pillows, fluffy towels, actual nice toiletries, and a very comfortable bed with good thread count sheets and a quiet A/C. (The huge contrast and what incentivized me to write this review  is that I stayed in an expensive not to be named hotel in
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review, we appreciate that you took the time to provide so much detail.  We appreciate your comment "Laguna Hills Lod e is a real find!....Comfortable clean safe...super nice....details of a higher class lodging...".  I will share your review with my team.  Regarding blankets we provide triple sheeting with a blanket in between, extra blankets are available at the Front Desk.  Thanks so much for staying with us, safe travels!

Summary: The Lagune Hills Lodge provides a lot of value for the location.  Orange County is expensive, in all things.  My elderly father is at assisted living in San Clemente.  The hotels near him are pricey.  When I visit, I stay at the Lodge as it's close to the 5 freeway, is comfortable, cozy and doesn't cost an arm and a leg.  When booking, if you require an elevator, I suggest you ask about it.  Some buildings don't have one.  So, I prefer to stay on the first floor.  Otherwise, the staff and property are more than acceptable.  There's a complimentary breakfast which is nice.
Manager Response: Hi Karen:  Thanks so much for your review and comments "....Lodge provides a lot of value for the location."  Also, we appreciate your feedback on elevators, we have an elevator in Building C, first floor rooms are of course always a good choice.  Good luck with your dad, great to visit and catch up ^_^.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I stayed here in August 2019 and had a relaxing blast. i read by the pool and enjoyed coffee from the continental breakfast. At one point i lost my phone during the trip in my room and the front desk helped me by calling the number. fantastic time!
Manager Response: Hi Sarah:  Thanks so much for your repeat business, and your review score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback, happy to help you locate your phone ^_^.  I lose mine all the time and my wife calls me so I can track it down.  Safe travels.  Please come back soon.

Summary: Having stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge four or five times so far (three nights per stay), I can attest to how comfortable, clean, and safe the facility is. Additionally, the hotel offers free high-speed internet access, a business center, nice-sized updated rooms, a heated pool, and saunas for men and women (just to name a few). With this hotel, you'll have easy access to the freeway as well as free parking in close proximity to your room. The location is great for those who wish to visit some of the many attractions in the area.
Manager Response: Hello William:  Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your comments "....comfortable, clean, and safe the facility is."  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in online guest reviews ^_^.  We also loved your feedback on "safe".  Laguna Hills is a safe city and the Laguna Hills Police Department is next door to the Lodge, we love our first responders.  William, we look forward to seeing you again soon, safe travels.

Summary: Perfect location near the freeway, restaurants, and family. Our third floor room was comfortable and very quiet despite the freeway nearby, though there is a fire station and sirens bleed through the sound barriers occasionally. A nice continental breakfast was included and parking is free-a great perk.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We appreciate your headline "Everything We Needed", and comments "....Perfect location.....very quiet...".  We do have a super location just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall, there are several popular restaurants at the mall.  We also appreciate your feedback on the fire station, we installed dual glazed windows in our room so guests are no disturbed.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: We have stayed several times at this great motel and it has always provided great value, very clean and reasonably appointed rooms for the cost and spectacular gardens and relaxing atmosphere at a very busy corner of Laguna Hills. The breakfast was very good ; the breakfast room was very pleasant.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your repeat business, and for your review score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback "...great value, very clean...spectacular gardens....".  BTW, we have 350 varieties of roses with 450 rose bushes overall; plus 80 clematis / bougainvillea.  We especially value your comment "clean" as it is the #1 compliment we receive and it is a priority at our hotel.  As a family owned business we thank you for  your business!  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Top class stay at the Laguna Hills Lodge
Summary: My first time staying here after my friend , who lives in nearby Laguna Woods , recommended it to me. It was an excellent recommendation. Check-in was smooth with no hassles. Just what I needed after a long journey from Bristol (UK) Room was nice and clean and was quite large Breakfast was included and was a continental style with cereals , bagels , boiled eggs , fresh juices , teas and coffee. It certainly set you up for the day  There was also a TV to watch the local news in the breakfast room There is a CVS and a Farmers Market within a 5 min walk from the lodge. There is also a Ralphâ€™s ( think big Tescoâ€™s ) a 20 min walk away. Check out was also a breeze thankâ€™s to Nevine  Also a shout out to the housekeeping staff who did a sterling job keeping everything clean and tidy. No
Manager Response: Thank you for your headline "Top class...", and thanks for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your feedback "Room was nice and clean and was quite large:, and thank you for recognizing Nevine, she does a great job.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and recommendation -"highly recommending this hotel."

Summary: We always stay here when we go to visit our son and his family in Laguna. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The grounds are  beautiful and quaint, we love to just sit on our balcony and look down on the courtyard, very relaxing. Also the price is reasonable and the rooms are nice. And the location can't be beat.
Manager Response: Hi Allen:  Thanks so much for your review and for all of the detail in your feedback "The staff is always friendly and helpful.  The grounds are beautiful....price is reasonable and the rooms are nice...location can't be beat."  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business!!  Please come back soon ^_^. Safe travels.

Summary: My wife and I attended our daughter's book launch and stayed here for the first time.  We Ubered to and from the airport and it was easy.  The location had a good vibe. Clean and comfortable rooms.  We're going back in March.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your daughter's book launch.  Thank you for your review and feedback "Clean and comfortable rooms."  We look forward to seeing you in March, Happy Saint Patrick's Day ^_^.

Summary: It Was our 1st time here.. me and my husband really enjoy staying at this hotel love the view from our window, waking up in the morning and seeing the beautiful landscape, the city..very quiet, cleanliness was excellent all we needed the room had it, complimentary breakfast was included, service was very good and everyone greeted us nicely, very nice ppl, definitely will be staying here again I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate all of your feedback "...very quiet, cleanliness was excellent...breakfast was included...".  Thanks so much for your headline "Highly Recommended" ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We stay at Laguna Hills Lodge every time we visit our daughter at UC Irvine.  The price is right, the rooms are comfortable, it feels safe, and the location is convenient.  My favorite part is the garden area, which feels like someone's backyard.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your repeat business.  We appreciate your feedback "...the rooms are comfortable, it feels safe, and the location is convenient."  Laguna Hills is a safe city and the Laguna Hills City Hall and Police Department is next door to the Lodge.  We do have a super location just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall and a short drive to Laguna Beach and Dana Point.  We look forward to your next visit, travel safe.

Summary: Great spot for exploring the beaches along Orange County.  You need a car but a great base to stay. Good breakfast in the morning and room fully equipped. Staff were nice, free parking available and it has everything you need. Would recommend and stay again.
Manager Response: Merry Christmas:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback "Great spot for exploring the beaches along Orange County".  We are a short drive to Laguna Beach and Dana Point ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We appreciate your comment "Would recommend and stay again."

Summary: The Lodge is easy access from Route 5. Convenient to restaurants. And shopping. Rooms are good sized and comfortable. Staff is always pleasant. We appreciate the complementary breakfast. Especially enjoy the pool and workout room. Laundry facilities on site as well. Our stays are for 10 to 14 days whilst visiting family. We've been coming here for 10 years, so it feels like home. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Merry Christmas Jeanne, and thank you for all of your repeat business over 10 years!  We appreciate your recommendation "Highly recommend".  You are right we are close many restaurants, especially at the Five Lagunas Mall across the street.  Guest feedback is very positive on King's Fish House, IN-N-Out Burger, BJ's, and Ruby's.  Jeanne, we look forward to your next visit, safe travels.

Summary Heading: Great lodge -- spectacular gardens and grounds
Summary: We have stayed numerous times at the Laguna Hills Lodge over the past couple of decades. It is consistently clean. The gardens and landscaping are spectacular. The location could not be better -- adjacent to the I-5 freeway, close to Laguna Beach, and walking distance to a number of excellent eating places -- from fast food (In-N-Out, Chick-Fil-A) to nice sit down restaurants.
Manager Response: Hi William:  Thanks so much for your repeat business, and for your feedback "It is consistently clean.  The gardens and landscaping are spectacular. The location could not be better....".  BTW, we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall ^_^.  We are a short drive to Laguna Beach, and the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street.  William, thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: While visiting friends in the area, we stayed here for a few nights.  Very clean and spacious.  Beds were comfortable and the bathroom was stocked. The soap has a bit of an odd orange disinfectant smell, so maybe byos.  Nothing fancy, but exactly as you would expect an upscale motel to be.  Would recommend for a few nightsâ€™ stay.
Manager Response: Hello Brian:  Thank you for your review and comments "Very clan and spacious.  Beds were comfortable and bathroom was stocked."  BTW,  "clean" is one of the reasons the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence in each year for the last ten years.  Thank you again for your feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  We decorate for Christmas ^_^.

Summary: It was such a nice room and breakfast was fantastic! I had to go to the ER the night before and we didnâ€™t get back until 6 am. My husband went to the front desk and asked if we could have an extra hour so I could sleep since I didnâ€™t all night, and they gave us an extra 2 hours!! It was so wonderful! We were so blessed by their kindness! We LOVED our stay there and will definitely be back the next time we visit Laguna Beach! Highly recommend for sure!!
Manager Response: Hi Shawny:  Thank you for your headline "AMAZING service!!"  We loved your comment We LOVED our stay there and will definitely be back....".  BTW, we decorate for the holidays - Halloween and Christmas ^_^.

Summary Heading: Perfect stopover lodge with great value
Summary: We were looking for a place to stop after a long drive, and this lodge was just off a freeway exit.  It is surprisingly quiet, extremely well-maintained, and attractive. Though an older lodge, it has been carefully cared for and the large rooms have been upgraded. The grounds throughout are beautifully manicured.  It is a great value. Service is excellent at the desk.  Breakfast is standard but well done with assistants to help.  We would readily stop in again.
Manager Response: Hi Glenn:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "....quiet, extremely well-maintained...Service is excellent....". We appreciate you recognizing our maintenance team, they do a great job ^_^.   BTW, we have remodeled all of our guest rooms during the last three years with a helping hand for our maintenance team.  Glenn, we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Although the summer is over, we decorate for the holidays - Halloween and Christmas.  Safe travels.

Summary: The rooms here are super clean! They have comfortable beds, and beautiful landscape.  Great staff! 24 hour front desk is super convenient. Whatâ€™s not to love about it. All around 5 out of 5 star experience. Will definitely be back here soon for sures!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...super clean!...comfortable beds.   Great staff!"  BTW, the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence for ten years in a row, the main reason we have done so well is our staff.  During Covid we keep the hotel open and retained 90% of our staff ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.  Safe travels.

Summary: I am so incredibly glad I booked this motel. Excellent & safe location to shopping center's & restaurants. Motel staff is super friendly, motel landscape is beautiful & good complimentary breakfast. Close to beaches â›± Easy access to the freeway.
Manager Response: Hi Jessica:  Thanks so much for your review.  We appreciate your feedback "I am so incredibly glad I booked this motel."  To your point we do have a great location, many of our guests use the Lodge as a headquarters and take day trips north to Disneyland, west to Laguna Beach, and south to San Diego.  The Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street.  Jessica, thank you for your business, we look forward to your next visit to the Lodge ^_^.

Summary: Great location for food and only 15 min from the beach. Large rooms and friendly staff.  Continental breakfast was fairly good - cereal, bagels, hard boiled eggs, yogurt. Area was clean. Pool area looked nice.
Manager Response: Hi Nancy:  Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback "Great location for food and only 15 min from the beach." BTW, guest feedback is very positive about several mall restaurants like King's Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJ's, and Ruby's.  Thank you for your comment about "clean" as "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews.  Nancy, we look forward to your next visit, safe travels ^_^.

Summary: Clean, professional, lots of amenities and close by a lot of great places, restaurants and of course Laguna Beach..15-20 Customer service was fantastic and the cleaning people were friendly as well.  You can beat this price for a place like this.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate all of the detail in your review "Clean...lots of amenities and close to .... restaurants.  Customer service was fantastic...". Thanks for recognizing our staff ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: WONT REFUND $144.10 THEY OVER CHARGED US!!!
Summary: BEWARE!!  DONT STAY HERE!!!   After being incorrectly charged for a extra night for $144.10, I have yet to receive any refund or any response after 2 weeks!!!  I have had to make multiple phone calls, email banking documents since 7/21/2021 and still no refund.  As the customer, I have been disregarded and disrespected!!!  Not a experience I would recommend to any traveler!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Our night audit records show all room charges processed per the reservation made.  Our front desk is happy to review your guest folio with you if you have any questions.  If you disagree with the information you have received from a front desk officer please feel free to write to us a info@lagunahillslodge.com.   Thank you.

Summary: I loved the fact that I could park my work van and not worry about anyone breaking into it in the middle of the night. The pool and jacuzzi were heated and working. The rooms were very cozy and clean. Staff very friendly and breakfast was good.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback "The rooms were cozy and clean.  Staff very friendly and breakfast was good."  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews, "friendly" is #2.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business^_^.  Please come back again soon.

Summary: Excellent place to stay,rooms are very clean and comfortable..From the start we were made to feel so welcome ..Breakfast was so appreciated,simple but fresh and good..We will be back again hopefully soon and feel like we have found a home away from home ....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and headline "Excellent".  We loved your comment "...feel like we have found a home away from home...".  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.   Safe travels.

Summary Heading: I would go back in a minute
Summary: We had a very comfortable room at a very reasonable price. The grounds are beautiful, the room was clean. It was perfect. We were visiting my sister in Laguna Woods, so the location was perfect. We were there before California opened up from Covid and the breakfast was still served to us. In a bag but other hotels had just not served it all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and headline "I would go back in a minute".  We appreciate comments "The grounds are beautiful, the room was clean.  It was perfect."  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Just returned from a two night here.  The room was clean, staff very friendly and helpful.  The grounds of the property are cared for very well.  I would  recommend this hotel and we will be returning soon.

Summary: An absolutely peaceful oasis in Laguna Hills.  Close to all amenities, yet a little bit of paradise.  Gorgeous flowers, beautiful outdoor pool and hot tub, well appointed rooms.  Staff very courteous and friendly, even stayed open a few extra minutes for continental breakfast!  Close to Laguna Beach, San Juan Capistrano and San Clemente.  Extremely reasonable price.
Manager Response: Hello Annalisa:  Thanks for all of the detail in your review and for your comments "...well appointed rooms. We loved your headline "A peaceful oasis".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: This property is absolutely gorgeous! The  grounds are so pretty with the most beautiful flowers from lilacs to the perfect roses! The staff is so accommodating and caring. The met all my expectations and then some. Laguna Beach is only 7 miles away and traffic to the beach from the property is easy!  Many nice restaurants in the area.  I have another trip planned at the end of the month and I will be staying again at LAGUNA HILLS LODGE....My new hotel when in southern Cali!!  Dianne S
Manager Response: Hi Dianne:  Thank you for your comments "This property is absolutely gorgeous!...The staff is so accommodating and caring ..... met all my expectations and then some". BTW, a lot of travelers use us as their headquarters and take day trips north to Disneyland, west to the beach, and south to San Diego and Lego Land.  Dianne, we look forward to seeing you again soon, thank you for your business ^_^.

Summary: Just got back today from an overnight stay here. We had to be in Laguna Beach for a wedding and wanted something close by and not too expensive. Found this lil gem and we loved it. Had a great night here. The property is close to tons of shops and restaurants and the buildings and grounds are so pretty. Very charming with all  of the rose bushes and bougainvillea and hummingbirds everywhere! The staff was excellent. Everyone we were in contact with was super nice and they accommodated us with early check in. The housekeeping and maintenance staff were very nice as well. We definitely plan on returning for a weekend stay this summer. Highly recommend.

We appreciate your headline "Great Hotel", and your feedback "Found this lil gem and we loved it....close to shops and restaurants and the buildings and grounds are so pretty."  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and thank you for your recommendation! Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: My husband and I stay at this hotel every couple of months, the staff is always pleasant and helpful. The rooms are always clean and the grounds smell absolutely wonderful because of all of the flowers, not to mention how beautiful everything is. The pool was the perfect temperature as well as the spa, the sauna was also open and perfect. To top that all off for everything you get and the location, they have some of the best rates around! We highly recommend this hotel â€œthe Laguna Hills lodge â€œ for everyone, without hesitation!     Thank you, sincerely               Nicole Casey
Manager Response: Hi Nicole:  Thanks so much for your repeat business, and thank you for all of the detain in your review! We sincerely appreciate your comments on our flowers and the spa too.  We have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes in total, plus 80 bougainvillea / clematis - Spring is beautiful at the Lodge.  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: The grounds are amazing. The staff greets you like family and housekeeping does an outstanding job. I feel so comfortable and safe everytime I stay here. Very convenient location, right off the 5 fwy. 13 minutes from John Wayne Airport. Recently remodeled rooms. The roses on the grounds are beautiful and you can smell them as you arrive.
Manager Response: Hi Thomas: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your headline "Beautiful Hotel".  We appreciate all of your feedback "The staff greets you like family and housekeeping does an outstanding job."  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we have received in over 5,000 online reviews, "friendly staff" is #2.  We love our first responders, the Laguna Hills Police Department is next door to the Lodge.  Thank you for your repeat business, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: We booked one night and then added another night while out to dinner. We were told we would need to change rooms and were fine with that. The following morning I was ill and called the front desk to ask if we could stay in our room. The desk clerk was kind and compassionate and I am very grateful that I was able to rest undisturbed prior to resuming our travel.  It is unexpected to receive such a prompt reply and not be told a manager had to be consulted. I donâ€™t know her name but you have an excellent employee at the front desk during the morning. We will plan to stay again when traveling in this area.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your headline "Great customer service".  We appreciate your acknowledgement of our front desk, they do a great job.  Also, thank you for the review score of 5 out of 5.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: We've been staying at Laguna Hills Lodge whenever we come visit our kids who have moved to the area. The Lodge has the best value for us.  First, the beds are comfortable.  I've logged some the best sleep while staying there.  It is conveniently located for our purposes, close to many great places to eat. Secondly, they offer a great breakfast for the price.  Granted the pandemic has reduced their ability to serve the "usual" but, the service makes up for it. Great tasting coffee, a sweet roll and fruit will get me started.  The front desk is very responsive. We had a locked safe and Myra? (I think that was her name) was right up to solve our problem.  It's on a busy street, but the rooms are quiet and turning on the fan can block what sound gets through.  It's our go to when we
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and comments "Clean rooms, great value....beds are comfortable....The front desk is very responsive....".  Thank you for recognizing Myla, she does a great job ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business.  Yes, Covid-19 resulted in changes but we stayed open throughout to take care of our customers and staff.  We are looking forward to a busy summer and 2021 ^_^.  BTW, the roses are now in bloom, we have 350 varieties of roses and 450 rose bushes in total, plus 80 clematis / bougainvillea.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Nevine, front desk manager, is wonderful and makes you feel welcomed instantly. Rooms are very clean and the price is wonderful when compared to the sticker shock in the area. Clean pool area, grab and go meals and even a BOGO for Chick Fil A across the parking lot. Plenty of other food and shopping options immediately around.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review rating of 5 out of 5, your headline "Hidden gem", and for your recognition of Nevine.  She does a great job ^_^. Regarding your feedback "Rooms are very clean and the price is wonderful...." we are very proud of the fact that "clean" is the #1 compliment we have received in over 5,000 online gust reviews, "friendly staff" is #2.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, safe travels.

Summary: This place is nice, clean and affordable. You really canâ€™t beat it. Jacuzzi is always hot and available , this is my getaway spot. We come every weekend and Charlie always makes us feel welcomed, thank you!
Manager Response: Hi Quenton:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "....nice, clean and affordable.  You really can't beat it."  We also appreciate your comments about Charlie, he does a great job ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business.  Quenton, Spring is a great time to stay at the Lodge because soon our roses will be in bloom, we have 350 varieties of roses and 450 rose bushes overall.  Time to stop and smell the roses ^_^.

Summary: The receptionist at night was very accommodating and makes guests feel welcome. The room was pleasant and sanitized. The location is very convenient with a lot of restaurants nearby. Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hi Andrew:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback "The receptionist at night was very accommodating .... room was sanitized. The location is very convenient with a lot of restaurants nearby."  BTW, guest feedback is very positive about several local restaurants including Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJ's, Chick-fil-A,  and Ruby's.   We were very happy to read that you will "definitely be back!"  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: My bf had to book a room for COVID reasons because his roommate was possibly exposed and he didn't want to expose me or his family. The first room he had was a double (Queen) with a small bathroom and questionable carpeting. He moved a few days later to a room with a king sized bed and vinyl flooring that was on the other side from the fire station. This room was definitely better than the first. Included with the room: free breakfast voucher at Chick-fil-A, small fridge, microwave, safe, TV, free WiFi, desk, and chair. The king room had an additional small table and easy chair. There is a small pool area and laundry facility on site. The staff is friendly and parking is plentiful. The lodge is located right by the 5 FWY, fire station, Laguna Hills Civic Center, and Total Wine &
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and feedback "The staff is friendly and parking is plentiful". Yes, we do have a great location just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall and next door to Laguna Hills City Hall / Police Department,  plus we are a short drive to Laguna Beach.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive about several restaurants at the mall including Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, and Ruby's.  Regarding Coronavirus, we are happy to report that the Lodge was selected by Saddleback Memorial Hospital as a hotel to stay for their first responder nurses and doctors - we love our first responders!  Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: My wife and I have been coming here for years, since her elderly (now 102!) mother lives close by.   The staff have always been so accommodating and genuine. The room is clean and laid out to meet our basic needs. I always suggest the garden level area. What a cool place, especially how it's decorated during the Christmas season.    I love the organization of the lodge with the exercise room, pool, hot tub and self-service laundry area.   The breakfast has always been great, although Covid interrupted that this year. However, they did adjust the rates to reflect that sad omission.   The location is close to eateries, including a great bagel shack, wine shop, Chick-Fil-A, and other places to make your stay easier. I'm sure we'll be back!
Manager Response: Hi Eddie:  Thanks so much for your review and review score of 5 out of 5.  Congratulations to your mother-in-law, 102 years young ^_^, she has seen a lot (two world wars, great depression, and so much more.  We appreciate your feedback "The staff has always been so accommodating and genuine.  The room is clean....".  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we have received in over 5,000 online guest reviews, "friendly staff" is #2.  Yes, we do have a good location just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall.  As you said Chick-fil-A is near by and guest feedback is also very positive on Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, and Ruby's.  Thank you for staying with us again.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: A must stay when you are in the area
Summary: This Place is so beautiful and well maintained. The staff is very friendly and will go the extra yard to make your visit/stay a memorable one. We will be staying here again and I highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Hi Laurie:  Thank you for your review, and comments "This place is so beautiful and well maintained....staff is very friendly and will go the extra yard to make your visit...memorable..."  We were delighted to read that you will be staying with us again.  Thank you for your recommendation!  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you in the Spring ^_^, BTW our roses are in full bloom in April (we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes in total).  Safe travels.

Summary: I REALLY wanted to like this place.  Especially during COVID, I prefer to patronize individually owned businesses.  Unfortunately this one fell short.  The photos of the grounds on the website are really what drew me in.  Those, and the positive reviews.  But the room itself was a disappointment.  Those desperately need an update - all furnishings, and the bathroom, felt very outdated.  When you walk in and the first thing you see is many spots of chipped paint on the walls, it's a major turnoff.  The ripped bedskirt and linens that are so old that they feel limp also contributed to the sad atmosphere.  The blanket was so thin it's basically another sheet.  We found food crumbs on the floor from a prior guest, as well as a used coffee packet in the coffee maker.  During a
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We appreciate all of your feedback, and were happy to read that you try to patronize individually owned businesses.  We were also happy to read that our "staff was fine".  Regarding areas of improvement "...room itself was a disappointment" may we suggest you try one of our Garden Rooms, all remodeled in the last two years. BTW,  most of our hotel has been remodeled but we did have a delay due to Covid-19 in refurbishing about a dozen rooms.  We will complete the remodeling of these room in 2021.   Regarding housekeeping, it is available on request per the county's Covid-19 guidelines, just put the maid service sign on your door or call the front desk. We apologize that you found crumbs in your room, that is unacceptable. Please know that  we focus on cleanliness and  "Clean" is the #1 compliment the Lodge receives in online guest reviews. Thanks again for the heads up on the crumbs in your room, I will alert our housekeeping manager.  Thank you again for all of your comments, I will share your review with my team.

Summary: My family and I have been staying here for a few days now mainly cuz the staff are so polite nice and friendly. The Lodge itself is absolutely beautiful, I look forward to walking to the front desk to get new room keys each time cuz the garden here is absolutely gorgeous and cuz the staff treats u like family. Oh! -And didi mention a free chick fil a breakfast voucher every morning as well? It's got a very homey feel to it, way different than the tedious, unwelcome, corporate vibe of all the other hotels. Thanks to Marco, the maids, and the staff for all the accommodations, we can't thank u enough!
Manager Response: Hi Kaikai:  Thanks so much for your review, and for the review score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback "...the staff are so polite...The Lodge itself is absolutely beautiful...".  I will share your comments with my team.  BTW, our gardens we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 bougainviella / clematis.  We were happy to read that your family is enjoying the Lodge.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, we decorate for Christmas ^_^.

Summary: I found Laguna Hills Lodge to be a nice clean hotel in a good location near lots of restaurants. The service was friendly and they even gave me a breakfast voucher for a place nearby.  The price was fair. I'll be back!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...nice clean hotel in a good location near lots of restaurants.  The service was friendly....". BTW, guest feedback is very positive on several local restaurants including Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, Chick-fil-A, and Rubys.  During COVID the Lodge is providing our guests with a free hot breakfast at Chick-fil-A ^_^.  Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: an amazing experience for my friends and i at the lodge for our mini vacation! upon arrival, we received a chik-fil-a free breakfast entree for the next morning due to the complimentary breakfast being shut down due to COVID. the customer service was spectacular; we had a very helpful employee ask to help us lug our cooler down a flight of stairs when we checked out.  fyi: friend and i accidentally stained shower curtain because of our pre-dyed hair but they were gracious enough to take care of everything for us.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback "An amazing experience for my friends and I at the Lodge...The customer service was spectacular".  Thank you for acknowledging the service from our team, great service is the main reason the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence for ten years in a row.  Yes, we are receiving a lot of positive guest feedback about breakfast Chick-fil-A, they are located next door and provide drive through and stake out breakfast.  Thanks so much for staying with us!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Our stay was in October 2019 - different times so I appreciate it may be a little out of date. The hotel is built around a nice courtyard and its well worth getting one of the upstairs rooms overlooking it. The rooms are very nice and of a high standard. At reception there were complimentary sweets available - a nice touch. Parking was easy. Over the road is a BJ's which was good for beer and food. I was close to giving a 5 star but a couple of easily fixable things made me go 4. Firstly the balcony is i lovely place to be to enjoy the excellent courtyard but needs some seats and a small table to make it excellent. Secondly the breakfast (on our stay) was a voucher system handed over at the counter. I would much rather graze and get little bits at a time to have just enough.
Manager Response: Hello Stvjyn:  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback "The rooms are very nice...Parking was easy...over the road is a BJ's....".  Yes, we across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall - guest comments are very positive about BJ's, Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, and Rubys at the mall.  Regarding our continental breakfast, during COVID we are providing our guests breakfast vouchers at Chick-fil-A next door to the Lodge.  Guest have lots of choices this way.  Stvjyn, we look forward to seeing you again soon, please be safe in your travels.

Summary: I stay 1 night and will stay again I will recommend to all my friend's thank for s great service ,the housekeeper do s good job  place good break fast and a lot flowers the pool is heated the front desk are excellent worker I can see they have a lot experience on hotel business
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review, and thank you for the review score of 5 out of 5 and the recommendation to all of your friends!  We appreciate your feedback "...great service...good breakfast....and a lot of flowers....".  BTW, we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 bougainviella / clematis.  We have arranged for a Chick-fil-A breakfast for our guests during COVID, and guest feedback is very positive ^_^.   We look forward to seeing you again soon, enjoy your Labor Day Weekend.

Summary: Parked for the night right in front of my room. I had a balcony. I Walked around the lodge in the AM enjoying the beautiful courtyard while walking to chill-fila for free complimentary breakfast. It was the next parking lot over. The hotel provides the coupons. It was a short stay, but I also admired the rooms, how clean they were and the pool was open late.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review.  We appreciate your feedback "Parked for the night right in front of my room....Chick-fil-A complimentary breakfast....admired the rooms, how clean....".  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we have received in over 6,000 online guest reviews ^_^.  Our Housekeeping Manager of 40 years does a super job.  As a family owned businenss we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This was our fourth stay at Laguna Hills Lodge. We love the location, pool and now they have recently upgraded the rooms. It is close to everything you could need in South Orange County. Plenty of free parking and beautifully landscaped grounds.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review and thank you for your repeat business.  We appreciate your feedback "We love the location....they have recently upgraded the rooms...beautiful landscaping."  We are just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall and a short drive to Laguna Beach.  BTW, guest comments on several mall restaurants are very positive (Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, and Rubys).  Regarding our landscaping we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 clemaits / bougainviella.  We loved your headline "Very happy with our stay!  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Pleased with everything at Laguna Hills Lodge
Summary: The best value in South Orange County. The location is perfect it's close to freeways, stores and beaches, the staff are courteous and helpful, and the rooms are well appointed and competitively priced. I would highly recommend staying there.
Manager Response: Hi Pablo:  Thanks so much for your review.  We appreciate your recommendation and feedback "The best value in South Orange County.  the location is perfect....staff are courteous...".  Regarding location we are just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall and a short drive to Laguna Beach.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive about several of the restaurants at the mall including Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, and Rubys.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: First I want to give a big THANK YOU to Charles~  Charles, you were so kind to give me a few teabags because I don't drink coffee~that was so kind of you~ It's no wonder I love staying here~  But that's only one of the reasons Laguna Hills Lodge is the ONLY place I stay~my Home away from Home as I call it~  I love that they remember my name,  but it's the whole package, lovely, comfortable rooms, wonderful breakfast offerings where I always meet other guests at the long communal table, a restful pool area, laundry facilities and great customer service and I do mean GREAT!! They are accommodating as well as pleasant with whatever your needs are~  They have it all but it's their caring â¤ and helpful employees that make LHL my go-to place~  Thank you again~  Kathy Miller Las Vegas,
Manager Response: Hi Kathy:    First, thanks so much for your repeat business!  We enjoy having you as a guest and look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.   We thank you for your recognition of Charles, he does a great job.  We appreciate your comments "...lovely, comfortable rooms, wonderful breakfast...restful pool area....helpful employees that make LHL my go-to place."  Kathy, we couldn't agree with you more, our people / staff are the key to success.  BTW, our Housekeeping Manager has been with us for 40 years, our Maintenance Manager has been with us for 39 years - we are lucky to have them.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: My wife and I visit the area at least 4 times a year and have found this Lodge to be the perfect getaway. Not only is it in a great location, but is very reasonably priced. The grounds are beautiful and the staff is always pleasant and friendly. And as a bonus it also has a free breakfast that is nice, and no parking fee.
Manager Response: Hi Katy:  Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review.  We appreciate your feedback "....great location...reasonably priced.   grounds are beautiful.....staff friendly...."  We do provide a free breakfast at Chick-fil-A, guest feedback is very positive on the great job they have been doing during the Coronavirus pandemic.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: My friends and I came for vacation before school started and the location was perfect, especially for the price. The security guard Mario was so kind and friendly. We Loved it so much and look forward to coming back !
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...the location was perfect".  Mario is our Night Auditor and he does a great job, thanks for commenting that he was "...so kind and friendly".  Great news that you will be "coming back", we look forward to seeing you soon.  Regarding our location, we a across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall - guest feedback is very positive about several restaurants like Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, CPK, BJs and Rubys.  Safe travels ^_^.

Summary Heading: Quaint Hotel at a Reasonable Price
Summary: While visiting my son in March (pre Covid), I stayed in this Lodge for two non-consecutive night.  I stayed in a different building each time.  There were many positives about this lodging, but some negatives to be aware of.  The multi-building complex sits in the middle of a busy area of Laguna Hills.  In fact, the 5 Lagunas Mall is across the street.  I thought this would be too busy and noisy, but it really didn't impact my stay and some would find it very convenient.  In the middle of the various buildings, there is a lovely green area with plants, lots of flowering clematis and other features for relaxation.  There is plenty of free parking around the complex.  The front desk staff is friendly and helpful.  Overall, the cost for the Laguna Hills Lodge is very reasonable
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your review score of 4 out of 5, and our feedback "...the Five Lagunas Mall is across the street..."  WE do have a good location, not only across the street from the mall but a short drive to Laguna Beach and Disneyland.  BTW, feedback from guests is very positive about Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, and Rubys. Regarding safety, we have a state of the art door locking system, many exterior cameras, and the Laguna Hills Police Department is next door to us.  We appreciate all of the detail you provided on our guest rooms "...good size, vanity and sink was outside the bath....refrigerator, safe...".  Don't forget the microwave and many other amenities.  Thank you for staying with us, please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: I call it a little Oasis in the middle of a bustling area.  Well hidden and beautifully landscaped.  Convenient to everything - pool area and staff were excellent.  Everything was kept very clean during this Covid19 situation.  Great bang for your buck if you're in the area - will definitely stay there again when visiting family. Breakfast closed, but they even gave you free breakfast coupon at Chik Fila next door - they do it right.
Manager Response: Hello Lance:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Everything was kept very clean during this Covid 19 situation.....staff were excellent."  We appreciate you recognizing our staff ^_^. Thanks for commenting on Chick-fil-A, we do provide our guests with a free hot breakfast next door, Chick-fil-A, provides take out or drive through so you can enjoy your breakfast in your room or at our pool. As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back soon.

Summary: We are so disappointed we cannot visit our favourite hotel in california been staying at this hotel for many years now, but with the virus not been able to visit this year, looking forward to hopefully coming over next year and look forward to seeing Navine on reception who is always so kind to us,UK visitors Lynette & Stuart Sunderland
Manager Response: Hi Lynette and Stuart:  Thanks so much for staying with us!  Thank you so much for your kind remarks about Nevine, she does a great job as our Front Desk Manager.  We believe our staff is the main reason the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence for the last nine years in a row, no coincidence Nevine has been with us for nine years.  Loved your headline "Fantastic hotel".  We look forward to seeing you soon ^_^.

Summary: ..staff very pleasant.. ..very accomadating.. ..beautiful grounds.. ..rooms clean and functional.. ..loved the Chic-fi-le complimentary breakfast.. ..will return.. ..thank you Laguna Hills Lodge!! ..enjoyed my stay with you..
Manager Response: Hi Doug:  Thanks for all of the detail in your review "..staff very pleasant....beautiful grounds...rooms clean....loved Chick-fil-A".  BTW, "Clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in thousands of guest reviews, "friendly staff" is #2.  Our free hot Chick-fil-A breakfast is very popular, thanks for pointing it out - I will let the Chick-fil-A manager know you recognized them.  Safe travels, thank you for your recommendation "...will return".

Summary Heading: Cute Little Lodge close to Memorialcare Saddleback Medical Center
Summary: I was in town for a continuing education course at Memorialcare Saddleback Medical Center and am sad I did not book here for the first weekend. I judged this place based on it not being part of a corporate chain and I was horribly mistaken.   NEARBY: It's a walkable distance to the hospital, so if there's a need for you to be there. I recommend staying here. Depending on where you are in the hospital, you might have to drive. It's also walkable to Starbucks (which was great for me to walk to before our course) and a little further down is CVS. There is a very close Walgreens, but this is a VERY small Walgreens that only has prescriptions. BJ's Brewery is also a walkable distance as well with many other restaurants nearby: Subway, California Pizza Kitchen and more.  NOISE: The
Manager Response: As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a detailed review with lots of feedback.  Your comment "CLEANLINESS: Great!" is really important especially during this time of the Coronavirus pandemic.  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment the lodge has received in over 6,000 online guest reviews.  Yes, we are very close to Saddleback Memorial Hospital - walking distance in fact.  The hospital selected the Lodge as home for nineteen nurses and doctors that were volunteering as first responders in OC, we were happy to help them help the community.  We are also across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall - we can recommend Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, and Rubys as popular restaurants to visit.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you again for your review.

Summary: Peaceful & relaxing.  Perfect location - ideal for quiet, restful vacation.  Garden is very pretty & room super clean!  Very responsive staff.  Good shopping & restaurants.  Perfect little spot for peaceful retreat from beach crowds.
Manager Response: Hello Crystal:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Perfect location....room super clean! Very responsive staff.  Good shopping and restaurants."  Wow, you covered a lot is a short review ^_^, well said.  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we have received in over 6,000 online guest reviews.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon.

Summary: Thank you to Charlie! He helped my friends and I when we had an issue with our booking. He went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help us out during a stressful time.
