The room was extremely clean and very nice. An amazing location next to a ton of food options and very caring and supportive employees. Will definitely be returning for future stays and suggest this place to everyone and anyone staying in the area!!!
Manager Response: Hello Julia:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback about Charlie as well as your comments "The room was extremely clean and very nice.  an amazing location next to a ton fo food options....".  BTW, guest feedback is very positive about Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, and Chick-fil-A.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: We have been staying in Lagula hills lodge for couple of weeks, we liked everything about the hotel: room service comes once per day, and cleaned  lots better them other hotels from out experience. Breakfasts were good, they serve good quality meals, as we were there for a couple of weeks we would like to have hot meals like scrumble eggs, waffles. Reception of the hotel is super polite and helpful, I took candies there several times. They have awesome gym, pool and jacuzzi. We were able to relax and had a good time there. Deffinately would stay another time.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to post a 5 out of 5 star review.  We appreciate your feedback "...we liked everything abu the hotel....and cleaned lots better than other hotels...reception super polite and helpful...".   As a family owned business we thank you for your business, we were happy to read you "Deffinately would stay another time."

Summary: I visited my dad March 18, 19, 20 and discovered this great local hotel.  Morning breakfast had hot items and was takeout only (coronavirus) and then changed to Chick-fil-A breakfast coupons.  The staff was friendly, my room was clean, and I'll stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Josh:  Thanks for your review rating of 5 out of 5, and for your feedbackj"....this great local hotel...The staff was friendly, my room was clean...".  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.  Stay safe.

Summary Heading: Resort feel with home like accommodations
Summary: My fiancÃ©, Frank Armendariz, and I have had the pleasure of staying at the Laguna Hills Lodge many times.   It is always a pleasure. Everything with our stays here has always been outstanding and exceeded our expectations. From the resort style feel, to the friendly, always available, and capable staff, the super hot and steamy hot tub and beautiful heated pool with great deck ambience ... we always have the best and most relaxing time at the Laguna Hills Lodge. The location is amazing, right across the street from the Laguna Hills Mall, almost in the same parking lot as Total Wine and Chick-fil-A, you can door dash almost anything in town delivered to you as well.   Our last trip was during the corona virus shut down, and we had the best time! The staff made us feel completely
Manager Response: Hello Frank and Bee:  Thanks so much for your review and comments "Our last trip was during the corona virus shut down, and we had the best time!  The staff made us feel completely at home and hotel was clean inside and extra precautions were being taken in the current situation"....The Laguna Hills Lodg eis a gem...".    As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. Continental breakfast, pool and self serve laundry. All at a great price. The flowers were beautiful! We are already looking forward to our next trip and plan on staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback "The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful".  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in Trip Advisor guest reviews, "friendly" is #2.  Clean and friendly have helped the Lodge earn the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence each year for the last nine years.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: Great location, south of L.A. where sanity returns. Close to freeway. Lovely Eden. Good breakfast. Love the candy in lobby. Grandson loved the pool. Visiting brother in Laguna Woods. Close to everything. In/Out Burger walking distance, as well as other various eating establishments. Loved the â€œgardenâ€ w car just around the corner of the building. Was able to print out my own boarding passes from airline website.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your feedback "Great location...Good breakfast...Grandson loved the pool...Close to everything...".  We are just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall, BTW guest feedback is very positive on Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs and Rugys.  Chick-fil-A is next store and received good reviews too.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: This place is excellent!!  Very clean rooms and most friendly staff. We travel to So Cal frequently and this is our first choice to stay!!  Great location as well. We have loved every minute staying here  Highly recommended ðŸ’š.
Manager Response: Hi WY ^_^: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "This place is excellent!! Very clean rooms....Great location....". BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews.  Regarding our location, we are just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall, customer feedback is very positive about Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, Rubys and BJs at the mall .  Also, thank you for your recommendation "Highly recommended".  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: This hotel is very simple and a little outdated. I would suggest getting a garden view 2nd floor. They are more updated then the outer rooms. Itâ€™s located by many restaurants and shopping. Used the gym it had a bike and a treadmill weight machine was not working.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback.  I appreciate your comment about the bike and treadmill.  We have a service that maintains our fitness center equipment, they visit us weekly.  We apologize for this problem.  Yes, we do have a good location, close to "many restaurants and shopping" at the Five Laguans Mall just across the street.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive about Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs and Rubys.  Thanks for staying with us, please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: The Laguna Hills Lodge is in a convenient location, close to I-5, with nice employees.  The breakfast is good, too.  You won't find a bette deal for the price.  And, they have free candy on the desk in the office!!
Manager Response: Hello John:  Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback "....convenient location....nice employees....You won't find a better deal for the price."  Regarding your comment about our employees, "friendly staff" is the #2 compliment we receive in thousands of guest reviews, "clean" is #1.  Thank you for staying with us John, safe travels in 2020.

Summary: The rooms and bathrooms are updated, modern and cozy. The two story buildings do not have elevators. The three story building does. The garden in between buildings one and two is small but nice. Parking is free. Breakfast buffet was adequate. The hallways are open and cold during cooler weather such as we had over Christmas week. There was no extra  blanket in the room. Bedding blanket is thin. However, the window heater worked well enough. This is a basic motel which has been updated. Best for a short stay. Would be better in warm weather.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "The rooms and bathrooms are updated, modern and cozy."  We have an elevator in our three story building, and first floor rooms in all three buildings.  "Parking is free." and is conveniently located next to your building. Thank you again for your comments and for staying with us ^_^.

Summary Heading: Good rooms, friendly staff, good location
Summary: This is a great motel in a good location with plenty of eating options nearby and close to the highway.  The rooms are comfortable and well equipped, the staff are friendly and the price is right.  The breakfast is good and the complex is really clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: Hello Suzie:  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Thanks for your feedback "This is a great motel in a good location....".  BTW, the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street.  Guest feedback on restaurants is very positive on BJs, In-N-Out Burger, Kings Fish House and Rubys.  Also, Chick-fil-A is next door in the same entrance as Laguna Hills City Hall and police department.  We love our first responders ^_^.

Summary: I stayed here for two nights because I was looking for an apartment in Orange County. I needed a hotel in a safe area, clean, and not a fortune. I was very pleasantly surprised when I checked in and was given my room. It was basic but clean. It could be updated a bit, like a bigger television but I just used my laptop. The breakfast was great, the amenities were wonderful. I asked for an extra blanket because I was pretty cold at night and didn't want to keep the heater on all night. My only complaint and honestly I didn't care much, it was a little loud. It is right off the freeway and there is a fire station across the street. But other than that I plan on staying here again when I need a hotel in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review, and review score of 5 out of 5, and your headline "Clean, Friendly, Worth It". .  We appreciate your feedback "The breakfast was great, the amenities were wonderful". As a family owned busienss we thank you for your business.  Please come back again soon ^_^, we are decorated for Christmas.

Summary: We first stayed at the superb hotel in 2011 after arriving from England and stay for three weeks each August with our daughter, son in law and their three girls who all learned to swim in the lovely spotless pool.The Lodge is a short drive to many beaches from San Clemente up to Huntington and very close to Irvine Spectrum,The Shops at Mission Viejo......our favourite Mall and lots of restaurants and Disneyland is a 20 minute drive. The rooms are exceptionally well appointed and spotless and the Housekeeping Staff and Breakfast Staff do a wonderful job and are always friendly.The Reception team headed by Nevine and supported by Jim and his colleagues are by far the most friendly and helpful team you could hope for. My wife and I decided on another break from looking after our
Manager Response: Hello Steve:  Thanks so much for your review.  We loved your headline "Perfect in Every Way", and appreciate all of the detail in your feedback.  As a family owned busienss we thank you for your repeat business!  We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.  Thank you again for your comments  "The rooms are exceptionallywell appointed and spotless...."  Best wishes to you for a Merry Christmas and a healthy and Happy New Year.

Summary: We have stayed at Laguna Hills Lodge many times since 2012.  We really appreciate the friendly, helpful, hard-working staff.  The rooms are clean and comfortable and the breakfasts are generous and delicious.    The beautiful flower gardens help us to relax and enjoy God's glorious creation.  We especially enjoy the lovely bougainvillea and roses!  We look forward to staying again!
Manager Response: Hi Michael:  We thank you for all of your repeat business over the last seven years!!  We loved your headline in this review "Friendly, beautiful, clean!".  Michael, we have 350 varieties of roeses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 bougainvillea / clematis.  Many of our guests love the gardens as you do ^_^.  Your review of the Lodge is a great summary as to why the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence each year for the last eight years.  Thank you again for your busienss, please come back soon - we decorate for Christmas ^_^.

Summary: We spent one night at the hotel, visiting family in the area. It's conveniently located, close to the freeway and a short distance from a number of shopping plazas and restaurants. The price was very reasonable, the room was welcoming, the bed was comfortable and the shower was great. I would recommend a garden room as there was a lovely view of the garden and it was very quiet. It cost a bit more but I think an outside room could be noisy. The breakfast was okay but nothing special.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and comments "It's conveniently located...Price was very reasonable, the room was welcoming....the shower was great."  BTW, we receive a lot of positive guest feedback about several of the restaurants across the street (In-N-Out Burger, BJs, Rubys, etc.). Thank you for recommending one of our Garden Rooms, they all were recently remodeled.  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Right off the 405 and 15 minutes straight to laguna beach. Accessible shops and dining options. Friendly professional staff with nice welcome greeting. Nice breakfast and decent rooms. WiFi was a bit weak on far end oposite of reception. Did not make it to the pool.
Manager Response: As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  We apprecieate your review and feedback  "Accessible shops and dining options.  Friendly professional staff with nice welcome greeting.  Nice breakfast...".  Regarding accessibility we have remodeled ADA rooms and recently updated our walkways and parking lot.  The Five Lagunas Mall just across the street is also accessible.  Guest feedback on Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs and Chick-fil-A are very positive.  Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Nice staff. Nice accommodation s. Nice location. Laguna always has breezy sunny skies.. Flowers are nice.  Not far freeway. Close to 2ine store a plus. Would recommend to someone. . great for a family trip
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We loved your feedback "Nice staff.  Nice accommodations. Nice location". We look forward to seeing you again soon, we decorate for Christmas - the kids enjoy our decorations ^_^.

Summary Heading: Clean, cheerful and good value! Lovely grounds.
Summary: What a find this was! A good base to explore Orange County.  A large, comfortable room with a fridge, microwave, safe and TV. Ice machine in each block and drinks dispensers.  The pool and hot tub were a welcome treat after the hot days. Never crowded! Free pool towels can be collected from reception. Breakfast is simple but great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback "What a find this was! A good base to explore Orange County".  You make a great point about our location, many of our European guests use us as a headquarters and take day trips north to Disneyland, west to Laguna Beach, and south to San Diego.  We are also just across the street from the Five Laguans mall where guest feedback is very positive on Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, Rubys, and BJs.  Thank you for staying with us.  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: We really enjoyed walking the lovely grounds. It is beautiful and well kept. Being an old hotel, the rooms reflects that. The carpet looks old and with a bit of stains. The sheets are thin and not crisp like what I would expect from any hotel. In room (king) amenities were complete: microwave, refrigerator, hair, TV, wifi & toiletries. The deluxe continental breakfast include: fresh fruits, bagels (a server behind the counter will toast it for you), rolls, muffins, juice, milk, yogurt, oatmeal, etc. All nice and fresh. The breakfast room was kind small, but clean & pleasant. Staff generally was pleasant & friendly, with the exception of my call experience. I was going to make a reservation by calling the front counter with questions. The staff that took the phone was abrupt,
Manager Response: Hello Yuanyuan:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback.  Our grounds include 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 bougainviella / clematis.  Thank you for your comment "lovely grounds".  Regarding our guest rooms may I suggest you consider a Garden Room, all remodeled in the last two years.  Our oldest room was remodeled in 2008 and is scheduled for remodel next year.  All rooms are vacuumed daily, and  shampooed quarterly or as needed. I appreciate all of the detail in your review and will look into the carpet in your room.  Thanks for the heads-up ^_^.

Summary Heading: Good value for money but not great
Summary: We stayed one night. It is tucked in behind a busy intersection about 20 minutes from the beach. It is an old motel design, entering rooms from outside, but is well maintained. Landscaping is very nice. The room was clean and comfortable. Parking can be inconvenient depending on which building and room you get. Free breakfast is a variety of cereals, breads or rolls, fruit and hard boiled eggs. Pool and hot tub are serviceable and not overrun with kids the night we stayed. Good value for the money.
Manager Response: Hello Ralph: Thanks so much for your feedback ".....well maintained....The room was clean and comfortable.....Good value...". "Clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews, #2 is "friendly".  As a family owned business we thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Older hotel with beautiful garden filled grounds, great location and friendly staff. Excellent value for the area. Clean, unique and comfortable. Very convenient to City Hall, and the Mall is just across the street.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and the detail in your feedback.  We appreciate the review score of 5 out of 5 and your comments "...beautiful garden....great location....friendly staff....Excellent value....clean...convenient...".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Stayed in a 2nd floor King room with the garden view. Everyone was super nice.  Very quaint little place. Room was very clean, very comfortable. No bad odors.  Obviously, the bathroom had been updated recently.  Would certainly be back here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review Peter.  We appreciate the feedback "Everyone was super nice....Room was very clean, very comfortable.  No bad odors."  We were happy to read that you will "...be back here again". Thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you soon ^_^.

Summary: I have been staying at the Laguna Hills Lodge a couple of times a year since 2012. It is an inexpensive yet terrific place with everything you need from a hotel except for a restaurant and room service. The rooms, the service and the location are great and the room rate a bargain. The complimentary breakfast is a small bonus.  One drawback is the room air conditioner starts and stops frequently and is noisy. Light sleepers will not like that.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your repeat business, for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for your headline "Excellent Value".  FYI, we did consider a restaurant but there are so many nice restaurants across the street at the Five Lagunas Mall we did not think we could compete.  Guest feedback is really positive on Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, CPK, and Rubys.  Thank you again for all of your business, we sincerely appreciate it!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: You won't regret it. Great value and clean
Summary: This is the second time I stayed here.  I stayed on the second floor street side to save a little money. The room was soooo clean, the bed was comfortable. The staff is very attentive. What more can I say.
Manager Response: Hi Sharon:  Thanks for your repeat business, and thank you for your headline "Great value and clean", it says it all.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps during the upcoming holidays ^_^.

Summary: Great clean hotel!  We would highly recommend this property to anyone.  Very convenient to everything.  Great lighting and quiet.  Staff was very nice  and professional.  They did have breakfast too.  Will come back again
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review and for your review score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback "Great clean hotel! We would highly recommend this property to anyone."  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: The hotel was quaint,clean with accomadating staff.  The location was perfect.  !5 minutes from the aquatic center for the Masters Long Coarse Nationals Meet and walking distance to several restaurants.  The pool was relaxing and the room quiet and clean.  Not knowing our way around, we ubered everywhere and really enjoyed our visit.
Manager Response: Hi Lawrence:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "The hotel was quaint, clean....The location was perfect."  We were happy to read that you "really enjoyed" you visit ^_^.  BTW, regarding location we have received a lot of positive guest feedback on the restaurants across the street at the Five Lagunas Mall, especially Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, and Rubys.  Lawrence, we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great bargain with lovely rooms and garden.
Summary: A great bargain with lovely renovated rooms. with plush carpets and comfortable bed. Get a garden view room and look out at lovely gardens instead of the parking lots. Friendly staff and a nice continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello Denise: Thank you for staying with us, and thanks so much for your headline "Great bargain with loverly rooms and garden". We just recently completed the remodeling of all of our Garden Rooms ^_^.  We also want to thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5.  Please come back again soon.

Summary: We stayed here when we were in the area for a concert this past spring. Our room was nice and quiet. We had complimentary breakfast, which was nice but not a lot of variety. There was a beautiful pool and hot tub we got to enjoy solo in the morning. Thereâ€™s also a sauna and if I remember a gym too. The landscaping is also very pretty with several little benches and tons of flowers. It reminds me of an English countryside. It was within a short walking distance to shops and some restaurants. Great service from the staff and Iâ€™d definitely stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Heidi: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Great service....I'd definitely stay again...".  Yes, the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street.  We have received very positive comments from guests on Kings Fish House, Rubys, and In-N-Out Burger ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great location but time for an update
Summary: Have stayed here twice before.  The location is great.  Walking distance to a Starbucks and Mothers Market (which is like a mini-whole foods, but great if you like to eat healthy or if you are vegan/vegetarian), many restaurants.  Right off the freeways too and fast access to Laguna or wherever you are going so good for business travel.  Those are all great.  People who work there are very nice, too.  Cons are the room I had was very tired.  Stains everywhere, with visible wear and tear from decades, and just ready for a redo.  The atmosphere was a bit strange too this time, seems like people live here, which was awkward when I was just there a couple days for business.  There were rooms with other people coming and going (sounded like family).  They were quiet at night so no
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback.  Yes, we have a great location just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall and a short drive to Laguna Beach and Disneyland.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive on several local restaurants: Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, Rubys, Chick-fil-A, and BJs.  Regarding a "redo" please consider one of our Garden Rooms, all remodeled during the last two years.  Our oldest room was last remodeled in 2009 and is scheduled for a redo in 2020.  We do appreciate your feedback, thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Great place to stay! Nice and clean, great price! Big thanks to Charlie for making our experience on that next level! Also there are plenty of restaurants around if you want to go out also one of my favorite stores Total wine!!
Manager Response: Hello Jimmy: Thank you for your review and for your recognition of Charlie, he does a great job.  We appreciate your feedback "...clean, great place!"  We like Total Wine too.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive on Chick-fil-A, In-N-Out Burger, BJs and Kings Fish House - lots of fun choices.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future ^_^.

Summary: I live in the area and this hotel always looks so inviting. Itâ€™s in a busy part of town but always unavailable or costly. I got lucky and for a few dollars more than the Bates motel I stayed in just a few blocks away, I felt like I won the Lottery! There were two desk clerks on duty at 3pm when it was not busy. Myla was friendly and helpful. She explained the pre-authorization  policy in detail so I knew what to expect. She also upgraded my room for free.  The room was in the same building as the breakfast room and facing away from the direct sunshine in the afternoon. I never had to use the room a/c. I was also able to see my car from my room window. I have a UV flashlight and I found the room and furnishings to be spotless. 6 pillows in actual linen covers, and the bed was
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and rating of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your comment "I have a UV flashlight and I found the room and furnishings to be spotless".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  BTW, since you live in the area we thought you would like to know that we have owned the Lodge since 1972, love the area ^_^.

Summary: This property offers comfortable and clean rooms in a central location.  The staff is very friendly and that is the reason we come back. The hotel is surprisingly quiet, even though it is just off the main road. The grounds are pleasant and breakfast is adequate. A very good value for the area.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...clean rooms....central location....staff is very friendly...".  These three observations you made are the main reasons the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence for eight years in a row.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: The Laguna Hills Lodge is a great alternative to pricey places in nearby Laguna Beach.  A little older, but very charming and very clean.  Extremely comfortable beds!  The hotel staff was very friendly and welcoming, and the continental breakfast offered a nice selection of bagels, croissants, etc. along with hard boiled eggs, fresh fruit and yogurt.  We will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Hi Marilyn:  Thanks so much for your review rating of 5 out of 5!  We are a short drive to Laguna Beach, and we do not have the beachfront prices.  "Clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews, "friendly staff" is #2.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Wonderful place to stay, good price, nice grounds and quiet. Breakfast was good too, I would recommend a chair on balcony to enjoy the beautiful weather.  Great location with lots of restaurants nearby
Manager Response: Hi Diane: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your comments "Wonderful place to stay ...quiet...Great location".  BTW, regarding your comment on lots of restaurants nearby, we have received a lot of positive feedback from guests on Kings Fish House, BJs, In-N-Out Burger, and Chick-fil-A.  Thanks for staying with us ^_^.  Please come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Fourth Time Staying Here - Still Best Place for the Price
Summary: When my husband and I come for Pageant of the Masters, we always stay here.  I've looked at other options but this place always stands out as the most comfortable, convenient and affordable place in the whole Laguna area.  Jim at the front desk is always courteous and welcoming.  We always get a King Garden View room which has a small balcony, fridge and microwave. The room is nicely decorated, with plantation shutters, an upgraded shower, and sitting area.  The grounds are nicely landscaped, giving the lodge a secluded feel even though there is a shopping center just across the street.  We'll likely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and comments "...this place stands out as the most comfortble, convenient and affordable place in the whole Laguna area." We appreciate all of the detail in your review.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Enjoy your summer ^_^.

Summary: Our room looked over the busy road (from the freeway off ramp) at the front of the hotel, so we asked and were allowed to change, which was very nice of the reception staff.  (We looked at 2 other rooms but could not tell the difference between the upgraded and non-upgraded rooms.)  Our upstairs room had a window that opened but no balcony, in Building C, which had a lift and overlooked the car park on the opposite side of hotel. A pool, spa, gym and laundry were available on the premises, as well as a selection of continental breakfast choices. Room was cleaned daily and coffee (but not toiletries) refreshed. A car is definitely needed in the area to get to the beaches, Laguna festival events, or Irvine Spectrum Mall, but we found the hotel reasonably priced for high season and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and headline "Friendly helpful staff".  Yes, we do have a central location for travel in OC ^_^.  We are across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall, and a short drive to Laguna Beach and Disneyland.  At this time of year the Laguna Arts Festival is very popular with our guests.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Clean, Well Maintained, Friendly and Comfortable!
Summary: If you want something other than the generic chain hotel, this place is perfect. The staff are super friendly and accommodating, the rooms are very clean & spacious, the beds are really comfortable and the grounds are pretty and well-maintained. Sure, it's not brand-new, but it's charming! The rates are good for the area, and it's conveniently located for restaurants, shops, and medical facilities. The only slight detraction was the continental breakfast - the room was small and crowded. But clean! We would definitely come back to stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Cindy: We appreciate your review and all of the details in your feedback.  Your headline is a good summary "Clean, Well Maintained, Friendly and Comfortable!"  Your comment about location is well taken as we have a lot of guests that use us as a headquarters and take day trips north to Disneyland, west to Laguna Beach, and south to San Diego.  We also receive positive feedback about the restaurants across the street (BJs, In-N-Out Burger, Kings Fish House, and CPK).  Cindy, thanks for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Repeat customer to this great value near Laguna Woods. Clean, comfortable, friendly service. Love this place! Good for families or the lone visitor. Plenty of services and eateries within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your repeat business!  We appreciate your comments "Clean, comfortable, friendly service.  Love this place!".  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we have received in over 5,000 on line guest reviews.  You are right about the eateries across the street at the Five Lagunas Mall - BTW, guest feedback is really positive about Kings Fish House, BJs, and In-N-Out Burger.  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Great position if you are visiting Disneyland
Summary: We chose this hotel because of the position! We need an hotel very cose to Disneyland park and we got this. We arrived late (around 11pm) and the man at the desk was very kind. The breakfast was included and was mostly continental. Good room, clean and quite. The hotel is not in a central position but it wasn't what we were looking for. Maybe for this reason it could be less expensive.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...very close to Disneyland....clean and quiet."  You are right we do have a great location across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall and a short drive to Disneyland and Laguna Beach.  BTW, guest feedback on the restaurants across the street is very positive on Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, Rubys, and BJs.  Please visit us again soon, enjoy your summer ^_^.

Summary Heading: Good location but not much else
Summary: The good..... the location is good within walking and easy driving distance to many restaurants. However, the room was dark due to all the overgrown trees and smelled very musty and damp. The carpeted floor was atrocious, being very dirty. When I showered in the morning (and my shoes were off only in the room), the shower basin ran black from the dirt on the bottom of my feet... yuck!! The morning breakfast was one of the worst continental breakfasts ever, with very limited options. The only saving grace is the room rate was low and the front desk was personable.
Manager Response: Hello Duane: Thanks for your review.  We appreciate your feedback on the carpet in your room and I will personally check it out.  I want you to know that we vacuum daily, and shampoo quarterly or as needed.  Regarding our free continental breakfast we offer our guests a large variety of items to appeal to as many people as possible.  Here is a brief summary of items: Muffins (3 choices), pastries (3 flavors) toast / bagesl (5 selections) cereal / oatmeal (7 choices) yogurts (3 flavors), fresh fruit (2 choices) plus fruit cups. Thank you again for your review and for staying with us.

Summary: I have been going there for years mostly for family reunions don't want to stay anywhere else they're always more than hospitable and Charlie that works at the front desk is always very helpful with anything I may need help with and of course the Beautiful garden views that makes it 100% done deal not too many places have a garden View such as this I will always stay there
Manager Response: Hi Voyager: Thanks for your comments on Charlie ^_^, and our beautiful garden. BTW, we have 350 varieties of roses on the property, 450 rose bushes overall plus 80 clematis / bougainviella.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Front Desk:  Personable, Helpful, Accommodating, Friendly and Efficient. Complimentary Morning Breakfast:  Clean, Nice Service, Great Coffee and everything you need to start the day. Pool/Spa: Fun, Fun, Fun.  Clean, Lots of Towels and plenty of snack machines. Parking: Outside your room, quiet and always felt safe Sleeping Room: Good, all we needed for a 3-Night stay and we would not hesitate to stay much longer.  AC in room was excellent, TV functioned perfectly and the beds are very comfortable (pillows a bit hard so bring your own if you are particular).  Also,  extra blankets available from Front Desk.
Manager Response: Hi Jana:  Thank you for your headline "We love this place!".  We appreciate your feedback "....clean...friendly...quiet and always felt safe".  Nice summary by each department of the hotel.  Let me pick up on your comment about "safe", let me add that the Laguna Hills Police Department is next door.  Thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Super experience. Staff was excellent and the room was super comfortable. To be an older property it was very well kept. The only issue was the room we had had a handicap shower that water would pool. The location is within walking distance of everything you need or just a short drive. It also was close to the 5 freeway. Will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello James: Thanks so much for your review and the title of review "Wonderful Property!"  We appreciate your recommendation "Will definitely stay there again!"  Thank you for the heads-up on your shower, I will look into it.  BTW, regarding location we have received very positive guest feedback on several restaurants across the street, especially Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, and Rubys.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: The Laguna Hills Lodge is a cute hotel with great location. The customer service staff (Mario, night auditor/Front Desk). Everyone was very accommodating as we had our grandsons with us, and that they are of the age of not sleeping in the same bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for your feedback "Great location and service!"  FYI, we get a lot of European guests that use us as a headquarters and take day trips north to Disneyland, West to Laguna Beach, and south to San Diego.  It also helps to have the Five Lagunas Mall just across the street ^_^.  Thank you for your business.  Please come back again soon.

Summary: Laguna Hills Lodge was very accommodating from the time of booking. Some rooms are a bit outdated but the location and service of this hotel is excellent. The pool area was fantastic and we were 20 minutes from several beaches.  Mario was excellent and the service at the hotel was awesome! Would definitely return.  Really accommodating in all of our needs as a family.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing Mario, and for your comments"...the service at the hotel was awesome! Would definitely return".  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future ^_^.  Enjoy your summer.

Summary: We have used this hotel for the last fifteen years every July.  It's terrific and the staff is wonderful.  Clean, convenient, and reasonable price.  Excellent access to Laguna Beach and Disneyland. there are terrific resteraunts nearby.  the garden rooms are the best and they offer a nice breakfast.
Manager Response: As a family owned business we thank you for all of your business over the last fifteen years!!!  Thanks for recognizing our staff with your comment "....the staff is wonderful.".  We are very fortunate to have a staff that has been with us for many years, they really make a difference.  This year is the 39th year for our housekeeping manager ^_^. You mentioned "clean...", she is a big reason "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews.  We appreciate all of your observations in this review but wanted to single out "...the staff is wonderful".

Summary: We were very pleased with our stay. Hotel staff is always very professional, room was clean and comfortable, the outdoor pool area was very inviting, and the breakfast choices were good. For the cost and location compared to other hotels in the area, you canâ€™t beat the Laguna Hills Lodge. We have stayed here a few times before and we have never been disappointed.
Manager Response: Hi Angel fan ^_^:  Thanks so much for your review, and thank you for your feedback "Hotel staff is always very professional, room was clean and comfortable,...".  We appreciate your comments on value (cost and location) too.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive on Kings Fish House, BJs, Rubys and In-N-Out Burger located across the street from the Lodge.  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Clean, comfortable beds, pool and spa are great. Mario has great customer service, and friendly. I recommend this hotel the price is great and affordable. They also have breakfast in the morning and it's included in your nightly rate. francin L
Manager Response: Hi Frannie: Thank you for your review and comments "Clean, comfortable beds....Mario has great customer service."  Also, thanks so much for your recommendation!  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  Please visit us again soon, enjoy your summer.

Summary: We stayed one night at the Laguna Hills Lodge and loved it.  Old school road side type motel that has been well maintained and kept its charm despite new buildings popping up all around it.  Cute pool, hot tub and a small gym (that I couldâ€™ve/shouldâ€™ve/didnâ€™t use!).   Breakfast included (simple but filling).  Very nice staff, proprietor - welcoming at check-in, smiling at check-out.  Would stay again!
Manager Response: Hi BeerVenturer:  Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review, and thank you for your rating of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback "...loved it.....Very nice staff....Would stay again!".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: Would definitely stay here again.  Nice breakfast, beautiful property, great pool, close to shops and restaurants.  I arrived early and I didn't mind waiting but they shuffled some guests around and found me a room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and comments "Would definitely stay here again....close to shops and restaurants".  The Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street and our guests give us really positive feedback on Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, Rubys, and Chick-fil-A ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: An older property showing its age in common areas but with updated rooms
Summary: Hallway carpet old and dirty looking; external concrete stairwell and elevator also show age. Ice machine outside and downstairs was old and not efficient - could not produce enough ice to fill bucket after someone else used it before me.  Nice remodeled room but below average bed and bedding (old and threadbare sheets; blanket thin, pilled and worn). Very thin walls and ceiling: could hear people in adjacent rooms PLUS heard someone stomping across the ceiling FOR HOURS at night, very difficult to sleep. Water pressure in shower was ok.  Free breakfast but few options and very basic, coffee not good (fortunately there was a Starbucks nearby). On-site parking tight but free; located near Irvine Spectrum and lots of places to eat.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  As a reader of this review let me provide a few facts: The oldest hallway carpet at the Lodge is three years old; our elevator was refurbished in 2018; and regarding breakfast here is a brief list of  options: Muffins (3 flavors), danish (3 flavors), toast / bagels (5 selections), cereals / oatmeal (7 choices), fresh fruit (2 types) plus fruit cups, yougut (3 flavors), and much more.

Summary: Great suite room, large living room when you walk in. Great for a big family and close to many great food spots! You can also ask for an extension til 11:30. Great staff and very friendly! Worth the stay
Manager Response: Hi Yasser: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Great staff ...Worth the stay".  To your point about "food spots!", the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street, BTW guest feedback is very positive on: Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, BJs, Rubys, and Chick-fil-A.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business ^_^.

Summary: We lived in aliso for almost 10 years and I come back once a month for business and our family has always stayed here. Even when our a/c went out at our house we came here to the pool with the kids to cool off. We love it here :)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review, and for your repeat business! We were glad to read that you are making good use of our pool, it was remodeled last year.  BTW, kids really like lunch from CPK, In-N-Out Burger, and Chick-fil-A - all close by ^_^.  I will share your headline with my team "I love Laguna Hills Lodge".

Summary: My brother and his wife and my wife and I booked 2 rooms, and were completely satisfied with every aspect of the experience.  The rooms were spacious and well appointed, very comfortable. The continental breakfast was more expansive than expected. Burt what we kept commenting on were the beautiful gardens covering the property which gave such a warm feeling.  There are old-growth bougainvillea everywhere - completely surrounding the upper level balconies on one side and trained to grow far up many trees on the site.  Walking the Lodge's pathways was a real delight!
Manager Response: Hi FJP: Thanks so much for your review, and 5 out of 5 rating.  We appreciate your recommendation "Highly recommended..." ^_^.  Regarding our gardens we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall; plus 80 bougainvillea / clematis.  Spring and Summer are great times to see the flowers. Loved your comment "Walking the Lodge's pathways was a real delight!"  Please come back soon.

Summary: Laguna Hills Lodge is clean, reasonable and has a friendly staff!  The free breakfast is a delicious bonus.  It is close to the airport, freeway and many local restaurants. We have stayed here 5 times and will choose it again!
Manager Response: Hi Jaccoloh: Thanks for your repeat business, 5 star review, and feedback "...clean....friendly...close to many local restaurants."  BTW, guest feedback is very positive on Kings Fish House, BJs, In-N-Out Burger, and Rubys at the Five Lagunas Mall just across the street.  As a family owned business we appreciate you staying with us, please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: The best lodge at Laguna Hills, CA
Summary: This was my first time I visited this hotel. I had a great experience, all services are good. The pool is clean and has warm water, also this place has a great location, you can found a lot of services near to the hotel: restaurants, shopping malls, entertainment, pharmacy,etc.  The rooms are comfortable, and have TV, air conditioner and WIFI.  If you come to Laguna Hills, I recommend you "Laguna Hills Lodge".
Manager Response: Hi Sandy: Thanks for staying with us and thank you for your recommendation ^_^.  We really do have a great location, across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall and a short drive to Disneyland or Laguna Beach.  BTW, guest feedback is very positive about Kings Fish House, In-N-Out Burger, Rubys and BJs at the mall.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: Visiting friends in nearby Laguna Woods and stayed at this hotel.  Although a little dated, hotel rooms were clean and well maintained.  Front desk staff were mostly friendly and helpful (One young woman manning the front desk wasn't very helpful in giving/providing directions to a nearby store.)  Check-in and -out were easy.  Price was as advertised.  Breakfast was OK - no hot food other than toasted breads.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and headline "Clean and Reasonable". "Clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews.  We were happy to read your check-in and check-out were easy.  You are right about breakfast, it is a Continental Breakfast with "no hot food other than toasted breads".  Our thinking is to offer a large selection of breakfast items (i.e.: muffins 3 choices, danish, 3 flavors, cereals / oatmeal 7 varieties, breads / bagels 5 choices, etc.) so everyone has something that they like. Should you wish a full hot breakfast we can recomment Chick-fil-A next door or Ruby's at the mall across the street.  Thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Great choice for lodging for this area
Summary: We had a very comfortable stay.  Rooms were clean.  Pool area provided plenty of sitting space both in shade and sun.  Was cleaned on a very regular basis.  Breakfasts were good.  Highlight of hotel is the excellent and friendly service from the front desk.  Helped us find hiking in the area and printed out maps.  Seemed genuinely interested in meeting our needs.  Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Hello Carmela: Thanks for taking the time to post a review score of 5 out of 5, and for your recommendation "Will definitely return".  We appreciate your comments about "clean" rooms and "freindly servcie fromt he front desk".  We look forward to your next visit.  As a family owned business we thank you for your busienss!

Summary: Laguna Hills Lodge was convenient for my needs. Check in/out was easy and no hassle. No surprise fees. It was exactly as agreed. The room was clean and comfortable as well as quiet. It was nice for a change to stay in a room that had thick enough walls that you didn't hear every word from neighboring rooms. I will certainly consider Laguna Hills Lodge again in the future. I didn't get a chance to try the Finnish Sauna....next time.
Manager Response: Hi Andrea:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "The room was clean and comfortable as well as quiet". BTW, the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence for nine years in a row ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business! Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Very nice and clean, renovated. Super friendly front desk. Nice pool area, good breakfast. Looks cute from outside and the garden is full of flowers. We went there for a family reunion and everyone enjoyed the place.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a review and for your score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your comment "Very nice and clean, renovated".  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews, "friendly" is #2 ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Everything was nice and clean, Mario at the front desk was very helpful, nice guy, big selection of breakfast . Clean pool and jacuzzi. Very pleased....!!! I recommend the lodge At laguna Hills 100% For any occasion or just because,ðŸ˜œ this is the place!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review and for your recommendation "I recommend the Lodge at Laguna Hills 100%".  We will pass on your feedback about Mario, he does a great job ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Everyone was very professional, the room was clean the bed was fresh and comfy, also the breakfast included is one of the better ones I have experienced for this level Hotel, just steps away from our room there were Chick-Fil-a as well as In-N-Out and other great places to get some grub! ðŸ‘ðŸ˜Ž
Manager Response: Hi Phil: Thanks so much for your review and score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your feedback "Everyone was very professional, the room was clean..." and restaurants were close by.  In addition to your comment on Chick-fil-A and In-N-Out burger let me say that we receive positive comments from guests on Kings Fish House and BJs at the Five Lagunas Mall just across the street.  As a family owned business we would like to thank you for your business, please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: This hotel is a gem!! It was just gorgeous!! Friendly staff, quick check in and check out, and clean rooms. The grounds are kept beautifully with lovely roses, variety of flowers and bougainvillea.The pool are was very clean, the pool lounge chairs were very nice and comfortable. The hot tub was in working order and at a comfortable temperature. They also have an exercise room and  dry sauna. Breakfast area was nice and they had a nice variety. The hotel is located in a convenient spot, close to a Starbucks and a few other stores. My husband and I had a very nice stay. We definitely plan to stay again... This was one of the beautiful and clean hotels we've been to.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "This hotel is a gem!! Friendly staff....clean rooms....The grounds are kept beautifully...Breakfast...had a nice variety.".  BTW, we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 bougainvillea / clematis. We were glad you had a pleasant stay and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for your business!  Enjoy the Memorial Day Holiday Weekend ^_^.

Summary: We have stayed here several times, and have always been impressed with the friendly staff and the cleanliness and well maintained rooms and grounds. Quiet and convenient to many things to do and not all that far from the beach. Walking distance to an In-n-out burger, and the Laguna Hills Mall. Stay here, you won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Many thanks for taking the time to post a review and your feedback "Good VAlue, Friendly Staff".  BTW, to your point about location, guest feedback is very positive about In-N-Out burger, Kings Fish House, Ruby's, and Chick-fil-A - lots of nice restaurant choices.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: I stayed only one night on my visit to Orange County, CA.  The front desk Staff were very accommodating.  I was in the heated pool at 7:30 a.m. the next morning for a swim.  The room was clean and had many amenities.  Rates vary between Winter and Summer.  I was able to still have the Winter rate.  I would recommend this Inn for convenience and friendliness.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and recommendation.  We appreciate your comments "The front desk staff were very accommodating....The room was clean...". BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews, "friendly staff" is #2 ^_^.  Thanks for staying with us, we look forward to your next visit.  Enjoy the upcoming Memorial Day holiday.

Summary: We booked this hotel for one night and paid extra to have a quiet room overlooking the small garden.  Everything in the room was clean and worked well.  We stayed in block 2 on the first floor which did not have an elevator.  We think other blocks of the hotel might have elevators.  Breakfast was served in block 3 and was basic but sufficient for us.  Our only small complaint was that the light outside the bathroom is movement sensitive so if you go to the bathroom at night the light comes on.  While this is an interesting safety feature, it is apt to disturb the other occupier who may be trying to sleep.  When we mentioned this point, it seems we were not the only ones to have raised it with management.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and comments "Well situated, good value hotel".  Regarding our location we do receive a lot of positive feedback from guests about all of the restaurants at the Five Lagunas Mall, just across the street.  BTW, Kings Fish House, BJs and Rubys get high marks from our customers.  We appreciate your comment about the sensor light in the bath area.  Many guests like the safety feature and environmental benefits, others find it will disturb another member of their party.  We have found that you need a light to see where you are going, sensor operated or manual, so overall the sensor is a plus.  Thanks for your heads-up, we appreciate your feedback and we thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Our constant go-to lodging for the past several years has been the Laguna Hills Lodge.  We have been impressed with the friendly and professional staff both on the phone as well as "live" at the front desk. Our favorite room is located in the Garden View area and have found it to be pleasant and clean even prior to check-in time. A nice variety of light breakfast items are part of the package. A shopping mall is within walking distance and the location is in close proximity to the popular beach towns of Newport and Laguna Beach. It will be difficult to beat the value of this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of the deail in your review, and thank you for your repeat business!  We appreciate your feedback "....friendly....clean....shopping mall is within walking distance....".  BTW, guest feedback is really positive about Kings Fish House and Rubys at the Five Lagunas Mall across the street ^_^.  We were happy to read that we are you "go-to lodging".  We look forward to your next visit, enjoy the Memorial Day Holiday, there is a 5K in Laguna Hills to celebrate our military.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 5 nights at the end of April. I knew of this place because 10 years before I had stayed there with my best friend. Overall itâ€™s a great resort. It has a bare minimum continental breakfast, which is fine with us because we just needed the bare minimum. The bed was super comfortable. You can see that the rooms did have some wear and tear and itâ€™s slight dated. The only downside was the there were no plugs or usb plug in for phones and what not ( first world problem, I know). Also this motel is located right off the highway, so you are in the middle of the action. Overall, if I do ever plan to come back to southern Cali, this is where I would stay.
Manager Response: Hi Kim: Thanks so much for your review and all of the detail in your feedback.  We loved your headline "Overall a great place" and your ending comment "....this is where I would stay".  We will take a look at the number of plugs / uxb ports, thanks for your heads-up.  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business, safe travels ^_^.

Summary: We stay 2 weekend nights and were very pleased. We stayed in the B building and found the room to be of generous size and very clean. We loved the shower. There were many choices for the continental breakfast.  Kevin was quite helpful when checking in and solved a problem quickly when I needed assistance with the pop machine. We liked it so much we plan to stay there when we come back in June.
Manager Response: Hi Cathy:  Thank you for your review and comments "We liked it so much we plan to stay there when we come back in June".  Thanks for your feedback on Kevin "quite helpful" ^_^.  As a family owned busienss we thank you for your business!  We look forwared to seeing you again in June.

Summary: We have stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge before and was not disappointed on our second visit. Check in was easy and the staff were very helpful. Our room was great and spacious, our only complaint was the sound of the water that started around 7.30 - 8am each morning. Other than that no other complaints. Breakfast that was offered was adequate for our needs and would happily stay here again as the location for getting around  without being in LA is great.
Manager Response: Hello Juan: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Check-in was easy and the staff were very helpful.  Our room was great and spacious....".  We appreciate your repeat business! Thanks for your observation on the sprinklers ^_^, we are following the department of water and power guidelines on running sprinklers.  We wish we could run them later but the DWP says due to evaporation they recommend early morning watering. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Convenient location, good prices.  Generous continental breakfast.  Easy access to freeway and shopping centers.  Rooms are clean and good size.  Will stay again when we come back to the area again.  Less expensive than a couple of nearby motels.
Manager Response: Hello Derek: Thanks so much for your review and all of your detail in just a few sentences.  We appreciate your comments "Rooms are clean and good size.  Will stay again...".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future ^_^.

Summary: Outdoors was incredibly nice and the employees were very kind however the room smelled like pee alot,and the carpet was disgusting. They need to remodel the rooms because even though the outside was nice the inside was gross. I'm not sure I'd stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Alex: Thanks so much for your review.  We appreciate your feedback.  It is not acceptable that there was an odor in your room.  Please call our Front Desk and we will immediately check the room out and relocate you.  BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews so please be assured that we watch got any issues with rooms carefully.  Please try one of our Garden Rooms, all have been remodeled during the last two years.  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed for a few nights at the Laguna Hills Lodge. Nothing fancy, but clean rooms with hot water and well located. Lots of places to eat nearby and shopping areas. They are motel style where the rooms directly open to the outside. The reception can be a lot friendlier and can smile while interacting with customers. Check in and check out is pretty smooth but front desk have not much idea about any tourist attractions nearby you ask them about, with monosyllabic answers of yes or no without a smile. Breakfast is nothing fancy, just basic bread, eggs, muffins, fruit but does the job.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...clean rooms....well located".  Yes, most of our first floor rooms face outside so you can park close to your room.  Our second and third floor rooms face inside to a central hallway.  Guest feedback is very positive about the Five Lagunas Mall, just across the street.  You are right about "Lots of places to eat...", BTW guest feedback is that they really like Kings Fish House,  BJs and CPK ^_^.  We also appreciate your comments about our front desk, I will look into "friendly", thank you.

Summary: First let's be clear - this is a motel style place, meaning rooms that open out to the "outside" rather than a hotel.  That said, the owners clearly put a lot of effort into making this a really nice place to stay and the grounds and rooms certainly aren't like your typical motel.  We struggled to find anywhere cost effective to stay in the LA area but this place was perfect for us. Really good value for the area and located in a relatively quiet and safe area, close to the upmarket Orange county beach towns.  Our room was very clean and comfortable and we appreciated having a fridge and Microwave. We all enjoyed the pool and the hot tub was maybe the hottest I've ever used.  There's a Starbucks and some restaurants just over the road and it's a few minutes from the freeway into
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate all of the detial in your feedback, including "Our room was very clean and comfortable....I would definitely recommend it to families".  As a family owned busienss we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Iâ€™ve stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge many times over the years while doing business in Orange County, or visiting my mother, who lives in Laguna Woods. Every time Iâ€™ve been delighted with my stay. The hotel has such a sweet charm and it is refreshing to see flowers and greenery in the middle of a shopping district. The rooms are clean and basic. Everything works. Front desk staff are super nice and even remember me between stays (often years apart.) I live in LA and have often considered coming down to the Laguna Woods Lodge just to chill in a reasonably-priced and comfortable setting, Cant go wrong with this one.
Manager Response: Hi Kathy:  Thanks so much for your review and for staying with us so many times over the years.  We appreciate your comments "Every time I've been delighted with my stay...rooms are clean....Front desk staff are super nice...".  Thank you for your business, we look forward to your next visit - safe travels.

Summary: Had an appointment, I didn't want to spend :90 in morning traffic. I searched the day before, easily selected the Laguna Hills Lodge based on 1. reviews, and 2. location. It is in a busy area, yet noise or safety was never a problem. Staff were good to great. The room was very comfortable and clean. I didn't use the pool, but the jacuzzi was great... and large.  I used AARP Expedia, paid under $100 total for my one night stay. Prices are reasonable without 'discounts'.   The planted grounds are small, but clean, and very well tended. There are hundreds of flowers, including roses. Staff said they'll be in beautiful bloom soon, but there were enough for me to take some great photos. Don't be afraid to step over the low hedge to walk on the small lawn (I asked). There are even
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and all of the detail in your comments.  Your summary of the reasons you chose (1. Reviews, and 2. Location) plus your comments "The staff was good to great" are greatly appreciated - thank you.  I will share your review with my team. As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Hi We stayed here from a short drive from Palm Springs and Laguna beach was start of our pacific coast highway trip! It was a great way to start our trip as easy location away from beach as way too expensive to stay in Laguna. The check-in, rooms, parking and breakfast were great for our overnight spot. Easy access to groceries, gas and drinks as well within 5 minutes. Beautifully kept grounds and staff and Iâ€™ll be back! Cheers  Kelly
Manager Response: Hello Shaggie: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "The check-in, rooms, parking, and breakfast were great".  We were delighted to read that you will "be back!".  Thanks you for staying with us ^_^.

Summary: The room is spacious and clean. Since the room rate is not high I wasn't expecting much about the breakfast. It turned out the breakfast is actually good! It's continental breakfast but it includes qulity cereal, boiled eggs, and fruit yogurts. In general, the price performance of this place is great!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "The room is spacious and clean...The price...is great!"  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: We stayed 1 night on way to San Diego warm welcome in reception room was large and clean had microwave etc . Ideal for families. Your in for a treat with breakfast so much choice and service excellent. This is a gem and we will be back
Manager Response: Hi Elliot and Jules: Thanks for taking the time to post a review and your feedback "...warm welcome in reception room was large and clean.....Ideal for families."  We were delighted to read that you will "be back".  Thank you for your business!

Summary: I have stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge several times now, and I have always enjoyed good experiences. The rooms are spacious and clean. The staff behind the counter and the housekeepers are always friendly and ready to help. The free breakfast is nice too! I would recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Hi Tony: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...I have always enjoyed a good experience.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  The staff....friendly and ready to help."  We sincerely appreciate your repeat business and your recommendation!.  Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: We have been staying in this place for several years. It is great value for the money. Big rooms, clean, good breakfast, free parking, etc, etc  We are planning to stay one week in April and wanted management to know that we noticed that the last time we visited the breakfast buffet no longer included Kirkland red grapefruit prepackaged. It was always the highlight of the visit and we hope they will rethink and start providing again.   Of course we still enjoy the bagels, granola, bananas, yoghurt, etc. Great job!!!.
Manager Response: Hi Randy: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "It is a great value...Big rooms, good breakfast, free parking...".  We also appreciate your input into our breakfast items and will take another look at Kirkland red grapefruit.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business over many years!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: We love it here!  Clean, quiet and a very accommodating staff. Free breakfast was really good. Itâ€™s continental style but has everything but hot food. The price is very reasonable and you get a lot for the money. Itâ€™s location is central to restaurants, shopping and more. Very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and all of the detail in your feedback "Clean. quiet, and very accomodating staff".  We were happy to read that you liked our Continental Breakfast, and our location just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: My wife and I visited the Laguna hills lodge from the 6th to the 13th March for a one week stay. We were in California for our Sons wedding and a short break. When booking we were just looking for somewhere cheap to stay as the experience of the wedding didnâ€™t leave us with much for lavish accommodation. But to our delight when we arrived at the Laguna Hills Lodge, it was a beautiful place, clean, tidy with lovely grounds. Very friendly staff made us feel very welcome. The breakfast was always very nice, we didnâ€™t have a cooked breakfast, but didnâ€™t miss it. Also a few good bar/restaurants are located very near. We will most certainly be returning to the Laguna Hills Lodge on our next visit. Well done guys.
Manager Response: Hi Paul: Thanks so much for your review and comments "...to our delight when we arrived at the Laguna Hills Lodge, it was a beautiful place, clean, tidy with lovely grounds.  Very friendly staff...".  Congratulations on your son's wedding!!  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit ^_^.  BTW, Happy Saint Patrick's Day.

Summary: This place is well maintained. Rooms are old fashioned but clean. Service is very friendly. Breakfast is ok, continental style. The one thing that was a bit of a bummer was that the gym room isnâ€™t open before 7:00 am. Itâ€™s also a bit limited and has no free weights. I couldnâ€™t use the pool, but the area looked nice.
Manager Response: Hi Maureen: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "This place is well maintained...Service is very friendly."  We appreciate your score of 4 out of 5.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back! The staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room was neat and clean and quiet and the bed was very comfy. Parking was free and convenient. Continental breakfast was very good. The location is great too, plenty of shopping and restaurant choices nearby.
Manager Response: Hi jsbarretta: Thanks so much for your review and all of the details in your feedback.  We appreciate your comments "The staff was very friendly and helpful.  Our room was neat and clean and quiet and the bed was very comfy".  BTW, the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews is "clean", the #2 compliment is "friendly staff". We were happy to read you "really enjoyed" your stay and "will definitely be back!".  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Price was right, place was decent, breakfast good
Summary: I spent the night while on business.  It was clean, front desk responsive.  Breakfast was good, and lots of parking.  It did have a loud inwall heater/ac unit, so that was a tad disappointing.  It was so loud I couldn't run it while sleeping.  Also very light blanket, it was a cold day, I had to use the bath towels as my extra layer.  Had extra pillows in room, but no extra blanket.
Manager Response: Hi Carolyn:  Thanks so much for your review and feedback "It was clean, front desk responsive.  Breakfast was good..."  We also appreciate your constructive comments about an extra blanket and your heater/AC.  Please don't hesitate to call our Front Desk for an extra blanket or for help adjusting the temperature of your room heater.  Our maintenance team would be happy to fix any noisy heater or replace it with a spare unit.  Thanks again for your feedback and thank you for staying with us. Please come back again soon.

Summary: I have stayed quite a few times over the last eight years and always enjoy it. It is a nice, clean, comfortable hotel in a very convenient location. The rooms are clean and comfortable, the staff is friendly and courteous, the grounds very well maintained and the complimentary breakfast a nice touch.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review.  I will share it with my team.  We appreciate your comments "It is a nice, clean, and comfortable hotel in a very conveneint location."  That one sentence is a great summary ^_^.  We also appreciate your feedback about our staff "friendly".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business over the last eight years!!!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: My GO TO anytime Iâ€™m in Califonia!
Summary: I have stayed here over a dozen times now. I keep returning because of the beautiful grounds, comfortable rooms and the outstanding helpful staff! They have gone above and beyond to make me comfortable and to accommodate my crazy schedule sometimes. Centrally located, close to restaurants, shopping and only a stones throw away from the Irvine Spectrum Center.
Manager Response: Hello Colorado Girl:  Thanks so much for your review and score of 5 out of 5.  We appreciate your comment "I keep returning because of the beautiful grounds, comfortble rooms and the outstanding helpful staff!"  I will share your review with our team.  Thank you for your repeat business, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: They are on top of it! Great experience!
Summary: Our little family booked a last minute 3 night stay and we are so glad we found this gem. Reviews are true, the customer service is exceptional and warm. They take great pride at this property and you can tell- itâ€™s really quite charming. The grounds (rose garden) are impeccable and clean. Originally, we were on the bottom floor in an older (non-renovated) room (but clean!) and the heater wasnâ€™t working. It was late, freezing and raining outside so heat was a must especially with 2 little ones! The maintenance guy arrived as soon as we hung up and quickly informed us that the heater was broken and they would move us to another room. Charlie at the front desk (who is amazing btw!) managed to move upgrade us to a garden view renovated room directly above us. He drove over and gave
Manager Response: Hi Lauryn: Thanks so much for your review, score of 5 out of 5, and comments "...customer service is exceptional and warm". We appreciate all the detail in your feedback and your reference to Charlie.  I will pass on your review to our team.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Cannot say enough about the staff and culture of this hotel.  We ran into an issue and needed a change that was clearly against written policy so we called the hotel to discuss with them.  They were empathetic and understanding and rectified the situation without any need to argue.  This is the sign of an empowered staff and a hotel that values customer experience above all.  We will certainly be back at this gem in the near future.
Manager Response: Hello Gord: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Amazing customer service".  We were very happy to read that you "will certainly be back at this gem in the near future".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Handicap room was easy access, newly renovated and very clean.  Continental breakfast staff very helpful and food variety was good.  I will definitely stay here again.  Despite being a very economical place to stay, it was a well maintained place.
Manager Response: Hi Ginger: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "Handicap room was easy access, newly renovated and very clean".  We were also happy to read that you will "...definitely stay here again".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business. ^_^.

Summary: Slightly older property, but well maintained and updated.  Convenient location to the 5 Freeway and Orange County business sector, nearby food, restaurants, gas, etc. Management is polite and very accommodating.  Beds are comfortable, and all rooms have a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and a room safe for valuables, in good condition.  Overall, a nice property.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and all of the detail in your feedback.  We appreciate your comments "...well maintained...Management polite...Beds are comfortable...nice property".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business! Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Easy access to this hotel that is very much appreciated as dealing with the Orange County traffic.  The ground are pleasant to look at and the buildings are near and clean. Our room has a comfortable bed, a desk with charging point, a chair for lounging. The room had everything that you could want for a reasonably priced hotel.  It may be more than you would expect for the price. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "The room had everything that you could want for a reasonable priced hotel.  It may be more than you would expect...".   As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Glad to read you "will be back!".  We look forward to seeing you soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Unique homey comfortable lodging in todays canned world.
Summary: The whole property was exceptionally well maintained, lovingly maintained. Very comfortable. Has all I wanted in amenities. Everyone of the staff were very pleasant, accomodating, fun to be around and brightened our stay. I had an unfortunate family event which caused me to have to stay for 12 nights. I could not have been happier with this location. The property and grounds are an oasis in the hotel markets in any city.
Manager Response: Hi FSITMAC: Thanks so much for all of the detail in your review and for your score of 5 out of 5!  We appreciate your feedback "Very comfortable...Everyone of the staff were very pleasant, accommodating, fun to be around...".  We loved your comment "The property and grounds are an oasis in the hotel markets in any city."  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Reservation was not there when I arrived
Summary: I arrived late. I said I had a reservation. The office workers did not know. They looked for the reservation under my name and could not find it anywhere. This took about 10 to 15 minutes. I had reserved my room about 12 hours earlier that day. I had called the hotel directly and spoken to a receptionist. Because of this hassle, which I've never had happen before, I'm giving a 2 out of 5.
Manager Response: Hello Ric: Thanks so much for your feedback.  We are sorry that we could not locate a reservation under your name and it took 15 minutes to accomodate you.

Summary: This is a beautiful place to stay. It is clean. Convenient to lots of good places to eat. The staff is friendly and helpful. Less than 10 miles to Laguna Beach. Breakfast is awesome. About 15 different choices of cereal. Fresh breads. Lots of choices- eggs, hot cereal, yogurt eyv. Just great place.
