Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and all the detail your provided.  We appreciate your feedback "This is a beautiful place to stay.  It is clean...Breakfast is awesome." As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  We will share your comments with our team.

Summary: Stayed here for two weeks travelling from the UK. One of the cheaper options for accommodation in the area but rooms were adequate and clean. Small pool area clean and tidy. Breakfast simple but adequate. Free parking on site. Was an ideal spot close to the freeway for my travel plans to visit San clemente, Laguna beach, San Diego, Hollywood and Beverly hills, Santa Monica, huntingdon beach & fashion island for shopping.   Overall, no complaints and would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Midwife44: Thanks so much for your review and comment "Stayed here for two weeks...Overall, no complaints and would stay again".  Thank you for your business! The next time you are traveling form the UK please visit with us  again. Happy New Year ^_^.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in SoCal!
Summary: Room was clean and staff were very kind. Breakfast is included in the stay which was awesome for our kids. Restaurants and retail stores are walking distance! I would definitely stay here again. :) :)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star review and comments "Great place to stay...Room was clean".  We also appreciate your recommendation "I would definitely stay here again.:) :)"  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Happy New Year.

Summary: We arrived early; reception made us welcome and expedited room cleaning.  Breakfast service was friendly and helpful.  Our ground floor room with two queen beds was comfortable and conveniently laid out. The location on Paseo de Valencia was excellent for freeway access and connections to Laguna Beach, San Juan Capistrano, Mission Viejo etc.  We were on the street side but weren't disturbed by traffic, though we did hear sirens a couple of times from the nearby fire station.  We've stayed here many times and have always been satisfied.
Manager Response: Hi CA Tripster: Thanks for your review and feedback "...room comfortable and conveniently laid out.... We've stayed here many times and have always been satisfied." As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business!!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.  Happy New Year.

Summary: The best value I could find in Laguna Hills area. Clean but could use upgrades like TV, carpet,  towels. The best rooms are garden view and cost a little more. The breakfast is basically cereal fruit toast...hard boiled eggs and some packaged pastries. So if you want a full breakfast there are good restaurants all around. The location is great and you can walk to shopping and eating.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "The best value...clean...location is great...". The Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: If you're looking for the Taj Mahal, the Laguna Hills Lodge ain't that. What it is, however, is a very nice, clean, friendly, well-run motor hotel. The front desk staff was very friendly. The room, though not luxurious, was clean and reasonably updated. Flat screen TV with lots of cable channels. The bed was comfy. Breakfast was typical - bagels, toast, cereals,  yogurt, etc., etc., but very good. The grounds were well-kept. Overall, my stay there was terrific, and I would stay there again if in the area. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and feedback "Overall, my stay there was terrific, and I would stay there again...".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business. We appreciate your last comment "Highly recommended".  Please come back again soon, Happy New Year.

Summary: We stayed 4 nights and were very pleased with the rooms.  The staff is very friendly and when we asked to put our rooms together they all tried to make it happen.  I had groceries and an Amazon package delivered and they didnâ€™t give me any problems on receiving my items for me.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and comments "...very pleased with the rooms. The staff is very friendly...". As a family owned business we thank you for your business, and we were happy to read that you had a "Great stay...".  Best wishes to you and your family for a healthy and Happy New Year ^_^.

Summary: For the price, not a bit worth it!  Breakfast is only bread items and cold cereal. We never were Able to sit in breakfast area, packed with guests pretty much all the time. Peeling walls and loud plumbing noise, the noise was so loud and often I believe housekeeping used the room for laundry ect. Small TV. Will not work with you on late checkout. On a good note the bathroom had been updated.
Manager Response: Hi Marti:  Thanks so much for your review.  Regarding our continental breakfast it is free and includes: Muffins (3 selections), pastries (3 flavors) toast / bagels (5 selections) prepared to order, cereal / oatmeal (7 choices), fresh fruit (bananas and oranges) plus fruit cups.  Please let me know which room you were in and I will inspect the wallpaper and noisy plumbing.  Thank you for the heads up on this.  On late check-out we do accomodate guests but with only four hours between check-out (11:00 AM) and check-in (3:00 PM) sometimes we can not accomodate requests. We have been very busy over the holidays.  Thank you for staying with us and thanks again for your feecback.

Summary: Quiet, clean with a very friendly staff. Easy to get to. Continental breakfast and free parking. No add on fees like Anaheim hotels. Lots of restaurants and fast-food within easy walking distance. Not a resort but it was a perfect base for sightseeing.
Manager Response: Hi Richard, thank you so much for your review and for the detials in your feedback.  We appreciate you making the point that we do not have "add on fees", we try to keep things simple.  Loved your opening remarks "Quiet, clean and a very friendly staff" - I will pass on your review to my staff.  As a family owned busienss we appreciate your business, please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: A modest motel with clean, comfortable, though rather tired and dated, rooms. The breakfast was ok, nothing hot provided but plentiful cereals, hard boiled eggs, toast, coffee, etc. Friendly staff. Nothing fancy, but would definitely stay again. Good value.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...would definitely stay again.  Good value." As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  Happy Holidays ^_^.

Summary Heading: Quiet area, excellent firm mattress led to a good nights sleep
Summary: The hotel is located in a quiet area,my room had an excellent firm mattress that lead to a good nights sleep and  they offer a good breakfast to start your day.  The hotel also offers a swimming pool and a suana that is away from the hotel rooms to not disturb the other guests A very good bargain compared with some of the other nearby hotels I have stayed at.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star review and comments "...quiet area....good breakfast to start your day...A very good bargain...".  We also appreciate your feedback on our mattresses, we purchased all new Simmons mattresses for all of our rooms and guest feedback has been very positive.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and great value, too[[[[
Summary: We have stayed here several times and will return again.  Front desk service is very responsive. Rooms are relatively large and well appointed. Grounds are well kept. Pool, spa, and sauna are nicely maintained.  Breakfast buffet is very nice, as well. The hotel is right off of El Toro road and convenient to freeway and local attractions. Discounts are available to visitors to Laguna Woods Village (aka: Leisure World).
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback "We have stayed here several times and will return again.  Rooms are relatively large and well appointed."  Yes, we have a great location a block from the 405 freeway.  The Lodge is just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall.  FYI, guest feedback is very positive on Kings Fish House, BJs and Ruby's at the mall.  Thank you for staying with us, Happy Holidays ^_^.

Summary: My wife and I have stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge every year for, at least, the last 15 years. Judy's mother lives close by. We truly enjoy our stays there. The room we had this year was a garden level room (B122), and it was clean when we arrived and very well spruced up each morning. The garden level rooms cost a bit more, but the view is lovely. The newly installed window shutters are much better than typical room curtains. The staff is diligent and responsive. Nevene, in the office, has been a joy with whom to interact for many years. We love the pool and hot tub. Always clean. The exercise room is small and limited but it is adequate. One critique is to let people know, with a sign, where to get the pool towels. The breakfast that's included is very nice. Typical
Manager Response: Hi Ed: Thanks so much for your review and for staying with us for so many years!!  We appreciate all the detail in your review, including your feedback "The Garden Room ... clean ...view is lovely."  We also appreciate your compliment about Nevine, Front Desk Manager.  Ed, we loved your comment "Did I say how much we've enjoyed the Laguna Hills Lodge?"  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Happy Thanksgiving.

Summary: Laguna Hills lodge has great amenities, the stuff was great. Mario itâ€™s the person that help me the location is good business center room with 2 computers.  The rooms are clear whit comfortable beds the hated swimming pool, jacuzzi and dry sauna is convenenienth away from the rooms
Manager Response: Diego, thanks so much for your review and feedback "...great amenities..." and your comment about Mario helping you with a good location.  The Lodge is close to the Irvine Spectrum business center so we get a lot of business clients.  They like the fact that the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street, and the fact that we are only a block off of the 405 Freeway, easy access.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and hope you had a successful business trip.

Summary: Had a garden view room with small balcony. Not really a garden in my eyes and no balcony furniture (even a couple of chairs would have been nice. Something just a bit depressing about the place, especially the breakfast room (we ate and ran). I do want to say though that the people at reception were just lovely.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "...the people at reception were just lovely".  We were sorry to read that you did not like our garden.  We do have 350 varieties of roses and 450 rose bushes at the Lodge.  It is late in the season so there are not a lot of roses blooming at this time.  We also have 80 bougenvilla / clematis. As a family owned business we do want to thank you for your business!

Summary: This hotel would have been a 5, if the rooms weren't so old and musty. The front desk was friendly, the room was clean, the breakfast better than expected and there were restaurants in walking distance.  The carpets, beds, wall paper and curtains all need to be redone.  The room had a musty smell that they tried to cover up with perfume, but that just made it worse.  I would probably stay again, but I would hesitate to recommend to friends, worried that they might be grossed out by how dated it all was.
Manager Response: Hello BB: Thanks so much for your 4 out of 5 review and feedback "The front desk was friendly, the room was clean, the breakfast better than expected....".  We also appreciate your comments that there are rooms that "...need to be redone".  Our oldest rooms were last remodeled in 2008, our newest rooms - all of our Garden Rooms - were remodeled last year.  Please stop by and ask our Front Desk to show you one of our Garden Rooms, guest feedback is very positive.  FYI, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive on Trip Advisor so I am concerned about your feedback "musty smell".  Please let me know which room you were in and I will check it out.  Thank you again for your feedback and for staying with us!

Summary: This is my first time staying here and it really is a special place!  Quiet and peaceful with a nice pool, sauna, jacuzzi and fitness room.  I stayed by the pool and did my work because it was so comfortable being there!  The rooms are nice and very clean.  There are plenty of places to eat nearby and it is freeway close!
Manager Response: Hi Richard, thanks so much for your review and feedback "...it really is a special place!  Quiet and peaceful...".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future, enjoy your holidays ^_^.

Summary: Mario he is very good, front desk. The room is so beautiful and very clean.  The break fast was great ,a lot of flowers and tree thr swimming pool is heated great, alot of parking i will return soon. Thanks for all.
Manager Response: Hello Ricardo, thank you so much for your review and feedback "The room is so beautiful and very clean. The breakfast was great, a lot of flowers..." We appreciate your feedback about our recently remodeled rooms. all of our Garden Rooms were remodeled last year.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We were happy to read that you had a "Beautiful trip".

Summary Heading: Awesome!! My New Favorite place to stay in the OC.
Summary: I do frequent business trips to the OC and recently discovered this place. Have stayed here a total of 5 days now. It is a gem, the rooms are beautiful, amenities are great, staff are friendly and helpful, pool area is great and it is surrounded by great restaurants all withing walking distance of the Lodge. (BJ's, King Fish, Chick Fila, among others) The gardens are beautiful and well maintained, and value for money can not be beat. My opinion is,  if you stay here you wont regret it.
Manager Response: Hi Johan: Thanks so much for your review and the detail of your feedback.  We appreciate your comments "It is a gem, the rooms are beautiful, amenities are great, staff are friendly...great restaurants all within walking distance...".  As a family owned business we would like to say thank you for your business!  We love your headline "My New Favorite place to stay in the OC." ^_^.

Summary: For the fourth consecutive time we went back to spend a stay Laguna hills lodge. I want to emphasize, the tranquility of the place, the gardens, the feeling of being in family, and the very good attention of all the staff. We feel very comfortable. We have seen how  it constantly deals with maintenance and are conditioning new rooms. Thank you for providing us a good stay. We are returning soon !!!.  Myrna liniado ,Carlos Ini.
Manager Response: Hi Myrna, thanks so much for staying with us and for your review.  We appreciate your feedback "...the tranquility of the place, the gardens, the feeling of being in family, and the very good attention of all the staff".  BTW, there are 350 varieties of roses at the Lodge, 450 rose bushes overall plus 80 bougenvilla / clematis.  One of the keys to our success is our staff, you mentioned "good attention of all the staff".  The average tenure of a staff person at the Lodge is nine years. They know the property and focus on being friendly / "family".  Thank you for your business, we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Nothing spectacular and a bit dated
Summary: Area is fine.  Decent fast food nearby.  When I first entered the building and saw the hallway carpet I thought, "Oh my! I don't believe I will be here for very long."  That being said, I was surprised to find the room in a much nicer, cleaner and updated order.  The beds were comfortable.  The A/C worked well.  The rooms were clean.  Breakfast was sad.  After the first day, I skipped the provided breakfast meal entirely and opted to go someplace to eat a decent meal.  Would I stay again?  Possibly.  Would I consider other places?  Definitely.  All in all, I was able to get a good night's sleep each night, which in my estimation, is the most important factor.
Manager Response: JL: Thanks so much for your review and comments "...A/C worked well...The rooms were clean...good night sleep".  We appreciate you feedback on the hall carpet. FYI the carpet is new in all three buildings, replaced during the last two years.  I suspect what you may be reacting to is the sheen of the carpet, it looks shinny in one direction and muted in the opposite direction. I assure you the carpet is clean as we vacuum it daily and shampoo it quarterly, or as needed.  Anyway I wanted you to know I appreciate your feedback.  We do offer a free Continental Breakfast for two in your room price.  If you would prefer a full breakfast we can recommend Chick-fil-a (which is next door) or Ruby's (located in the Five Lagunas Mall across the street).  Let me end by saying we appreciate you staying with us.  Please come back again soon.

Summary: I will always recommend this hotel the bathroom and the rooms and the hotel and the breakfast everything itâ€™s amazing and Charlie is the best heâ€™s always nice and he have the best customer service thank you and I really recommend itâ€™s the best
Manager Response: Md T, thanks so much for your review and comments "I will always recommend this hotel...Charlie is the best...".  We appreciate you recognizing Charlie, he does a great job ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Happy to patronize an independent hotel.
Summary: My girlfriend and I chose to stay at this hotel because it was much more of a ''value'' than anything at Laguna Beach,..and it was not a chain hotel It was a fine stay and I can not say a single negative thing about our time there,..though I must admit breakfast was very basic. I would not discourage anyone from staying here,..but,...I would not feel compelled to stay here again if I was in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and feedback "value...I can not say a single negative thing...".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business! We hope to see you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Maids repeatedly woke us up with either entering the room or phoning the room, with a DO NOT DISTURB SIGN on the door.  They did  nothing to stop a loud unruly guest outside in front of other guests rooms. The desk said "Oh yes we've received several calls about this." but did nothing. When checking out the desk clerk babbled several excuses, in broken English, none of which made any sense. plus 8am gardening noise, leaf blowers, etc, There is a huge lack of Guest Service, with the exception of the phony apologies, and non stop excuses......very noisy AC. A very overrated hotel? (Motel)   Also not happy with the lack of cooperation regarding being handicapped.......I will never stay there again, or recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Wander: We apologize for all the problems you had.  It seems you had problems with our maids, our front desk officers, and your neighbors.  After discussing your review with my team, we agree with your conclusion that you should not stay at the Lodge. Again we are sorry you were so consistently unhappy.

Summary: Currently staying for 6 nights whilst on business locally.  Easy to find with lots of parking.  Friendly and helpful staff, rooms are well equipped and kept spotlessly clean.  Breakfast offers good choice.  Would stay again
Manager Response: Witney, thanks so much for your five star review and comments "Friendly and helpful staff, rooms are qell equipped...spotlessly clean.  Breakfast offers good choices."  We appreciate your feedback and were delighted to read you "Would stay again".  Thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Most reasonably priced stay in the area...and quite nice!
Summary: I've stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge several times and have never been disappointed. The staff, housekeeping and maintenance are all very friendly and hospitable. I highly recommend this Lodge if your going to be in the Laguna Hills area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your five star review and comments "I've stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge several times and have never been disappointed".  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business.  We look forward to seeing your again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Warm welcome...place has an odd charm
Summary: Charlie was great checking me in. Room is dated but ample. bed quite comfy. The carpets in the hall could use replacing. The gardens and the heated pool and the quiet and the access to solid eating choices --and the great third party price made this one-night stay lovely. better coffee/breakfast would make it a 5.
Manager Response: Hi Karen, thanks so much for your review and your feedback "...stay lovely. better coffee / breakfast would make it a 5".  We alos appreciate your comments about Charlie, he does a great job ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for staying with us.  Please come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Our first time at Laguna Hills Lodge
Summary: This was our first time ever at Laguna Hills Lodge. This is one of the cleanest, friendliest, quaint places! My grandparents and I really enjoyed our stay here. They make your beds and give you fresh towels EVERYDAY! Their continental breakfast area is very clean and organized. We WILL be returning!
Manager Response: Hi Jessica: Thank you so much for your review and kind comments "This is one of the cleanest, friendliest, quaint places!...We WILL be returning!"  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and look forward to your next stay ^_^.  We are very glad you discovered us.

Summary Heading: Sixth Visit and as superb as ever.
Summary: We have stayed at the Lodge for six consecutive years and this time we booked in for three weeks in the lovely Garden Rooms.Everything about this hotel is special.The rooms are kept immaculately by the wonderfully pleasant house staff.The reception staff are extremely welcoming and helpful.....even providing a bowl of sweet treats for kids and some who were clearly not kids!The gardens are beautiful. Breakfast is great and again the staff are really really nice.The location is perfect for either glorious beaches or eating out or shopping.The swimming pool is a perfect temperature and extremely well maintained.Disneyland is about a thirty minute easy drive.We have over the years on our trips from England stayed at many hotels in LA but since we discovered Laguna Hills Lodge we
Manager Response: Hi Steve: Thanks so much for your review and kind comments.  We are always happy to see our friends from England ^_^. We appreciate your feedback "Everything about this hotel is special.  The rooms are kept immaculately by the wonderfully pleasant house staff. The receiption staff are extremely welcoming....".  As a family owned business we thank you for your repeat business and we look forward to seeing you again next year! ^_^

Summary: Really great service. Came to visit for the weekend and Marco ganas us a really great deal in a room. Really clean everything organized. Everyone is friendly. Highly recommend this hotel if you plan on staying.
Manager Response: Hello Gustavo: Thank you so much for your review and feedback "Really clean...everyone is friendly...".  We appreciate your business and thank you for your recommendation  "Highly recommend this hotel..."!  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: Best hotel service we had during our visit. Highly recommend staying at this hotel. Came from Phoenix Arizona expecting something different but i was wrong best people and service i had experience. Will definitely come back here.
Manager Response: Salvador, thank you so much for your review and recommendation.  We appreciate your feedback "...best people and service I had experienced".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and look forward to your next visit ^_^.  Happy Labor Day.

Summary: The front desk staff is really helpful. I checked in at midnight. Room was nice and spacious and the bed was comfy. The room was also amazingly clean. I'm heading down to breakfast now so I plan to make more notes here.
Manager Response: Matthew, thanks so much for your review  and comments "...front desk staff is really helpful... Room was nice...bed comfy...The room was also amazingly clean."  BTW, the  #1 compliment we receive is "clean", we give credit to our housekeeping manager of 39 years.   Friendly staff is the #2 compliment we receive.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Treat you like family!  Great stay every time!
Summary: We've stayed at the Lodge at least 5 or 6 times.  The staff always goes out of its way to make us feel comfortable & meet our needs.  Everyone is friendly & helpful.  The rooms are comfortable & clean.  The location is amazing.  It's right off the freeway & minutes to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Hi Angela, thanks so much for your review and feedback.  We appreciate your comments "Treat you like family! Gareat stay every time."  As a family owned business we thank you and your family for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: What a nice staff, We arrived late from a long drive, the check in was very easy. Great surroundings and a great pool to enjoy with the family. Easy access to the freeways and laguna beach. WOULD RECOMMENED THIS HOTEL FOR SURE.  Thank you guys
Manager Response: Hi Johanna, thank you for your review and recommendation "Would recommend this hotel for sure."  Love your headline GREAT STAFF & COZY.  Great staff is the key to success ^_^.  Here is a business fact that helps us win, the average tenure for a person in the hotel business is three years - the Lodge average tenure is nine years.  Thanks for staying with us!

Summary: Very clean! Availability at anytime. Friendly staff! Love this place my family and I needed a place to stay and luckily was able to find this beautiful place within the last minute. Again thank you thank you and again thank you very much.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and comments "Very clean! Friendly staff!"  As a family owned business we thank you for staying with us ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Enjoy your summer holiday.

Summary: Got a room last minute , with this guys . Was worried , cuz was in town for some last minute work. And did not booked ahead of time . The staff helped me out with a room . So will recommend to everyone in the area because itâ€™s a clean and execelnt place . Btw pool was warm .
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and 5 of 5 rating.  We love your headline "Clean and quiet".   Gustavo, we appreciate your business and look forward to seeing your again soon.  Enjoy the rest of your summer ^_^.

Summary: Best Hotel ever. The staff was more than helpful.  Totally took care of our needs. Book now before it's too late. The hotel was clean.  The pool was clean. The room was clean. A big help was done for us.
Manager Response: Hi Susanne, thanks so much for your feedback and great rating (5 of 5). We loved your first sentence "Best Hotel ever".  BTW, my granddaughter said the same thing ^_^.  Your comment "The room was clean" is the #1 compliment we receive.  All the credit to Ana, our Housekeeping Manager of 39 years.

Summary: Breakfast was great and the rooms and beds were very comfortable. Very convenient location for my meetings plus only 10 minutes to beautiful Lagna Beach. I'd stay here again. Staff was welcoming and accommodating. Many good restaurants close by.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and for covering so many bases in your comments.  We appreciate your feedback: "...rooms and beds were very comforatable.  Very convenient location...".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Loved your recommendation "I'd stay here again.".

Summary: One of the best stays in the area. Definitely coming back. Great breakfast. Great pool. Lovely area. Great place. Great service. Lovely people. Definitely recommend. In n out across the street. The mall. The restaurants. What else do you need.
Manager Response: Hi Eddy, many thanks for your review.  We appreciate your feedback "Great place. Gareat service. Lovely people."  We do have a great team at the Lodge and they focus on taking good care of our customers.  Yes, the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street, guest feedback is very positive on King's Fish House, Rubys, and In-N-Out burger ^_^.  Thanks for staying with us, we look forward to seeing your again soon!

Summary: Due to the fires we needed a room asap for my daughter and newborn son. Front desk representative was amazing and very accommodating. Very helpful and clean. Great experience. Pool, breakfast, gym and close to stores and frwy
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and rating of 5 out of 5.  We were sorry to hear you needed a room due the local fires.  Hopefully you had no damage to your home!!  Thanks for your feedback on our front desk "...very accommodating...".  Next time your daughter and grandson have visitors please try out the pool at the Lodge ^_^ .

Summary: Central location. When I originally called to book the person on the phone said the lodge was a 10 minute walk to a beach which wasnâ€™t the case but thatâ€™s ok, it is next door to Chick-Fil-A which made up for that lol. We arrived at like 2 PM and we couldnâ€™t check in early, and had to wait until about 430 PM to check in as our room was not ready. When you book definitely make sure you ask for a room either on ground level or the section with an elevator if you have small kids. Would not want to lug a bunch of baby stuff up a flight of stairs. Cribs are an extra $10 a night. Complimentary breakfast is nice to have as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and all the detail in your feedback.  Yes, we do have a central location - you are right we are not a ten minute walk to the beach (we apologize that our front desk officer misspoke) but we are a fifteen minute drive from Laguna Beach and 20 minutes from Disneyland.  Chick-fil-A is next door and the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street.  We receive really positive feedback from guests on Kings Fish House, BJs and Rubys.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business ^_^. Please visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Clean spacious rooms and friendly staff.
Summary: Have stayed there many times and have always enjoyed it as it is convenient to many Orange County attractions as well as San Diego.  Will be staying there again this Sept. 2018.  It was  very reasonably priced, under $150.00. It is also within walking distance of shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 of 5 review and thank you for staing with us many times!  We do have a really great location - many of our European guests use the Lodge as a headquarters and do day trips to San Diego, Disneyland, and Laguna Beach.  We also appreciate your feedback "Clean spacious rooms and friendly staff" ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: Great hotel, clean comfortable and friendly staff. Good location close to close to 5 and 405. Fifteen mins from John Wayne airport in Santa Ana. Prices are very reaonable.Hotels has a good breakfast and some discount coupons for local food. Was able to get a early check in as I arrived early. Staff is knowledgeable of local area and of restaurants and attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and for the detial in your comments.  We appreciate your feedback "...Prices are very reasonable...was able to check-in early...Staff is knowlegeable...". As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please visit us again soon ^_^.

Summary: Nice property. Convenient to visit family in the Laguna Hills area. Comfortable beds, clean shower and bathroom. Nice pool to cool down in hot summer. Breakfast of cold cereals, yogurt and hard boiled eggs is adequate although I would suggest also providing cooked oatmeal if possible. Only drawback was the air conditioning unit is older and the lowest fan setting (although plenty of cold air to cool room) was noisy. Tough to sleep through but necessary due to very hot July day and night in  Southern California. All in all, great price and property.
Manager Response: Hi Liz, thank you so much for your review and for all the detail in your feedback.  We appreciate your comment "Nice property...comfortable beds...great property" .  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: I got to the Hotel Tired, after a looong flight, because of the time change I was arriving around 11:30 AM, there check in time is 3pm, I was hopping for them to make an exception since I really needed a Shower to keep going with My day but the lady on the front didnâ€™t make any effort for at least try to arrange something, they just offer me the key to the Pool Bathroom to wash my face and repeated that the check in time was 3!!!!  I had to go and when I came back around 9pm when I was coming up the stairs the rug had some Leafs and papers and when I got to the room it smell kind of old! That was the Bad!  On the good side the Hotels is very pretty, the breakfast was ok, and after the AC was on the smell went away, the room inside was very clean and well maintain, and the guys
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and 4 of 5 rating.  We appreciate your comments "...Hotel is vry pretty,  room clean and well maintained...". Thank you for your feedback on early check-in.  We want you to know that we do make every effort to accomodate early check-in, especially after a long flight.  During the summer this is difficult because of high occupancy and the fact that check-out is at 11:00 AM (check-in is four hours later at 3:00PM).  So that we can do everything we can to accomodate you please call ahead so we can work on your requst ahead of time.  Thanks again for your feedback, we appreciate it.

Summary Heading: Comfortable reasonable hotel in Laguna Hills, CA
Summary: We have stayed in this hotel twice now and each time we like it more.  The breakfast is great, the staff is outstanding and helpful and we just feel comfortable and at home.  There is a wonderful pool, laundry facilities and free wifi.  We plan to stay here every time we go to Laguna Hills.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and comments "The breakfast is great, the staff is outstanding and helpful and we just feel comforable and at home". We look forward to seeing you again soon, many thanks for your 5 star review!  Enjoy your summer ^_^.

Summary: Good location and good service with a reasonable price. Close to freeway. Very close, short walking distance, to many shops and restaurants, gas station, and pharmacy, Starbucks. Free simple breakfast, and free parking.
Manager Response: Mohammed, thank you so much for your review, and for the details in your feedback.  You are right, we receive very positive feedback on our location - just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall.  A lot of guests also like that we are only 15 minutes from Laguna Beach and 20 minutes from Disneyland.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please visit us again soon ^_^.

Summary: I spent the 4th of July long weekend with my wife at the lodge. Every thing was good and we enjoyed our stay except the room needed a little remodeling. The carpet was old and have some spots.the complimentary breakfast was good.
Manager Response: Mohamed, thank you so much for your review and comments "Every thing was good and we enjoyed our stay".  We appreciate your comment about remodeling.  We remodeled 30 rooms last year, please consider staying in our new Garden Rooms. The rest of our rooms were completely remodeled in 2008 - 09.  Since we have received really positive feedback on the Garden Room remodeling we will use the same color scheme to update the rest of the hotel over the next two years. We do appreciate your feedback, thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Excellent value for money. Room was clean and modern, staff is very friendly and accommodating.  Pool is very clean and the breakfast is also very good with many choices.  Garden area is a very nice place to walk around or just sit and relax.
Manager Response: Hi Robert, thank you so much for your review and comments "Excellent value for the money...Room was clean and modern,staff is very friendly".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon.  Enjoy your summer ^_^.

Summary: This establishment is in the heart of Laguna. Plenty of retail stores and restaurants nearby. The freeway is a couple minutes away. Clean nice rooms. I have stayed here twice and would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Marc, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and for your feedback.  Yes, we have a really good location - next door to the Five Lagunas Mall. close to the freeway, and Laguna Beach is a short drive.  Your feedback "Clean ... rooms" is the #1 compliment we receive.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and we thank you for recommending us!

Summary: We stayed here on June 16th. Our room was as noisy as any cheap hotel I've stayed in. Lots of noise from other rooms and from the roadway. We asked the staff for a quiet room away from the freeway, but they wouldn't accommodate us. (Hotel had lots of available rooms). And the hotel is right across the street from the fire station... So bring ear plugs!!! Lots of noise from adjoining rooms as well. Not a good place to stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  If you happen to have a noisy neighbor please let our Front Desk know and we will contact them anonymously.  We are happy to make this call for you. Regarding noise from the street, all of our guest rooms have dual glazed windows.  We made this investment because we want to do all we can to keep noise to a minimum.  On your feeback about our staff, I am happy to say that they are a big reason why the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence for the last seven years.

Summary: We were in Laguna Hills for four days for a sporting event my husband was participating in. This hotel was very convenient to the venue and is an easy exit off the freeway. There is also a small mall across the street with a Penney's and a Nordstrom Rack. There are also several good restaurants and several fast food places very close, too.   The lodge has an outdoor pool that was a little chilly for me, but the weather was unseasonably cool while we were in Laguna Hills so that might have been the problem. The jacuzzi was very nice and was certainly enjoyed.  The room was very nice and clean, with amenities of a small refrigerator, a microwave, coffee-maker, and flat screen TV. There was plenty of hot water for showers.  The grounds are exceptional. There are many beautiful
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and all the details in your feedback.  We appreciate all of your comments, especially your remarks that  "The room was very nice and clean.... All the staff were helpful and friendly."   We are glad you enjoyed your four day stay. Yes, the jasmine smells great at this time of the year and of course now is the time that our 450 rose bushes are in bloom. As a family owned business we thank you for your business! Please come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: Our family had two renovated rooms for four nights while visiting Orange County and had a very nice experience there. This is a friendly, well-kept, high-value, non-chain hotel with immaculate grounds.  It is also in a very good location for local places to eat and access to I-5.
Manager Response: Kiernan, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and for all of your comments.  We are getting a lot of positive feedback about our remodeled Garden Rooms ^_^.  I will share all of your feedback ("good location...friendly") with my team.  Thank you for your business, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It's very clean. The room is nice. The bed is comfortable. The property is beautiful and well cared for. The staff is nice and helpful. It was really nice having breakfast included. This place is a gem. We have absolutely no complaints!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and comments, especially "This place is a gem....The staff is nice and helpful ... It's very clean." As a family owned business we appreciate your business.  Loved your feedback  "Really enjoyed our stay". Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: This properly is an older hotel that has been maintained and upgraded very well.
Summary: The hotel is well managed and the rooms are excellent. The gardens are the best maintained hotel grounds I have ever seen. It's a lovely place to see. The staff is friendly and helpful. I don't think an independent hotel could be better run.   My only complaint is that I'm a light sleeper and the doors and windows are exposed to the outside so if people walk by and are taking I hear then and it disturbs my sleep. So the only thing I would want (I have a garden room) is more noise insulation in the window and door. Having said this, places 2x the price have been much more noisy.  The properly is compact and it looks like it has been there for a while but shopping centers and commercial buildings got built up around it.  Safe and reasonable place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and your feedback "The gardens are the best maintained hotel grounds I have ever seen". ^_^.  BTW we have 350 rose bushes on the property, 450 bushes overall plus 80 bougenvilla / clematis. We also appreciate your comment "The staff is frinedly and helpful", I will share your review with my team.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: We need to stay in the area at various times, due to family obligations.  We usually stay at a different place, but tried this out.  We were very pleasantly surprised.  There is great attention to detail.  The staff is immediately attentive and helpful.  While the breakfast is simple, it is well-appointed and staffed to serve, which is a nice touch.    The gardens are lovely and gives a sense of oasis.  We've booked again for our next time in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and for your feedback.  We were delighted that you booked with us for your next visit to the area ^_^, and that you found our staff "helpful".  Regarding our gardents we have 350 varieties of roses, 450 rose bushes overall, plus 80 bougenvilla / clematis.  Spring is a great time to visit the Lodge.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: It feels like your staying in a garden. So people that have allergies to certain plants and flower be aware.  Arrived little after 12:30 pm and was told check in starts at 11. Room wasnâ€™t ready till after 3:00. Not pleased.  Rooms are small for 4 people. Bathroom is very cramp. Toilet is made for small people.  Continental breakfast is the norm nothing special.  The only thing I like is the fact that this hotel is right in the middle of everything, restaurants, shops, the mall and a short drive to Laguna Beach.  I would stay here for business but now with family.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and for your feedback.  Yes, our check-out is at 11:00 AM and our check-in is at 3:00 PM - this gives us four hours to prepare guest rooms for customers.  You are right,  we are close to several attractions: Fives Lagunas Mall across the street; Laguna Beach 15 minutes away; and Disneyland is 25 minutes away.  Lots to do and see ^_^.  Please consider staying with us with your family, our pool / spa is popular with kids.  Thank you again for your feedback and for staying with us!

Summary: Stayed here when visiting Laguna Beach. Older facility but pretty well taken care of and clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. Rate was reasonable. Good place to get some sleep. No regrets for staying at the Laguna Hills Lodge.
Manager Response: Hi Gary, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback and were glad to hear that you felt our "Staff was freindly and helpful" and we were glad to hear you had "No regrets for staying at the Laguna Hills Lodge".  As a family owned business we would like to thank you for your business!  Enjoy the Memorial Day Weekend ^_^.

Summary: This Hotel was close to work in South County so I gave them a shot.  Staff was extremely friendly and helpful and the grounds were quiet.  I actually upgraded from a standard room to a Garden room simply because of TV size.  Both would be sufficient to most people but I prefer a larger TV so Garden Room had that to offer.  The hotel offers a clean pool area with Jacuzzi, Sauna, Workout room and coin laundry.. I liked that the pool area was quiet and opened at 7am til 11pm.  Continental Breakfast was nice in their cafe room.  Plenty of shopping and dining options on El Toro Road made life easy also.  Highly recommend Laguna Hills Lodge.
Manager Response: Rich, thank you so much for your review, feedback and for recommending the Lodge.  We especially appreciate your comment about our friendly staff ^_^.  Yes, there are quite a few restaurants and shops near by as the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street.  Guest feedback is that they really like Kings Fish House and Rubys.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: I try to avoid chains if I can help it.  This was a good option, and was a good value compared to others in area..  Rooms just average, would have liked a courtyard side, but they had a premium didn't know about.
Manager Response: Shelly, thank you so much for your review.  We appreciate your comment "...good value...". FYI,  Garden Rooms are our premium guest room, just recently remodeled. Thanks for staying with us ^_^.

Summary: We had a garden room.  Very quiet and very clean.  Beds were very comfortable.  More than enough space for our 10 day trip.  The lodge is conveniently located near shopping, restaurants, golf course and the 405/5 freeways. The breakfast was more than adequate during our stay.
Manager Response: Lorraine, thank you so much for taking the time to post a review.  We appreciate your comments "Very quiet and very clean".  We are close to restaurans and shops as the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street, out customers give us very good feedback on Kings Fish House, Ruby's and BJs.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: I travel sometimes for extended periods of time.  I called several hotels in the area to ask about an extended stay rate and payment cycles, but Laguna Hills Lodge was the only one during the time of season I called that had a reasonable rate, was willing to make payment terms, and was within walking distance to restaurants, supermarkets, coffee houses, drug stores, shopping malls, and public transportation. My initial stay was for three months, but the client extended with short notice another three months.  Laguna Hills Lodge kept the same rate and payment terms the entire time even though my stay went into their busy season.   My family came down during the holidays and I was given an additional room for a couple of weeks at the same rate. With the exception of the last two
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review and for the detail of your review.  Lots of good feedback.  We appreciate your comments "The front desk staff was friendly and helpful" and your positive feedback about our housekeeping staff.  Yes, we are close to the Five Lagunas Mall (it is just across the street) so we have quite a few restaurants and shops very close by. As a family owned business we thank you for your business and for the long length of staff with us.  We hope to see you again soon ^_^.

Summary: My room was in Building B, upstairs. It had a balcony with a nice garden view and was very quiet. The bathroom had been recently remodeled and was done very well. The mattress was one of the best I have slept on. The front desk staff was courteous and friendly and Housekeeping kept the room neat and clean.
Manager Response: Marie, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and for your positive feedback on our remodeled Garden Rooms. Regarding the mattress we purchased all new Simmons mattresses at the end of 2015.  Thanks for your comments "The front desk staff was courteous and friendly and Housekeeping kept the room neat and clean".  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: After just staying at a bad place in Irvine (not my fault), the Laguna Hills Lodge was a refreshing find. No, it's not the Four Seasons, but it's a very good value. Staff was pleasant. My room was in good condition (A116), clean and had a refer and microwave. The grounds are well cared for and clean. The jacuzzi, out by the pool, was nice. Even the complimentary breakfast was good. The Inn is located near several restaurants. I will definitely stay here when visiting Irvine.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your five star review and comments, especially "..it's a very good value. Staff was pleasant....room...clean" ^_^.  Yes, we are located just across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall with several nice restaurants and shops.   Guest feedback is that they really like Kings Fish House, Ruby's and BJs.  We loved your comment "I will definately stay here when visiting Irvine".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: This hotel has been around a very long time. It has been renovated a number of times and is currently undergoing updates. I hosted a group of 10 employees here and half the rooms were renovated and half were not. My room was not and is showed its age by the number of coats of paint and dated colors. Other rooms that had been renovated seemed very nice. It has convenient parking right outside your door
Manager Response: Rastro, thank you so much for your review.  You are right, we have completed the remodeling of our Garden Rooms and will start our Standard Rooms shortly.  The oldest room we have, in terms of remodeling, is 2008.  The pool and spa was remodeled last year, as was the breakfast (Mariposa) room.  Yes, parking is free and close to our guest rooms.  WiFi is free too ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: We've actually stayed here once before this visit and came back as we knew it was a great place to stay. The rooms are clean and of a good size, it's close to places to eat (if you have a car) and has some good places nearby. Definitely recommend a stay here. Staff are also really friendly and helpful. Looking forward to a short visit again this year.
Manager Response: Ashley, thank you so much for your review and feedback "The rooms are clean and of a good size...staff...friendly and helpful".  Thank you for recommending people stay with us ^_^.  Thank you for your business, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My First Time staying here. Although, admittingly have visited Family Members  who has  repeatedly stayed at this Motor-Hotel .  The Front Desk Crew can be counted on to do all they can to facilitate your booking all the way through to your check out. Easy access to property, right off the 5 freeway at the El Toro Road Exit. They have a Outside Jacuzzi Spa and Excercise Room In the Pool Area, and I believe itâ€™s open to at least 11 pm.  Lots of Parking, and Ice Machines. You get a glorified Continental Breakfast for each guest in the Mariposa Room from 7-10.  Various Cereals, Juices, Yogurts, Fruit, Pastries Bagels, Breads, Hardboiled Eggs, Coffee, Tea, Hot Cocoa, Milk etc....  A Total Wine Superstore  in Small center right next store.  Centrally located for Access to go to Los
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and the details which are very helpful.  I will share your review with my team. As a family owned business we thank you for your business and for your comments "Great Location and Value!  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: The location of the hotel is very near to the mall and other food establishments.  The service is a exceptional and the room is clean. There is available business center with free wifi. The breakfast is good too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and your comments "The service is exceptional and the room is clean...breakfast is good too" ^_^. As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  Please come back again soon.

Summary: Was down there in July 2017 to visit with family nice hotel with a pool the kids had a blast. They have a good breakfast room and nice staff. Close to highway 5 for easy access. Hotel was clean and great location close to stores, Total Wine, and local restaurants. The breakfast staff and housekeepers were very friendly and nice..
Manager Response: We were glad to hear that your "...with a pool the kids had a blast" ^_^.  We remodeled our pool last year.  We also appreciate the detail in your review "nice staff...close to highway 5...Hotel ws clean" etc.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: We got one of the remodeled rooms on the second floor of building 2. Room 240. Pretty quiet even with the sliding door open at night. Slider opens to a small balcony. No elevator so be prepared to carry your luggage.  Grounds are very nicely kept with some benches, planted areas and flowers. Lots of parking.  It is located right across the street from several fast food joints like Chickfila. The shopping mall is about 2 blocks away.   Bed was very comfortable. Linens were new and crisply clean.   Bath had a tile shower with a curtain. (A curved rod would have been appreciated.) Shower quality was great. Towels were fluffy.  There is a small coffee maker in the room with one bag of regular and one bag of decaf. Made horrible coffee...no other way to describe it, sorry.  Flat
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We were happy to hear you liked our remodeled rooms.  We are getting a lot of positive feedback about the grey, red and white color scheme and the new carpets ^_^.    Glad to hear you found our WIFI was "very fast" and easy to use. Also, thanks for your comment about our Front Desk team "wonderful"!  We appreciate the great detail of your feedback, I will share your review with my team. Thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Laguna Hills Lodge - Excellent Hotel Stay
Summary: Staying at the Laguna Hills Lodge was a very pleasant experience! The front desk was very accommodating, the rates were very good considering the area and compared to other hotels in the area!  The rooms very clean, spacious and offered all accommodations one needs.  It is across from the Laguna Hills Mall that is currently be upgraded to an incredible outside mall! Great location with easy access to shopping, freeways & Laguna Beach!  I highly recommend the Laguna Hills Lodge.  They are in high demand so be sure and book early!
Manager Response: Theresa, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your five star rating and feedback on our team: "Front Desk was very accommodating...rooms very clean".  We were very happy to hear you had a "very pleasant expereince!". Thank you for recommending us.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Honda CENTER Down the 5. Not bad!
Summary: Stayed here & upon check in felt comfortable. Not Super High Scale but was once a Marriott. Family owned since 1937 & close to In & Out/Chick Filet. Breakfast was normal continental but for the price paid ( lil over $100 on a Friday Night) for room w/ 2 beds, 2 breakfasts. A Better Deal than most Hotels nearby. It feels like you are out of the city with the trees around it even though it's Right Off the 5 Freeway. It's a simple yet clean accomadating hotel in a very nice area both for Anaheim fun & Beach fun. Plus they have a Pool, not always easy to find a Hotel with a Pool so near the ocean.  (Only noticeable COULD DO BETTER was the carpet. Could use a change, shows alot of wear n tear in hallways & rooms.) All the check in/out staff are very friendly. Even bowl of candy to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate all of your feedback.  Yes we are family owned, but since 1972 ^_^.  "Clean" is the number one compliment we receive so thanks for your comment.  It is a real plus for our guests to be close to the Five Lagunas Mall (just across the street) and a short drive to the beach or Disneyland.  Regarding our carpets, thanks for your feedback - We have already started work on replacing carpets. Thank you again for your business!

Summary: The hotel was great.  Plenty of places to eat nearby.  The room was very nice and the bed was perfect.  We needed a downstairs room and wanted to checkin early and the staff was very helpful on both counts.  It is 20 minutes south of Disneyland and dollar for dollar a better deal than staying across the street which we have done many times.
Manager Response: Jo, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciat your comments "The hotel was great. Pleanty of palces to eat.  The room was very nice...".  Regarding plenty of places to eat, we are fortunate to be across the street from the Five Lagunas Mall with lots of restaurants and shops.  Yes, we are twenty minutes from Disneyland and fifteen minutes from Laguna Beach so there are a lot of fun family things to do nearby ^_^. Jo, as a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: Clean, convenient, friendly. Our balcony overlooked a pretty garden. The beds were comfortable. It was quiet - especially good given its central location very close to big streets and the freeway. The breakfast is pretty basic, but itâ€™s included. Good value for the price.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback "Clean, convenient, friendly".  Clean is the #1 compliment we receive.  We feel very fortunate to have a fantastic housekeeping department, managed by a lady who has been with us for 38 years - great job Ana ^_^.

Summary: Me and my family really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. We have stayed here quite a few times and never have had a bad experience. We appreciate the good customer service and clean rooms. We will for sure be coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business and for your comments about our hotel "good customer service and clean rooms". I will share your review with my team.  We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.

Summary: Near the intersection of two main thoroughfares, the lodge is a convenient location to various sites of interest.  It is also right off the 5, making it easy to get to from LAX or John Wayne.  I happened to be in a remodeled room during my stay.  While nothing exceptional, it is a big step up from the way the room used to look. The lodge more importantly is near the firehouse and a government agency, so I felt safe as I drove in from the airport late at night.  Just as importantly, it is clean throughout.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  Yes, the Laguna Hills City Hall and Laguna Hills Police Department are next door to the Lodge.  One other amenity is the fact that the Five Lagunas Mall is just across the street with many nice shops and restaurants ^_^.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Garden view delight in unusually well-managed hotel
Summary: We always look forward to our stay at Laguna Hills Lodge because the staff are so friendly, it is an excellent value in a central location, the breakfast is a good deal, and the management takes such good care of maintenance and services.  The garden is always pleasant and refreshing during regular months, but we really love it during the holidays with neat and colorful decorations. The Christmas bear was facing our room A115, so we just had to take a photo to remember seeing the bear every chill night that we left our room.  We also liked the Mickey mouse Santa.  In addition to providing an excellent value, Laguna Hills Lodge regularly leaves us with many happy memories.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing us with your feedback and for the five star review ^_^.  We especially appreciate your comment abut our "friendly" staff and "excellent value in a central location".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business.  Happy New Year.

Summary: My husband and I had read the reviews on this place and decided to stay there.  What a mistake.  We found it so run down and paper peeling off the walls.  I  the carpet was so disgusting that I couldn't stay there.  It took about 30 minutes on the phone from the lobby to get our cancellation finished.  We had booked five nights!  I do not know who wrote the reviews but my guess is someone other than a real customer. We found the Fairfield Inn about 10 minutes away in Mission Viejo.  I was so happy to see a clean place that I had tears!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback.  In looking at your concerns we do have six rooms with wallpaper peeling.  These rooms are scheduled for remodeling.  In fact, we are remodeling all of our rooms, scheduled in such a way as to not disturb guests just seven years after the hotel was completely remodeled and redecorated.  Regarding the carpet, we assure you that it is clean.  We vacuum and spot clean daily plus deep clean carpet twice a year.  I suspect what you may be referring to is the way the carpet fabric lies.  For example, I was inspecting hallways this week and the carpet was just cleaned, when you walked one direction the carpet appeared lighter than when you walked in the opposite direction.  This may be an explanation for your feeling the carpet did not look clean.  One of the advantages we have at the Lodge is our housekeeping manager has been with us for thirty years and she is very strict on making sure all rooms are very clean.  Again, thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: A little gem of a place
Summary: We stayed here a couple of years ago and considered it such good value for money we decided to stay again this year when we returned to California. For us it was a great location, about 30 minutes from Disneyland for a couple of visits we made and then about 20 minutes from Laguna Beach. There is a complimentary continental breakfast and the rooms are being remodelled to a nice standard. Good value for money, highly recommended
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. Your comments "Good value...great location" are the two most often compliments we receive at the Lodge. As a family owned hotel we thank you for your business and for your recommendation.

Summary Heading: Make sure you get into right building
Summary: after reading all these positive reviews I was so exited to have the best price/quality experience!  So I was traveling woth my small son, we checked in late ( like 9pm) and were extremely tired. So went directly to sleep.   The room was old, smelly, small and depressive, I even started hesitating if the linens were clean on top of it  we had couple of technical issues in the middle of the night ( the heating system)  and sleepless night I was planning to stay there for 4 night but in the morning I asked for earlier check out.  The staff actually is super friendly and helpful , they accept it right away:  But awkwardly they told me that I should have mentioned last night that I don't want old far building overlooking to gaz station and parking , but the building with renovated
Manager Response: Aerona, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback. We are sorry that you did not like your room.  Please contact our Front Desk with the room number and I will inspect your room myself.  We watch reviews carefully and take them seriously so please be assured I will follow-up on your concerns.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: Myla & Mic are amazing about any kind of help you may need even if you arrive late and always with a smile. As well, the candies in the lobby are a nice welcoming treat and there is a chick fil'a next door
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for acknowledging Myla and Michael on our Front Desk.  Yes, the candy at the Front Desk is very popular, and is now full of Halloween treats ^_^.

Summary: Our room, double queen, was spacious and clean. The air conditioner was noisy but it drowned out the fire station alarms nicely. The continental breakfast was a very nice surprise with many selections. Good location with many surrounding eats. Hope to return in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback "...room...spacious and clean...continental breakfast was a very nice surpise with many selections.  Good location...".  We apologize that your A/C was noisy.  Please call our Front Desk and we will fix or replace (we have several spares) the A/C immediately.  We were glad to hear that you hope to return in the near future ^_^.  Thank you for your business!

Summary: We stayed here in 2016 and, again, recently.  The staff is especially helpful and friendly and the motel is very well located for trips in the area, including Laguna Beach.  A continental breakfast is included, which could be expanded, but the basics are all there. There is a pool and an exercise room, too, though we were too busy to use them. We spoke with other travelers in the breakfast room and they noted that this is the best deal i the area. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  As a family owned business we were happy to see you again and look forward to your next visit ^_^. I will share your review with my team. I loved your comment "We spoke with other travelers in the breakfast room and they noted that this is the best deal in the area".  Thank you again for your business!

Summary: This was our first time to stay here and what a wonderful experience!  We travel to Laguna about 4 times each year to visit family and Laguna Lodge will be our go to hotel from now on!  The rooms are so clean and neat, the grounds are meticulously maintained (love the flowers) and the staff is wonderful.  Can't find enough great adjectives to describe our experience here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback.  We are delighted to hear that you had a "wonderful experience" ^_^.  I will hare your review with my team, FYI "rooms and so clean" is the number one compliment we receive at the Lodge.  Our housekeeping staff is really good, we appreciate them very much.    Thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: This hotel is just in the right spot for a stay when going to The Coach houe concert venue!  Free continental breakfast was great rooms clean and price was right! Staff friendly! Very nice place. Shopping mall near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback - "...rooms clean and price was right! Staff friendly!"  Yes, we are next door to the Five Lagunas Mall so our guests benefit from convenient restaurants, shopping and the theater.  As a family owned business we thank you for your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is our favorite in South Orange County. I have stayed at many more costly hotels in the area and was so happy we found this one. Close to freeway but no noise. Grounds are beautiful, sauna is fantastic, staff is awesome.   Looked for deals on Hotels.com and got a discount. Gave us a coupon for additional 15% that never expires!  Got the room for $99 this time.   Check it out!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and the detail of your feedback. I will share your review with my team, glad you found our staff "awesome".  We feed very fortunate to have a great team ^_^.  As a family owned hotel we thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: A 2nd visit and well worth it
Summary: Stayed her in 2015 and when revisiting the Laguna area again this year, we decided to stay here again as we had a great experience first time around.  We weren't disappointed, lovely room, nice staff, great location and a lovely pool to cool down in when the heat gets a bit too much. On top of all that, you get a great breakfast in the deal too! (Probably said that last time). It's quite unusual to get breakfast in the price. This is a medium sized two storey Motel type place but that isn't a bad thing and the staff welcome and helpfulness is a breath of fresh air in comparison to some places we've stayed. Bottom line is, if you're visiting this area, LHL makes a great base for your travels and somewhere you can relax after the heat of the day. There are a number of eateries
Manager Response: Thanks for writing a review and your comments "lovely room, nice staff, great location...". FYI, your comment "LHL makes a great base for our travels" is a big reason we have so many European guests.  We get a lot of visitors from England, Germany, Spain, etc. that use the Lodge as a home base and take day trips to Disneyland, the beach, etc.  We appreciate your feedback and your business - Thank you!

Summary: We spend a couple of weeks at this wonderful hotel every summer on our California vacation from England.The staff are so friendly and recognise us each visit.Breakfast is provided and is continental which certainly suits our family.The rooms are beautifully clean and the maids are sooo efficient and helpful. The pool is well maintained as are the laundry facilities.The gardens are really lovely. We will certainly return next Summer to this home from home hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the five star review and the detail of your feedback.  Repeat guests as you are very important to us so It was really great to hear from you again. England is a long trip, so I am glad that our staff recognized you ^_^.  Yes, our maid staff is fantastic - "efficient...helpful".  We attribute this to our Housekeeping Manager (Ana) who has been with us 38 years.  Thank you again for your business.  See you next year.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in Middle of City
Summary: The service is impeccable and the rooms are clean and inviting. The landescaping is gorgeous and to top it off they have a candy jar in the lobby. Great place to stay when going to Pageant of the Masters. Very close and easy to get to and from. Restaurants and mall right across the street. Who could ask for anything more.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments "The service is impeccable and the rooms are clean and inviting" plus all of your other positive comments too.  We appreciate your business and look forward to your next visit to the Lodge ^_^.

Summary: The hotel is clean, friendly. It felt very secure. Located opposite the mall so easy access to it.  Perfect for my needs as I was in walking distance of my workshop and food options for lunch and dinner.  I arrived early and was able to check in.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to write a review.  We appreciate your comment "The hotel is clean, freindly.  It felt very secure".  FYI, our City Hall and the Laguna Hills Police Department are next door ^_^. I was glad to hear we were able to help you with early check-in.

Summary: Selected this property for proximity to Dana Point and based on pics of courtyard and gardens.  We arrived a little early and the front desk very kindly checked us in early.  The property is larger than I expected.  We were in Bldg C (where the breakfast room is located).  Our room was on floor 3.  Took the elevator up and located our room with no trouble.  It was well appointed and spacious. AC worked very well.  Room had a small fridge with freezer and a microwave. Slept comfortably.  When next in the area, would definitely select this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and all the detail in your comments.  We appreciate your comment about your room "It was well appointed and spacious.  AC worked very well."  I will share your review with my team.  Thank you for your business!!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights over Labor Day weekend. The location was very convenient for my purposes of visiting family and attending a wedding. It is very close to the 5 freeway and easy to access. The property and room were both very clean and pleasant. All of the staff that I came into contact with were very pleasant as well. Unfortunately my room smelled of stale cigarette smoke but my sister who also had a room did not have the same problem - so it's not a site wide issue. The smell was the strongest when you first walked in the room and didn't bother me after a while. I didn't ask to switch rooms because they had already mentioned that they were completely booked but next time I would definitely mention it. Overall I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it
Manager Response: We were glad to hear that you had a "Very nice stay" at the Lodge.  We especially appreciate your feedback that "The property and room werre both very clan and pleasant.  All of the staff...were very pleasant".  In terms of areas to improve, thank you for your feedback on stale cigarette smoke, we follow this closely as we are a non-smoking property.  Please let the Front Desk know if you have this problem and we will relocate you.  Thanks for visiting the Laguna Hills Lodge!

Summary: We decided to stay here rather than San Clemente. We arrived a bit early and the Hotel checked us in early. The ground and rooms were nice. They also offered a continental breakfast. Although there is a sign that asks you to only go through once.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback - the comment "The ground and rooms were nice" and your observation about our breakfast sign  "go through once".  We limit servings to one per guest so we do not have a run on any one item (a real example, a man asked for 12 chocolate chip muffins - no kidding). We have a large selection of breakfast items for our guests to enjoy. Again, thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We booked this place last minute and was pleasantly surprised. We wanted a place that was between the beach and Disneyland. This place was a perfect short drive to either.  Very comfortable beds and enjoyed the amenities. The style was little old fashioned but worked great for our needs. Easy check in and check out.
Manager Response: Nick, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  Yes, we are close to the beach (ten minutes) without the beach front hotel prices; and we are less than a half hour away from Disneyland.  Glad to hear you liked our beds, we installed all new Simmons mattresses just over a year ago.  We appreciate your feedback and thank you for your business.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here. The staff was very friendly and for the price the accommodations were great.  My only concern was that the A/C did not work well.   Easy to get to and close to many restaurants.  Close to the freeway too.  Hank F.
Manager Response: Hank, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review.  I sincerely appreciate your kind comments about our staff ("staff was very friendly").  We apologize for the problem you had with the A/C.  In the future please let our FD know about the A/C - "did not work well" - and we will be happy to send our maintenace team to fix it or replace it. As a family owned hotel let me thank you for your business!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Pretty good over all, but a bit generic. Getting to the hotel off the freeway in coming from either the south or the north was very easy.  Clean beds and rooms. The breakfast was mediocre: just carbohydrates. The pool and hot tub were very comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Comfortable rooms. Friendly helpful staff. Will definitely stay again if I'm in the area.   Very pleasant vacation  Family friendly. Pool and hot tub inviting and well kept and the grounds are fabulous.  Convenient to lagu a beach. An hour from sea world. Handy for touring the area
Manager Response: Thank you for the great five star review and all of your comments!!  We appreciate your feedback - i.e. "Friendly helpful staff... family frinedly...grounds are fabulous".  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: A Great Value Hotel in Laguna Woods!
Summary: The Laguna Hills Lodge is my favorite place to stay when travelling south on business. Recently refurbished with firm beds, clean rooms, free breakfast, freeway exit close without traffic noise, a fitness center, swimming pool and spa and friendly staff to greet you and to handle any special requests with care.  A park like setting and parking spaces room close, a perfect place for a frequent business traveler down the 5 freeway. A great value!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay here yearly for a visit to the Laguna Festival of the Arts and Pageant of the Masters for over 25 years.  Gardens are beautiful, location is excellent, amenities are plentiful and good quality.  Each year, we spend an afternoon by the pool and hot tub.  The included continental breakfast features bagels and cream cheese, hard boiled eggs, cereals, fresh fruit, juices, youghurts, coffee, tea.  The hotel is family friendly and well kept.  Across the street is the Laguna Hills Mall.  Highly recommended!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your business and for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate the details of your comments about our gardens, location, and amenities.  We look forward to seeing you next year as you visit the wonderful Pagent of the Masters.  BTW the Five Laguna Malls across the street is being remodeled ($500Mil) and will be ready for your visit next year.

Summary: Our stay was wonderful!  Staff (Myla, Jim & Charley) were extremely friendly & accommodating.  Hotel is at a great location. The room was clean & had a comfortable bed. We'll definitely stay there again!!
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and recognizing Myla, Jim and Charley ^_^.  We appreciate your business and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel has been fully renovated and is a  nice place to spend a few days. The reception staff was friendly and helpful both at check in and check out. Our room was clean and comfortable in every way. The "free" breakfast was just ok. I especially liked the handy take away trays so I could easily bring my wife breakfast in bed. All around good value.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to write a review and your comments about our renovation.
