We appreciate your comments about our Front Desk team "friendly and helpful" and your feedback on our rooms "clean and comfortable".  As a family owned hotel let me say that we appreciate your business!

Summary: Travelled as a family of four, stayed for three nights and probably the best decision we made on our west coast road trip. From the minute we arrived at the hotel, the reception staff, especially Charlie, were so attentive and made us feel at home. Our request for an upper floor room was granted and we found a very clean and spacious room with two queen beds. The room facilities include coffee maker, fridge and microwave as well as air con. Close to the i5, but you can't hear a thing from the road, the hotel has a great pool, close to a small mall with a number of familiar restaurants. I would have no hesitation in staying here again, thank you
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind remarks about Charlie. We loved your comment "...probably the best decision we made on our west coast road trip"!  I will hare your review with my team.  Enjoy your summer ^_^.

Summary: Visiting Pageant of the Masters?  Great location with easy access to Laguna Beach, straight down El Toro.  I agree bus service is handy, but if you prefer to drive, especially to the Pageant, it is quick and easy.  It costs plenty for parking in Lot 11, but if you go before 5 it's only $15, and it is so easy to beat the crowds after the show.  The hotel is lovely with 3 buildings and beautiful gardens.  Staff is friendly and helpful and breakfast is quite nice,with many choices, though no hot food.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and details of your feedback.  Our staff has been with us for a long time so I will be sure to share your comment "Staff is friendly and helpful".  Enjoy your summer and please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: When we looked for a place near Laguna Beach this motel had the best price and highest reviews. The room was clean, hall lighting was bright, grounds were beautiful! The location was perfect with convenient access to Dana Point, Mission San Juan Capistrano, and Laguna beach. There is a Starbucks, wine store, organic groceries, sandwich shop and brewpub all within walking distance! Breakfast selection was good but no hot food. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback about "room was clean ... grounds beautiful!  Location was perfect...".  Glad yo hear you "will be back" ^_^.

Summary: We stayed here for a week and it was a great stay! The lodge is very nice, comfortable beds and updated decor in the rooms. The location is key! We were approx about 9 miles from Laguna Beach and easy access to the main freeways. The lodge is perfect for the cost per night! I highly recommend this lodge and will stay again! You get complimentary breakfast in the morning which has limited but tasteful items.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 6 days and it was perfect. The rooms are nice and clean. There is parking space at no charge and breakfast in the morning. It's about 10 miles from Laguna Beach and prime location to get onto the highway. We will stay here again and the cost per night is very cost friendly!
Manager Response: Many thanks for taking time to write a review and your comments "The rooms are nice and clean...prime location".  I will share your review wiht my team.  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: My sister had eye surgery.  We wanted something near the doctors office to ease her travel time after surgery.  She had a re check on eye the next morning. The Lodge is older, but it very clean.  Great location near food, entertainment and freeway access.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review.  Yes, we are across the street from Saddleback Memorial Hospital and receive many guests taking advantage of local medical professionals.  They do a great job!  We appreciate your remarks "very cleran...great location".  Thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Visiting Pageant or the Masters in Laguna Beach
Summary: This is a quiet hotel off the 5 interstate short drive down Laguna Canyon to Laguna Beach there is public parking lot with bus service to Laguna Beach.  No worries about parking meters in Laguna Beach.   This hotel is clean and has great beds with free breakfast in AM.  I have stayed there for every visit to the Pageant.  Will be there July 31st.
Manager Response: Enjoy the Pageant ^_^, it is special.  Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to your next visit.  We appreciate you taking time to write a review on our hotel.

Summary: We stopped here for 2 nights on a 2 week trek from San Fran down the coast and ending in Vegas. It is a cute locale featuring two story buildings crawling with colorful landscaping and gardens around the property. Buildings are older but they've done a great job with updated desks/dressers and a safe/fridge/freezer setup in the closet. Complimentary continental breakfast was included and was surprised it was more than I expected. Many cereal offerings with a full case of toasts, bagels, English muffins with an employee toasting them for you. Also are pre-packaged muffins & oatmeal. Coffee, tea, juice, milk and condiments like peanut butter, jelly, honey with the toasts paired with a banana was more than plenty each morning.  We had two queen beds which was perfect for our family
Manager Response: Thank your for writing a review and for providing so much detail.  I will hare your review with my team.  We love the specifics you provided about our continental breakfast. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The front desk gentleman who checked us in was very friendly. While the building is a little older it is very well kept up and such beautiful flowers all over the property. They give you vouchers for breakfast each morning you are there.  The somewhat drawbacks were the walls are thin so we were able to hear other people and especially up above us. There is a Fire Station across the street but we had our fan on during the night so I did not hear them. My biggest issue was the swimming pool. We used it twice while we were there but it did not look like anyone had been there to clean the pool. The tables were wiped down and the trash taken away (we witnessed this one morning) but never saw anyone cleaning the pool. Also the room did smell musty but we opened the window and that
Manager Response: Many thanks for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your feedback.  Our pool service (Kevin) cleans the pool 3X per week, early in the morning.  I will remind our housekeeping team to be sure to air out the rooms each day after cleaning.  Glad to hear you found our front desk "very friendly".  Thank you for your business ^_^.

Summary: Great value,  the room was good sized and the king bed was comfortable.  The parking is free.   The breakfast was nothing fancy (bagels, cold cereal, yogurt, boiled eggs, juice, coffee..,)   We really didn't hear any noise.  There is a micro wave, small fridge and a safe.  I like the sink, vanity being outside the toilet tub area.  It was fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your four star review of our hotel ^_^.  Your comments "great value...we didn't hear any noise" are appreciated.  Please come back again soon.

Summary: For $100/night (by Expedia), it comes with free breakfast, free Wi-Fi and free parking!!  The location is good, shopping mall is nearby. I enjoyed the Jacuzzi; I wished I could swim.  Staff members are quite nice and friendly.  My husband wants to go back there next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5!

Summary: We stayed in the hotel for 3 nights while visiting Disney.Hotel staff were exceptional and friendly and helped with all the asks promptly.  B'fast is continental but would work if you are planning for a quick bite and start early in a day. Restaurants, Liquor, pharmacy are all walkable and right next to Police headquarters makes it ideal. Takes 20 mins to reach Disneyland park and Huntington beach...Would recommend for those who are looking for a economical & pleasant stay in LA.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to write a review and for the detail of your comments.  We appreciate your comments "Hotel staff were exceptional and friendly".  Yes, we have a very good location, the Five Laguna's Mall is just across the street with fun shopping, theaters and good restaurants ^_^.  Thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Watching a play at UCI, anniversary
Summary: We stayed here for three nights for our son's play, and our anniversary. The room is clean and has everything you need. Breakfast is surprisingly nice and included. Yoghurt, fruit, hard boiled eggs, bagels, etc. Good coffee. Pricing was good. If you get ground level, you can park your car in front of it. Very convenient. We travel a lot, so this one is a keeper for the price. If they raise it? Then there are other options. But we liked it and will return!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments "..room is clean...breakfast is surprisingly nice... price is good". Glad you "will return", we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We always like to stay on the top floor of motels, since 2- or 3-story motel buildings are not likely to be soundproofed the way hotels can be. The Laguna Hills Lodge property consists of multiple buildings with separate parking lots and nicely landscaped grounds. Most of the buildings are 2 stories, but one building has 3 stories. There's an elevator in the 3-story building, which is also close to the breakfast room, so that's a good option for senior travelers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and insightful comments on our property.  Let me add that we are next door to the Laguna Hills City Hall and police department, and the Five Laguna's Mall is just across the street (nice shopping, theaters and restaurants).  Please visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Our go-to lodge for Laguna Hills family visits twice each year
Summary: The location, lushly landscaped grounds, ultra-friendly staff (desk, housekeepers and breakfast room) and adequate rooms make this our only choice for week-long stays twice annually.  This time, we were joined by three other couples who also loved this charming retreat with a pool and basic cafeteria-style breakfasts (included).   A large, bottomless candy bowl at the front desk is a sweet bonus, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and comments, including "...ultra friendly staff".  We were happy to har tht you were joined by three other couples and they also "loved this charming retreat".  We appreciate your business - Thank You!

Summary: We needed a place to stay for one night.  This place was perfect.  It was close to the fwy but not so close as to be noisy.  It was in a good part of town and felt clean and safe.  It seemed like an older place but the room was clean and up-to-date.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  I would definitely stay here again if I were going to be in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and comments about our hotel!  I will share your comments with my team. We look forward to your next stay ^_^.

Summary Heading: Quick trip to see the Ocean
Summary: Loved this motel. Clean, comfortable, large rooms and the grounds are gorgeous! Close to restaurants, freeway and shopping. Basic continental breakfast included. Close to Laguna beaches and we enjoyed a trip to La Jolla to see the seals too!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and thank you for your comment "Loved this motel.  Clean, comfortable....".  Please come back again soon ^_^.

Summary: I've spent a lot of time in hotels in the Irvine Spectrum area in the past 3 years.  My mom is in a nursing home nearby.  Because I travel there a lot it becomes costly so I seek out affordable hotels so have stayed at most of them in this price range.  I think this is the best.  Why?  The grounds are beautiful with lots of beautiful flowers and gorgeous smells around every corner.  They had bananas everyday for breakfast which scores points with me, the rooms were clean and well cared for (no peeling paint or wall paper.)  They have all the amenities like a pool and hot tub, plus a sauna, and a gym (I didn't use any of these because it was cold and raining.)  My daughter used the gym and said it was pretty barebones, but whatever.   There is easy access to the 5 once you learn
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and many thanks for recognizing our garden "...beautiful flowers and gorgeous smells around every corner."  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: Great location, great price, wonderful breakfast!! We are repeat customers, this is our "go to" place when visiting family in the area. Restaurants close by. Washer/dryer available, very comfortable stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for the five star review and thank you again as a repeat customer!  We appreciate your remarks "Great location, great price, wonderful breakfast!!".  We hope to see you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, great value, and good location
Summary: This was our second time staying at Laguna Hills Lodge and we continue to find it to be a comfortable place to stay.  The room rates are very reasonable compared to other places in the area, and the location is very convenient.  We were visiting my mother in Laguna Woods and this is the best place to stay when we go.  While the room decor is showing it's age a bit, the beds are comfortable, the room is large, it's quiet (despite being near major roads), the grounds are well kept and attractive, and the breakfast in the morning is good.  We recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us again!  We appreciate your feedback on our rom rates and convenient location.  Laguna Woods is on one side of the Lodge and the Five Lagunas Mall and Saddleback Memorial Hospital are on the other side. Thank you for your recommendation ^_^

Summary: Rooms are great for the price..room renovations underway. The location is very centrally located in south orange county. property ground are very pleasant and very well maintained. A.D.A renovations have been completed around the property. The pool/Jacuzzi area is kept neat and clean and the pool is always heated. I stay here at least once a month and I would highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for acknowledging our ADA improvements and central location ^_^.  We appreciate your business!

Summary Heading: Good location for visiting our niece and nephew
Summary: We stayed two nights with 2 service dogs. Our room had 2 queen beds, one for the dogs and one for us. The downside was that the hotel property didn't have any areas conducive for the dogs to "do their business" but there was some grassy areas across the parking lot in the County offices parking lot, so it was ok. The breakfast offerings are quite varied, nothing hot though except instant oatmeal, but several cereals, pastries, breads, yogurts, juices, hardboiled eggs, coffee, etc. There were a few restaurants within walking distance, BJs Brewpub is one I remember. All in all a decent stay for a decent price.
Manager Response: Thanks for your four star review and the details of your comments.  Yes, BJ's is just across the street at the Five Lagunas Mall and there is also a Kings Fish House, Ruby's, CPK, etc.. Please visit us again soon. Thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Great property and very convenient location.
Summary: All the staples were available within walking distance and everything else a short ride away. Would definitely stay at this property again. Enjoyed having several fast food options close by. Pharmacies and even a mall are close by if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and headline "Great property and very convenient location".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: We always have a good experience at the Laguna Hills Lodge, our main family hotel when we visit my Mom. We'll be back again in a few weeks for Mom's 100th Birthday. We enjoy visiting with hotel staff we've known for years. We sunbathe in the pool and hot tub. Meet new friends over complimentary breakfast in the Mariposa Room. And I use the laundromat once a week and the workout room for my knees, and free wifi every day. Must include appreciation for the hotel's outstanding garden, where blooming flowers scent the air year 'round. Best prices in the area. I recommend a room facing the Town Center. Building C has helpful elevator. Oh, yes, and the Laguna Woods Lodge is conveniently close to everything on our itinerary, including malls, restaurants, and the beach. Mom recommended
Manager Response: Congratulationos on your Mom's 100th Birthday!   Thank you again for staying with us.  We appreciate the great review ^_^.

Summary: We found Laguna Hills Lodge while staying in the greater Irvine Area for work, and we couldn't have been happier. By no means is this a luxury hotel, but it was always clean, the staff were incredibly friendly, and the price was unbeatable for the quality of stay. The rooms were simple, but well maintained and very nice. I would highly recommend staying here if you are in the area and don't want to deal with the overpriced hotels in the area. Its only 8 miles from Laguna Beach and about 20-30 minutes from the canyons and a couple of wineries.
Manager Response: Thanks for the five star review and for the detail in your review.  I will hare it with my team.  As a family owned hotel we look forward to guest feedback, guest comments were studied as part of our recent remodeling.

Summary: I stayed at Laguna Hills Lodge for three weeks and was really impressed. The room and bathroom was spotlessly clean, very comfortable and I actually felt so at home and it did not have the feeling of an impersonal usual hotel. I was so impressed as the staff were just so friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was very adequate for my needs and I made full use of the business center PC service and the laundry room.
Manager Response: Anita, thanks so much for your super review.  We hope to see you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Nice family friendly hotel for our family with 2 young kids. Very convenient as well to the mall, restaurants, shopping, grocery stores and the beach. We had a great time in Laguna Hills and love the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to write a review.  Yes, we cater to families, focus on clean rooms, and a large pool area for kids to have fun.  The Laguna Hills Mall across the street is a plus for families.  Thank you for your business!

Summary: I normally don't stay at independent hotels; but made an exception because of the reviews. This is a delightful place with beautifully landscaped grounds, comfortable and inviting rooms, and wonderful staff. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay Thank you!
Manager Response: Maebeth, thanks so much for your headline "A little oasis" and for your feedback "This is a delightful place....".  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Very nice little hotel at a great price!
Summary: This is a very neat hotel with flowers growing everywhere.  The rooms are neat.  The upstairs rooms have a small balcolny.  There is a small fridge and microwave as well as a safe and coffee pot in each room. There is a great little pool and hot tub and the breakfast is good.  The staff is VERY friendly and helpful.  You can have maid service everyday.  They suggest you leave a couple of bucks tip on the dresser, so bring some cash.  There is laundry facilities and the hotel will change money for quarters.  It is in a good location right off of El Toro road that has a lot of restaurants and shopping.  There is a Chick-fil-A right next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for the detial in your comments.  I will share your review with my team.  We do focus on being "friendly and helpful". Yes, this is a great time of year because the roses are blooming, we have 350 varieties of roses on the property.  Please visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay for last 10 years!
Summary: My wife and I have stayed here dozens of times over the last decade plus. This is a peaceful place, great friendly staff, consistently great service. New management, yet no change in excellence - a few more upgrades in the property. There are some minor cosmetic updates that need to happen and are in the process of being worked on. My wife, a nurse, is a clean freak and loves the place. I cannot say enough good about the consistently wonderful staff - front desk, morning breakfasts, helpful 'can do' attitude, easy to reach, responsive to requests. Business area for customers very helpful for getting on line, printing boarding passes, etc. Always look forward to coming here. No bad rooms - garden view is best, but really popular.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for many years, we appreciate your business!  We are a family owned hotel on the second generation of management.  Our plan is maintain a high level of servcie and cleanliness and update the hotel on a regular basis.  BTW, the Laguna Hills Mall, across the street, is also being remodeled (new shops, restaurants, and movies).  Thank you again for your business.

Summary Heading: A very pleasant hotel for a reasonable price
Summary: The property is well maintained, super clean and very quiet.  The hotel is conveniently located near shopping and the freeway.  The staff is very accommodating.  An added bonus is the daily continental breakfast.  I chose this hotel because my aunt and uncle stayed here when they were in California, and they were extremely picky.  I knew if they liked it I would like it, too, and I did.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and your comments the "property is well maintained, super clean and very quiet".  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary Heading: Nice affordable stay in OC with nice amenities.
Summary: I usually book chain hotels because of course you expect a certain level of quality at hotels banded together by the same company.  As a result, I was nervous to book at the Laguna Hills Lodge, but my fears were unfounded.   The room was spacious and the room soaps were very interesting as they were orange based which was quite unique and clever.  The breakfast was very thorough with about all the options you could want including about eight cereal types which is great for me.  The property was in a very nice location, close to the interstate, but quiet and very well maintained.  I took a chance on this hotel as it certainly was the cheapest in the area, but I was not disappointed and I will certainly be staying here when I return to the area next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and all of your comments, "orange based" room soap, options at our breakfast, "quiet and nice location", etc.  We watch reviews closely and value all of your specific feedback.  Thank you for your business, please come back again soon.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located for the area.  The room was spacious and clean.  The staff was efficient and friendly.  They are retrofitting one of the three buildings to comply with the American's with Disabilities requirements which means they start work at 7:30 AM during the week but that was fine with us.  The pool is heated year round which is a happy surprise.  There are several good eating establishments within walking distance which is great.  Though surrounded by the usual parkways, it was a fairly quiet establishment without a lot of road noise.  It is across from a Fire Station but the disturbances from that were few.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and the details ("...room ws spacious and clean"., pool heated year round, etc.) of your comments ^_^.  I will share your feedback with my team. Please visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Very Pleasant Hotel in Great Location
Summary: The staff is most helpful.  The room is efficiently arranged.  The breakfast is quick and plentiful, including hard boiled eggs. Rooms have a frig, microwave and coffee maker.  Comfortable bed. The location is quick access to the 405 and walking distance to restaurants.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review and all the detail in your comments.  Please come back and visit us again soon.  Thank you for your business.

Summary: This lodge is one of the best we've stayed in. The room was large, quiet, clean and comfortable. The staff, all of them, were always friendly, outgoing and professional. The grounds are clean (despite the current construction) and manicured to perfection. The location is awesome as well. We will definitely stay here again on future trips. Thank you for a wonderful 5 day stay. You guys ROCKED it !!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments "This lodge is one of the best we've stayed in.  The room was large, quiet, clean and comfortable".  I will be sure to share your feedback with my team.

Summary: While the hotel is dated, it was very clean and quiet. The check in was pleasant and traveling by myself I felt very safe. The breakfast in the am was more than enough to start the long day of meetings.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review, we do have a "quiet" hotel.  We want to make sure our guests get a good night's sleep.  Please come back soon ^-^

Summary: We visited Laguna Hills Lodge for 3 nights as part of a 3 week road trip. The location was perfect for exploring the nearby beaches. Amazing value for the price, huge rooms, clean throughout and a good location for supermarkets, restaurants. We also used the pool a few times to sunbathe. The breakfast also had a good selection. Would definitely stay again if in the Laguna area
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and your comments "location was perfect for exploring the nearby beaches.  Amazing value...".  As a family owned company we will be sure to share your feedback with our whole team.  Thank you for your business!!

Summary: This place has deteriorated in the last 2-3 years.  Construction is underway for ADA compliance, not for upgrading facilities.  No notice of construction when I made my reservatino--a major irritation. Ice machine broken for 3 days  now.  Hallway carpets are very stained, Rooms facing traffic (and almost all of them do) are noisy.  Room A/C also noisy.  A "garden view" room costs almost 50% more and looks out onto a tiny  sliver of a lawn between buildings, but may be quieter.  Breakfast is very basic and spare: hard boiled eggs and carbs; no hot food.   A place to crash, but that's about it.  Front desk personnel are pleasant.  Overall, very disappointing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We sincerely apologize for any noise or inconvenience our construction has caused.  Each year we remodel about 20+ rooms.  This year we are also resurfacing the parking lot, we have remodeled the pool area, and we decided to add four rooms for our ADA guests.  We would like to point out to the readers of this review that the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellece each year for the last six years.  Again, we apologize for our construction.

Summary: I stayed here for three nights in January while visiting family in Orange County.  This is a budget hotel but unlike chain budget hotels, its well maintained with great service. Your can tell its run by people who care. Its located next to a mall and lots of restaurants. Its close to Laguna Beach and Newport Beach and convenient for freeways for further destinations.  Breakfast is included but it was very basic - toast, cereals, yogurt, boiled eggs.   If you are looking for affordable accommodation in Orange County, this is a great choice.
Manager Response: Hi Warren: Thank you for your review and headline "Great value - well maintained".  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thanks for staying with us!

Summary Heading: It's okay and pretty good value
Summary: Rooms pretty clean, halls/entries not so much. Pool very small. Rooms on Paseo de Valencia side are really loud and ugly view on other side of parking lot. Get a garden room, it's worth the few bucks extra. Breakfast is min-i-mal. Stayed here a few times visiting my Mom but switched over to a small chain up El Toro a few blocks away for better room nice heated pool and excellent breakfast for a few dollars more (The difference in price is somehow seasonal like they have different peak seasons?)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback.  So that Trip Advisor fans reading this review have a good idea of what is offered in the Lodge continental breakfast I thought I would provide a brief description:   â€¢	Hot Beverages: Coffee, tea and hot chocolate â€¢	Cold Beverages: Orange juice, apple juice and milk â€¢	Muffins (3 selections), pastries (3 selections) or toast / bagels (5 selections) toasted to order â€¢	Cereals / Oatmeal (7 selections) â€¢	Yogurt (3 flavors) â€¢	Fresh Fruit: Apples, bananas and fruit cups â€¢	Hard boiled eggs  Thank you for your comment about our "clean" rooms.  We appreciate your business, please consider staying with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 weeks in October. Lovely hotel, great friendly staff on desk. Good location just off the I5 (main route to LA or San Diego). Got up graded to a room on 2nd floor with balcony so that was nice. The pool area is nice too, kept clean Glad to have staye here.
Manager Response: Hello Carson:  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!  We appreciate your headline "Great stay".

Summary: It was ok for a quick stay. One night was ok. I would not want to vacation here. A clean place to lay our tired bodies. They did let us cancel our 2nd night with issues. Will probably not return here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I will share your review with Housekeeping ("clean place").  Safe travels.

Summary: My room was not on garden side, but it's good enough. Breakfast included with this price in Laguna Hills what a surprise.... The staffs are very friendly and helpful. Good location, near highway and central location of Laguna Hills.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review.

Summary: If you require chandeliers in the lobby, this is not for you, but if you are looking for a quiet, clean, comfortable place to stay for a night or two, I can recommend the Laguna Hills Lodge.  The price is reasonable, and includes breakfast. We like the convenient location, right off I-5.  One would never know there is a freeway nearby and a mall across the street.  We have stayed here more than once when traveling to Southern California, and have always found the staff at this family-run motel to be pleasant, friendly and competent.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and thank you for your comments "quiet, clean and comfortable place to stay".  We are a family owned hotel and very much appreciate your feedback about our "friendly" staff.  We feel very lucky to have a staff that has been with us many years ^_^.

Summary: Found the accommodations great and the staff very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was also great with the food good and the breakfast room very clean. Location was very helpful for our stay with easy access to where we wanted to go.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5, and for all of your feedback.  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: The rooms here are quiet, the location is really central to everything and the gardens and flowers here are really something. The rooms are big and the blinds cover the whole window which is awesome. The breakfast situation didnt fit my dietary needs but if you are cool with bagels and such it is nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review ("quiet ... location central, " and more).  I will share it with my team. Please come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Very beautiful hotel with a garden and boutique feel. Beautiful rooms and property. The owners and staff are helpful
Summary: Professional and beautiful property. Breakfast room is run very well which keeps things clean and productive along with controlling water of food. Just make sure you bring cash so you can tip your room maid or she might"forget" to leave you with the room necessities.Excellent and stunning property; I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and details in your feedback.  I interpret your comment about the maid that she did not leave you all the amenities she should have, I apologize. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: There are no complaints about LHL. My room was spacious, with comfortable beds. The place is quiet and looks absolutely safe, which is important to me. Hotel staff was very helpful when I ordered some things on the hotel address. Location is very good if you have car. The exterior is quite unique, at it looks almost that impressive as on the photos. The only thing which could be improved is breakfast room and breakfast overall, although the man working there is really nice. I expect more than plastic dishes and hard-boiled eggs only for this price.
Manager Response: Many thanks for taking the time to post a review and for your headline "Great value".

Summary: It is only like a Motel but I loved it, the rooms were big and had 2 double bed plus is was kind of cool having the sink in the room, so while someone was in the bathroom you still had a chance to get ready. The pool area is great which also includes a gym. The breakfast area simple but you could also take your tablet into your room. There is a huge shopping center across the road and lots of other supermarkets nearby. I stayed here because I was invited for a wedding in Laguna Beach and since prices are expensive here this was the best affordable choice...Read more on world-wiser.com
Manager Response: Thank you for your headline "Simply great and quiet".  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: we had very comfortable night, everything was good. our room was too big, bed was enormous! but the bath's door it doesn't close. and the breakfast wasn't good at all.  so I'll prefer for next time choose another hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review ^_^.

Summary: So far...our 4th stay there. We will keep coming back because of they have the best mattresses of any hotel we have stayed in! Also the rooms are always emaculantly clean. I gave them a 4 because some of the rooms can be a little noisy and our refrigerator rattled all night on just our last stay. They are remodeling right now, so those issues will probably go away ðŸ˜Š Great staff also!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on our bed "most comfortable bed!"

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Great Room, & Great Value
Summary: We were very pleased with our stay at the Laguna Hills Lodge and I highly reccommend it.  The staff was wonderful.  I especially want to recognize Nevine, who checked us in.  She was so friendly and extremely helpful.  Our room was clean and very comfortable.  What a great find this one, and what a great value.  We will certainly return and stay here again.
Manager Response: Many thanks for taking the time to write a review and especially for recognizing Nevine who does a great job. As a family owned hotel we make it a priority to have a friendly staff and provide our guests with "Great Value".  Please visit us again soon ^_^.

Summary: I had my father stay here for a week initially and got upgraded to a garden room for no extra charge. Nevine (hope I spelled that right?) was the person at the front desk who always helped me tirelessly to make sure that my dad had the best stay. She spent so much time making all these room switches to make sure that my dad didn't have to switch rooms in the middle of his stay.  I called after the week was over and asked to extend an extra week since my dad fell ill and wouldn't be able to travel back. With minimal rooms left available, she was able to somehow accommodate my requests for my dad and still granted him a similar room I had for the first week! Nevine was awesome and eased all my stresses!!! I felt that she really cared about my dad and our comfort, which is much
Manager Response: We do have a super staff, they are the #2 compliment we receive in online reviews, "clean" is #1.  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary: We booked this hotel based on reviews and we were extremely happy.  For less than $100 per night, this is a great find.  Near the I5 but you can't hear the freeway noise.  Walking distance to a few good restaurants.  Small fitness centre, laundry. pool.  Very well maintained.  Complimentary breakfast provided in a clean and friendly atmosphere. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We appreciate your "Best Value" review and comment that "this is a great find" ^_^. I will share your feedback ("Very well maintained") with my team.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Convenient location near I-5 & El Toro Blvd.
Summary: Older 2 story garden-style motel buildings, no elevators. Recently updated bathrooms. Pool area separate from rooms, so no noise impact. Complementary cold breakfast, free wifi.  In-room coffee, refrigerator, & wall set a/c.  Business services available.  Helpful staff.  Not fancy but clean and very reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your comment about our "updated bathrooms" and "helpful staff" ^_^.

Summary: This hotel was recommended by a family member who had stayed here and it was just what we needed - comfortable and affordable with a helpful staff.  We'll be back in the area again over the next few years and will certainly stay here again and again.  The location is easy to navigate to Laguna Beach and shopping, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback "Comfortable room....".  Please come back to the Lodge soon ^_^.

Summary: Greatcustomer service. The place is beautifully landscaped (peaceful fountain garden), rooms very clean, quiet, continental breakfast, just all around pleasant. Perfect garden after an exhausting day.  I fully reccomend ifyou are looking fora tranquil stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about "beautifully landscaped" (we have over 350 varieties of roses), "quiet ... recommend if you re looking for a tranquil stay". We appreciate your business.

Summary: We have stayed often at Laguna Hills Lodge over the last 25 years, and we look forward to enjoying the large clean rooms and central location. During our most recent visit, we arrived at about 11:15 am, and the staff were genuinely eager to find a room for us even though we arrived early. We felt as if we were coming home.   The buffet breakfast is more than adequate with hard boiled eggs and fresh fruit. We were impressed at the care for the grounds and the plants in the well-tended garden. The wi-fi signal was good and reliable, and we had a pleasant view of the garden from our room B226.  We feel that Laguna Hills Lodge provides a truly unusual value considering the modest price, the happy and caring staff, and the first-class management of this lovely hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business over the last 25 years!!!!! We value your patronage!  I will share your review "Caring customer Service" with my team.  We look forward to your next visit, please stop by and say hello to me.

Summary: I would stay here again in a heart beat. The staff was very friendly, courteous, helpful and organized. The room was clean and well maintained and the beds were comfortable. There was a nice clean pool and hot tub. Despite being so close to a major intersection and a busy freeway I slept like a baby. You really don't hear it. It's close to lots of great restaurants (In and Out Burger) and a mall. It's 30 minutes from Disneyland and 20 minutes from the beach. I'm staying there for sure on my next trip down.
Manager Response: Many thanks for your five star review and comments about our "very friendly, courteous and helpful" staff plus your feedback about our "nice clean pool"!!  Please come back again soon. Glad you "slept like a baby" ^_^

Summary Heading: Inexpensive and not far from Disneyland.
Summary: Laguna Hills Lodge is staffed by friendly, professional, and helpful people.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  Price  includes a good breakfast that is all you can eat.  Great place for all, including families with kids.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback "not far from Disneyland".  We are close to Laguna Beach too ^_^.

Summary Heading: Pride of Ownership--Great Deal for your Money!
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a week after leaving a really bad Extended Stay in Irvine. The guys at the front counter were friendly and accommodating. I would suspect it's privately owned as you get a feeling like it's family run. It was a nice experience after staying at the typical corporate chains for weeks.  The property is immaculate. From the gardens, to the pool and hot tub. While it's more of a motel than a hotel, it has everything you need. It is also minutes walk to several restaurants. They range from fast food, to nicer sit-down venues.   The rooms are huge! You can tell they have been update recently as well. Everything was fresh and clean. All the staff I came across were friendly as well and really seemed to enjoy their jobs which is nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  Yes, we are a family owned hotel.  We have owned the Lodge since 1972.  We especially appreciate the detail in your review which I will share with my team at our Monday department head meeting. Your title is super - "Great Deal for your Money!".  Please come back and visit soon.

Summary Heading: Third visit and we'll definitely be back.
Summary: This is the third time in 4 years that we've stayed at Laguna Hills Lodge.  We love it and haven't found anywhere else which offers such great facilities, a friendly welcome and great value.  We stayed in room 371 this time and found it very spacious, clean and comfortable, with coffee making facilities, a fridge & microwave, a safe and a hairdryer.  We'd like to say a big thank you to Ana from the housekeeping department, who made sure we felt at home.  The staff in the reception area, and across the whole site, were very friendly and helpful at all times, and we were also very pleased to meet & chat to Alberto.  The heated pool is just wonderful and the poolside patio area is also great.  It was great to have access to laundry facilities, gym equipment and a jacuzzi spa. The
Manager Response: Thanks for the five star review and comments about your "friendly welcome and great value".  We appreciate you taking the time to write!

Summary: Rooms are nice and bed was very comfortable. The pool area is large with plenty of room and the breakfast was just fine for being included. The only issue i had was that the Hotel really needs to upgrade the hallway carpets! the carpet looks old and discolored with stains visible. I only bring this up due to the fact that this is the first thing you see before you get to your room and as they say "first impression is everything", so i was concerned but on entering our room i was happy to see the room was very nice and had updated carpet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comment about "rooms are nice" and "bed was very comfortable".  Regarding the carpet we are scheduled for replacement next year, we will try to move this up - thanks for your comment.

Summary: This hotel is centrally located near restaurants, shopping, and freeways. The rooms were spacious, clean, and the beds were very comfortable. The grounds were very pretty with blooming Bougainvillea and manicured perfectly. The heated outdoor pool, and hot tub were such a joy and the end of a day ( and open to 11 pm). They also have a fitness center and a finnish sauna room. Each room had a mini fridge and freezer, microwave, and safe. They even had laundry facilities at the hotel. My family and I rented two rooms for a weeks stay and thoroughly loved this hotel. The bonus was the price. We could not believe you could get this much for the cost.
Manager Response: Thanks for your headline "What a great stay".

Summary: Stayed 3 nights.  What I liked, in order of my memory, not importance:  1) quite large room  2) mini fridge was not so mini, it has a separate freezer so my blue ice froze but not my hard boiled eggs  3) a bathtub with plenty of hot water  4) nice thick towels  5) unscented linens and room (I called ahead to request no room deodorizers be sprayed and the detergent used is unscented)   6) easy and free wifi  7) sliding balcony door opened for fresh air   8) safe in the closet large enough for my laptop.  What I didn't like as much but not a big deal:  sheets were a little rough and pillow was too poofy for me - have to remember to bring my own pillow when I travel.  TV picture was somewhat distorted and lacking my favorite TCM chanel.  Air conditioner was noisy - it cooled well
Manager Response: Thanks for the detail in your review, we appreciate it. As a family owned hotel we track reviews closely.  I like TMC too and apologize that the picture was "somewhat distorted".  We just signed a contract with Cox Communications to upgrade our TV system and by year end we will offer over 100 HD channels, including TMC.

Summary: Stayed one night whilst visiting California. Rooms are great and very clean and comfy. Breakfast in morning was the best we had in motels whilst on holiday. Pool area very nice too. Value for money is great. Location just off freeway but only took us 10mins to drive to Laguna beach.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments "Great place and amazing value".

Summary: this was our stop on our trip along the California cost,we were not disappointed, the place was a little dated but the rooms were very clean and the staff were very helpful,thier  was a complementry breakfast which was very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review ^_^.

Summary: I really liked this hotel - we spent four nights there and felt really at home.  The beds are very comfortable and I liked the separate sink area in the lobby of the room.  The swimming pool was very good.  I especially loved to see the humming birds playing in the fountains of the lovely courtyard gardens - nice place for a few days!
Manager Response: We were glad to hear that you "felt really at home"! Please come back to see us again soon ^_^.

Summary: Spent four nights in room A114 which has a view of the beautiful garden. The room was immaculate, very quiet, well appointed with plenty of surface space in both the vanity area and remainiing area, had good lighting, a comfortable enough bed, a room safe, refrigerator/freezer, free parking very close to the room, free WiFi and really wonderful towels and plenty of them!  Reception staff were most friendly, welcoming and professional.  Breakfast was simple ~ hard boiled eggs, yougurt, bread, cold cereal, fresh oranges, pastries and packaged fruit.  If this isn't your cup of tea, I highly recommend Mother's Market Cafe located just a few blocks away where we enjoyed six absolutely wonderful meals !  You can order from the menu or get food from the hot bar, soup bar, salad bar or
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Please come back again soon.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel  as part of a bigger group, although, we had booked individually.  The hotel is straight off the freeway, very easy to find.  We arrived early and were aware our room would not be ready, however, reception advised they would get the room ready asap.  Staff on reception were exceptional, very engaging and friendly - all the staff we came across were a credit to the hotel.  The room - good, for the price it ticked all the boxes, nothing to complain about.  Grounds were beautiful - small garden, very welcoming to sit and relax in.  Swimming pool/gym a positive addition to the hotel.  Breakfast - okay buffet/continental style, not sure about eating with plastic cutlery off polystyrene plates, not for me but it sufficed.  Hotel located in a business area. you
Manager Response: Hello Caroline:  Many thanks for staying with us.  We appreciate your review score of 4 out of 5 ^_^.

Summary: Was recommended this hotel and was not disappointed. The check in staff were very friendly and helpful.  The room was spacious and comfortable with a nice balcony.  Breakfast was good with plenty of choices.  Pool area was nice and guest laundry good to use.  Good location for travelling around.  Would stay here again
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us and for your comments about our rooms - "spacious and comfortable". BTW, all the washers and dryers in the guest laundry are new ^_^.  We look forward to your next visit, Happy Holidays.

Summary: We have stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge in the past and it has definitely declined. The grounds weren't kept as nice as they used to be. The room was clean; but a little shabby and had an odd smell at first. There was a refrigerator that wasn't turned on. It had been wiped down but the door was left open with a dirty rag hanging out. Our room wasn't ready at check-in; so we were told to come back in an hour. It is in a good location...so that was a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are sorry to hear that you think our "grounds weren't kept as nice as they use to be".  FYI, after each hot summer we replant and update the gardens. Glad to hear your room was "clean", I'll pass on your feedback to housekeeping.  Please let me know what day you checked-in as I want to follow-up on your comment that your room "wasn't ready at check-in.  The feedback I have from my team is that 100% of our rooms have been ready by 3:00 PM check-in. Thank you for staying with us! Please visit again and let me know if the grounds look better.

Summary: We found this to be a very nice hotel. The rooms were comfortable and extremely clean! The staff at the desk and at the Continental breakfast were very helpful and pleasant. Easy walk to several restaurants, etc. and very nice landscaping.We travel in this area often and will be returning to this motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the very nice review and detailed feedback.  We appreciate your compliment about "comfortable and extremely clean" guest rooms! It was also nice to get your feedback on our "helpful and pleasant" staff.  See you on your next visit ^_&

Summary: Nice enough place but nothing spectacular. They allow dogs and our room had a stinky bathroom and they don't seem to clean up the usual dog spots on the outside. Nice parking lot with plenty of convenient parking and the location is great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  When customers check-in we remind guests that the Lodge is a pet free property.  The only dogs that are permitted are service animals.  Regarding your room, please let us know if there is an odor and we will address it immediately or relocate you to a different room. Thanks for the compliment about our parking and our location. We hope that you come back a visit us again.

Summary: In an area where motels can be very expensive, I was pleasantly surprised to find the Laguna Hills Lodge. The hotel is conveniently located to both restaurants and shopping. It is not far from Laguna Beach and much less the motels there.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking time to write a review, and for your comments about our convenient location. Please come back again soon.

Summary: Great place to stay for couples and family.  The hotel is freeway close, plenty of restaurants close by, rooms are well kept with small frig/freezer and microwave.  Parking is available close to your rooms.  Pool area is great with plenty of tables and seating for adults to watch the kids.  Some rooms face the fire department across the street but this was only an issue during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  I will let my housekeeping team know that you said the rooms are "well kept".  Also, thanks for your feedback on parking and our pool ^_^. We are a family owned hotel that sincerely appreciate the details in your feedback.

Summary: Big, clean rooms, Big fridge and microwave, free breakfast, warm clean pool and jacuzzi, laundry facilities and gym.  The location was great too, close to Starbucks and other stores and restaurants.  Beds were super comfy.  Staff were great!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and details: "free breakfast, super comfy beds, staff was great", etc. I'll share your feedback with our team ^_^.

Summary: Booked this place based on the picture of the gardens and reviews. I will happily add to the wonderful reviews!  This place is a diamond in the rough.  Small but staff is very personable, rooms were clean and housekeeping staff excellent. It seems no matter what time we left the room we returned to a perfectly made bed and straighten room. Included breakfast was fresh and plentiful, front desk staff (particularly Sergio) was very helpful. The pool/hot tub/ gym were well maintained and the center courtyard gardens were small but also well maintained with resident hummingbirds flying around..  We just LOVED this place and would definitely recommend and return ourselves.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback on our "personable" staff, "clean" rooms.  Of course we very much apprecate your comment "This place is a diamond in the rough"!

Summary: Stayed at Lodge , to avoid having to drive home, after attending a anniversary affair.Directions on their website were excellent, check-in very efficient and easy.  Room very adequate, spacious and well appointed.   Complementary breakfast the following morning, along with local  newspaper.   Would certainly recommend this facility
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I have stayed here for three Summers and it is perfect.The rooms are beautifully cleaned,great free breakfast,very fast wifi.clean pool and close to shops beach and restaurants.What more can you wish for?The staff are so friendly and helpful and the hotel is ideal for families with kids.Our young grandkids loved it especially the daily chocolate treats from the bowl in reception. The hotel is beautifully maintained and a real credit to the owner. We will certainly be back next summer!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a great place to stay for a couple of nights while visiting friends in the area. It's just off of I-5, close to shopping and many places to eat. It's close to Laguna Beach without feeling crowded. Because of the way this motel is situated, it doesn't feel like you're in the middle of the action (though you are). Close to Laguna Beach, Disneyland, Irvine, etc. The room was comfortable and very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay here whenever we go to Disneyland and while it's not down the street it is quite quaint and breakfast is awesome.  A reasonably priced, extremely clean, very well kept place to stay.  There really is a lot of pride in ownership at this one.  It's almost as clean as Disneyland...not a leaf out of place...that kind of clean.  The rooms are nicely appointed and the staff is very helpful.  Nice pool and laundry facility on-site too. Safe area. Quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review.  As a family owned hotel we appreciate your input  such as "reasonably priced, extremely clean, very well kept".    Yes, we are close to Disneyland and the beach (Laguna and Dana Point) so we have quite a few guests that use us as a family headquarters to take day trips North, South and West.  We hope to see you again next summer.

Summary: Lovely hotel, pretty grounds and very well kept. Close to cafe's, Mall's and other shops. Well worth a visit staff very friendly and helpful will definitely visit again ðŸ˜€. Not far from the freeway about 1hr's drive down San Diego. LA is about 11/2 hours depending on traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review on our hotel.  Yes, we are next store to the Five Laguna's Mall so there are quite a few choices of restaurants and shopping.  Your comment is well take about the fact that we are about half way between LA and San Diego - it is one of the reasons we have so many European guests who are looking to see Southern California.  Please come back again soon.

Summary: Price and quality were above average, friendly staff,  great location, gardens and surrounding neighborhood  made us feel relaxed and comfortable.  Restaurants and  activities along the beach made it even more enticing.   CLEAN!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5.  Safe travels, we will see you again soon ^_^.

Summary: We booked our king bed room online.  Sometimes we are disappointed, but not this time.  The grounds were really nice.  The room was nicely decorated and very clean.  It had A/C, which is definitely needed in So. Calif. in August.  It was located between two highly-trafficked streets, but the sliding glass door to our second-story balcony was well sealed and insulated and the room was quiet.  They had an elevator which was very convenient.  There were several restaurants located within walking distance.  We didn't use their pool on this trip, because there was so much to do in the area.  We were in town for the Pageant of the Masters.
Manager Response: Thanks you for the great review and specific comments about "very clean" ... "grounds were really nice" ...  and "nicely decorated".  Also, we appreciate your acknowledgement about the sliding glass door being well "sealed and insulated" as our maintenance team makes a special effort to check windows to ensure quiet. As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: Surprised me, good price and near to many stores, mall, restaurants, etc... I had a very short stay, just a night, but was enough to realized how interested it would be with so many infrastructure around. Clean, and had everything that we need.
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review and feedback ^_^.

Summary Heading: Great atmosphere, very helpful and friendly staff would definitely stay again.
Summary: Loved the location, close to the beach and 20 minutes from Disney, located in a safe neighborhood. My only complaint is the Wi-fi signal is very low so we were unable to connect, it was no big deal we used our hot spot to power the kids tablets.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comment "Great atmosphere, very helpful...staff...".  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: This is our favorite place to stay when we go to Pageant of the Masters each July.  Always clean, very comfortable beds, absolutely everything we need including a fridge, microwave, safe, iron, and ironing board.  Plenty of free parking and free breakfast. Great staff, perfect wifi.  Not one single complaint.
Manager Response: Thank you for your headline "Another great stay!.  Thank you so much for your repeat business!!

Summary: We had an all around pleasant stay, which started with our being greeted with a smile and great service by Charlie at the front desk.  The room was nice and clean, beds comfy, and a free continental breakfast to boot! Not one of your upscale chain hotels, but a very nice, convenient place.  A good value for your money.  We would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank your for the five star review!!  We appreciate your comments about being greeted with a smile, and Charlie specifically.  We make every effort to provide our customers with great value.  Please come back and visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Location, but not much better than a Motel 6 or Super 8-Older place.
Summary: Location is great near I-5 and beaches. Nice restaurants within walking distance. Very friendly staff, pool, jacuzzi, free cont. breakfast (left too early to enjoy). The problem is the rooms. There are no hallways, this is a motel with parking lot right outside my room..very noisy, despite the fact I was told it would be quiet. Walls very thin..heard next door often. Carpets were dirty, room had bad odor..furniture from the 70's. Dark room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and positive comments (friendly staff, free continental breakfast, etc.)  about our hotel. We are sorry you had a "noisy stay", as parking was just outside your door.  As a solution, we would be happy to relocate you to a room on the second or third floor which will not have noise from the parking area (duel glaze windows and interior hallway doors). Again, please accept our apology for the noisy neighbor.

Summary: We arrived here quite early as we were calling on some relatives nearby for the afternoon and wanted to leave our luggage.  Our room wasn't ready but we were able to leave our luggage at reception and when we arrived later that evening they'd taken our luggage to our room which was a pleasant bonus.  The motel was fine and considering the price we'd paid (booked via Expedia) very good value. Close to a mall (though quite a number of empty lots here) and also close to a number of restaurants.  We had a comfortable room, wifi worked fine, the breakfast was perfectly adequate and a bonus was the inexpensive laundry facilities. As we were now into the 5th week of our travels this was an opportunity to get some essentials washed.  There's a pool, which we didn't use and ample car
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment "Very good value...".  Please visit us again soon ^_^.

Summary: This Hotel is extremely clean and well maintained. It is in a nice part of town and close to Laguna Beach. I'm actually a bit confused at their competitive rate. The same quality Hotel in Old Town San Diego is almost double. My wife and I are very big on clean! and we are very happy with this hotel. We have made it part of our regular routine after vacationing in San Diego to stop here before traveling further north. We highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5 and for your comment "Very Nice Place".

Summary: We booked this hotel last minute thru hoteltonight app, excellent place to stay.  They have everything you need in the room, plus some.  We enjoyed the pool & hot tub. Great continental breakfast the next day.  We stayed for 1 night while passing thru. Nice staff.
Manager Response: Jennifer, many thanks for your review score of 5 out of 5 ^_^.

Summary Heading: Filthy Horrid smelling gunk filled my sink while I slept!!
Summary: I had really wanted to like this hotel but sadly I could not! Stayed 1 night while attending a 2day conference nearby. While sleeping I kept smelling a hideous smell. I thought it might be from sheets since it seemed that it surrounded me. I kicked the sheets off me. I felt groggy in the morning and smelled the most awful toxic smell. I went to wash my face and found the sink was backed up and completely full with a terrible smelling black water. It smelled like gasoline! I called the front desk and complained. I didn't want to take a shower in case the water was contaminated in the shower also. I could not use the sink to put in my contact lenses or brush my teeth. They looked at the hideous black liquid that filled the sink and told me the room next to me had also complained
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and the detail in your comments.  We sincerely apologize for the problem next door which impacted you!  When there is a plumbing problem we are more than happy to relocate you to a nicer room, at no additional charge of course because you are inconvenienced, plus discount your stay.  We thank you for calling us to report the problem so we could deal with it ASAP, and for discussed it in person with members of our staff.  Again, please accept our sincere apology! We regret that you had this bad experience.

Summary: Here for Pageant of the Masters and fortunately found this place.  Great value for the Laguna area!  Convenient, reasonable- priced restaurants right across the street.   Would definitely stay again if we're in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5.  We are a short drive to the Pageant of the Masters, what a great event ^_^.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights in a 2 queen bed room, very clean and no issues whatsoever. Our room overlooked the immaculate gardens (B125) also a short walk to the breakfast room (free breky) and the pool area. My youngest loved the pool as did the adults, another nice touch is the free sweets at reception. Short walk to amenities, restaurants, Starbucks and a mall which is a bit tired but due for a makeover soon. This is a great area to explore the beaches of Laguna as only 10 mins away by car but half the price of a beach hotel. Overall a great stay and would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 5 out of 5 and for your feedback "Great place"!

Summary: We feel we always have an excellent room that is always accessible to my needs as a person with a disability. Friendly staff, and excellent breakfast choices served. There is a pool and laundry facilities on the premises
Manager Response: Thank your for taking the time to give us a five star review.  We appreciate your comments about our ADA accommodations, the "friendly staff" and "excellent" breakfast choices!  Let me add that several of our ADA guests have also found the convenience of the mall across the street as very helpful.  Please visit us again soon.

Summary: Pictures online - even the exterior of the place- make it look charming. Don't be fooled by the pretty flowers.  Shabby, small, cramped, smelly, ugly rooms surround (ugh) dirty, badly stained carpet.  The "free" breakfast is worth exactly what they are charging.  And they had the nerve to prominently display a tip jar!  Supposed to stay 2 nites, we couldn't wait to check out and pay a bit more for a name brand hotel down the road. Shameful!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We would like to point out to readers that the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence for five years in a row.  Also, on the largest on line travel agent website in the US - Expedia - we have 2,700+ reviews with 93% of guests recommending us.

Summary: Called 2 wks in advance direct to book because of special needs of husband. Promised a specific area - told not available when we checked in.  Someone had left dirty pj's beside the side chair  Side chair so dirty we threw a towel over it.  No extra TP and only a few sheets left onroll. Poor WIFI. cracked sink.  Very limited breakfast.  We were going to stay a week but could not deal with room and  noise from firestation across driveway.  Checked out as soon as we could.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Family run, friendly and well located
Summary: Located away from the beach (30 minutes) but near loads of shopping and restaurants this is an ideal location for families staying in the area. Nice buildings and room swathed in flowers and a nice pool at one end of the set of buildings. Pretty nice breakfast if you are happy with pastries, toast etc. Front desk staff really helpful eg had scales so I could weigh my luggage. Would stay here again but ask for an inward facing garden view room - the gardens are beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review.  We appreciate your comments.

Summary: Excellent value in a high-priced area - hotels in Orange County are expensive. This location is perfect - near a large mall and not far from the freeway.  The room was quite large with a garden view. Nice  breakfast. Would stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback on our "Ideal Location".  We are just across the street from the mall and Saddleback Hospital, City Hall is next door.

Summary: We stayed here because we booked accommodations for a wedding last minute and were priced out of surrounding hotels. I was very worried and almost refused to stay because its kind of creepy and grimy and very much like a motel. Everything was old and dated and with our baby I just did not feel comfortable. Well my husband convinced me to give it a try and it worked out fine. We were safe and didn't catch any bedbugs or diseases which is all i can hope for I suppose. I was glad to check out and be done with it though! We did partake in the free breakfast and it was simple but adequate (standard european free breakfast fare with yogurts, fruits, toast, coffee, juice, etc). I will not stay here again but was thankful it provided a cheap, safe, and non bug filled place to stay.
Manager Response: We were glad to hear that we provided you a "cheap, safe and non bug filled place to stay".  For the readers of this review we would like to point out that the Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence in each of the last five years.  Thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Nice place with a great price and location
Summary: I researched several hotels in this area and LHL had everything I like in a hotel. The price was very reasonable but I even got a lower price by using booking.com. LHL has a heated pool, complimentary continental breakfast, queen size beds, sink area outside the bathroom, full length mirror, microwave, mini fridge, large safe, friendly staff, work out room, non smoking rooms and a huge mall across the street along with several restaurants all in walking area. The large candy bowl is a special treat when you check in. Take a walk around the grounds as there are many flowers especially the beautiful roses by the Mariposa room. This hotel is a must while in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Barb: Thank you for your feedback "Nice place with a great price and location".

Summary: A very pleasant experience,comfortable with a window in the room that can be opened for some fresh air vs.AC. Enjoyed the landscaping and quality atmosphere.Centered to all the venues you could ask for....Great place to stay...I'll be back. Also a nice continental breakfast and fresh.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  We appreciate the details on your stay.  We read reviews carefully so we can consider guest feedback as we improve our property. Glad you will "be back",  please visit us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here because it was convenient to doctor and surgery center. Made a reservation for a specific room. I needed to have surgery.  Before pre-op visit, stopped to see if room was ready, this was at noon. Was told that the room was ready however, check in was at three and if I wished to get into the room earlier there would be a $30 charge. Since the room was ready, I asked why the charge, I was told it was a charge for early check-in.  I was told that I could come back at 1:30 and I would not be charged. I should have asked, had I not  made a reservation and just showed up wanting a room and they had a room available would they have told me to pay an extra $30 or to come back later?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We were glad to hear that we could accommodate your early check in at 1:30 PM (check-in starts at 3:00 PM). The $30 early check-in charge is available to help guests who need a very early check and we need to assign extra staff to prepare the room early.

Summary: There were lots of lovely roses. Lots of different colors too. Creeping bougainvilla added the beauty to the outside walls. I spent hours taking pictures here. There were also cactus-like plants in the garden. The room was average. The size was okay. The carpet was a bit flimsy. Beds, pillows, mattress and bed linens were all average. Wifi was free and okay. Breakfast was free but only for two. Extra persons needs to pay $5 each. Food was great and variety.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment on our gardens, we have 450 rose bushes and 80 clematis / bougainvellla.

Summary Heading: Fire station across the street - take your ear plugs
Summary: Lots of beautiful roses & bougainvilla around the grounds. Decent pool & fitness center. The included breakfast is generous. The rooms are dated but clean and a decent size and come with free wifi. For the price it's okay if you want to be In this area. Just beware of the fire station and sirens across the street. There may be some rooms in a quiet location but not in the building near the street. The air conditioner is a wall unit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  BTW, all of our rooms have dual glazed windows.  We encourage our guests to test our rooms for quiet.

Summary Heading: Old rooms, worn carpets, musky stinky inside, but beautiful outside
Summary: The hotel was booked as part of a low price package that comes with air tickets for me and my spouse. We saw the picture of the standard room of Laguna Hills Lodge and it looked fine. It was another story actually standing inside the room and assessing the general accommodation area.   We stayed for three (3) nights; May 19-21, 2016.  Here are our findings and observations:    1) Smelly, musky odor was very noticeable when we arrived on the first day. It was coming mainly from the very old carpeting of the building (we stayed in Building C). 2) The room and hall way leading to all the rooms need major renovation. The wear and tear on everything was quite evident.  3) The bed linens, pillow cases, and bed runners are already worn. You can feel that they lost much of their regular
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I appreciate the detail in your review.  Please let me know which room you stayed in and I will look into it myself.  I encourage you to let us know if you have any problem so that we can address it right away. Should you find a room has a musty odor we are happy to change your room and do a deep cleaning in the old room.  As far as finding a bug we definitely want to address this immediately.  Were you on the first floor near a garden area? We have a pest control service that makes sure we don't have bug problems.  We have gone the extra step of including dogs in the pest control service to sniff out any issues. We are glad to hear you found our housekeeping staff friendly. Again, thanks for your input.

Summary Heading: Quality is seen and felt everywhere!
Summary: First class lodging for staying close enough to the beaches and stores in Orange County! We chose this for the rating, but also the price and the amenities. It's also a straight shot down to Laguna Beach. It was very clean and the beds were comfortable. The gardens are immaculate and give the place a touch of quiet and serenity. The only complaint is that there was no elevator to get to the second floor in our building.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment "Quality is seen and felt everywhere".  We appreciate your business, please come back again soon!

Summary: We have stayed twice and have booked for August. Great pool area, grounds are very pretty. Rooms are very clean and roomy,  free wi if and good reception.front desk are very friendly. Breakfast served in the am good selection. Loved very close to many good restaurants if you don't want to drive. Laguna beach is down the hill about 20 minutes.. Can't go wrong with great prices tooðŸ˜„
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We appreciate your comments about "rooms are very clean"," front desk is very friendly", and breakfast had a "good selection".  See you in August.

Summary: We stayed here over the past 4 years while visiting our son attending college in the area.  Laguna Hills Lodge offers a consistently comfortable and affordable option in the heart of Orange County.  The rooms are well appointed with the most comfortable bed on the planet, a mini fridge, microwave, safe, desk with charging station and full cable package.  Plus a breakfast with many options including cold cereals, muffins/pastries, fresh fruit, toast/bagels, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, coffee/tea, milk, etc.  We used the hot tub and swimming pool.  There is also a gym and sauna.  You are near the highway 5 and El Toro but if you reserve a room facing the courtyard, you hear the sounds of the water fountain and have a view of the beautiful landscaping.  There is a fire station on the
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us, we love you too ^_^.

Summary: Clean, Comfortable, Great Location, and Friendly!  Whenever we head to the South Orange County area we stay here and love it. The location is close to everything, stores, restaurants, and the freeway, but the property is quiet and peaceful. The beds are comfy and the rooms well appointed. I hesitated writing a review because I wanted to keep this delightful secret to ourselves, but we also wanted to support the great management at this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to do a review.  We appreciate your feedback.  I will pass on to my team your first sentence "Clean, Comfortable, Great Location and Friendly"! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Great place in the middle of Laguna Hills. Very quiet considering the proximity to busy streets. Clean room, nice atmosphere, free light breakfast. Staff was accommodating when we requested to check in early. Don Jose restaurant is a short walk-highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your headline "Perfect Spot".  We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: Hotel is in a nice area with shopping and plenty of food choices. Hotel grounds are beautiful. Easy, efficient check in. Our room was in the three story building with an elevator. Room was large,decorated nicely with a comfy bed. Breakfast was ok, nothing special. Although we did not use, the pool area looked inviting.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.

Summary: Only stayed one night but check in and out were fast, friendly and helpful. I requested to stay in Building C as it was 3 stories with an elevator. The 2 story buildings did not have an elevator. The king bed room was nicely appointed, clean, nice toiletries and had a variety of lighting. I never could figure out how to turn one of the lamps on though.... Nice available plug ins for electronic charging.
Manager Response: Love your first sentence "...fast, friendly and helpful". If you have any questions in the future (about a lamp or anything else) just call the front desk and they will be happy to help you. Thanks for the review.

Summary: The hotel staff is very friendly and the hotel is super clean. The landscaping is BEAUTIFUL! laundry facilities at the pool were adequate and the front desk happy gave change for the machine. Starbucks, Laguna hills mall, mothers market organic grocery, CVS, and much more is all within walking distance. Room 214A was huge and cleaner than most corporate chain hotel rooms. The decor is somewhat dated but the space and cleanliness makes up for it. Mattress very firm (too firm for me but the hubs loved it). Great value for the $$$!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Stayed here on a Fridau night restuarants, shopping everything very close. Great bed slept through the night very quite. Continental Breakfast was very good! From the start check in staff and and staff at the Maricopa room for breakfast were very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5!
