Summary: My husband and I booked this motel based on photos and previous reviews however it really didn't live up to our expectations.  We asked for a quiet room, we got a room with an ice machine directly outside that sounded like a 747 taking off - yes I'm a drama queen but it was loud!!  2nd room was better however the balcony was opposite the smoking area so we weren't able to sit  outside without the stench of smoke drifting our way.  The gym is very basic, no towels, no water and the air-con is set to 71 - very warm when working out!!  Breakfast was a basic continental buffet style however there was a sign requesting you take only one of each item and the toast/bagels were by request to a staff member who would heat them for you so pretty much everything was monitored.  Rooms were
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We were happy to be able to relocate you to a balcony room from your room next to an ice machine.  We apologize that the machine was noisy and will ask a service man to look into it. Yes, we provide a free continental breakfast for two, plus children under ten are free.  We do prepare toast and bagels to order for our guests. Regarding the I-5, it is a block away. The Ashley's / Total Wine shopping center is between us and the I-5.  All of our guest rooms have dual-glaze windows to minimize noise but we apologize that the highway or the fire station was noisy during your stay. We appreciate you taking time to provide your feedback.

Summary: The accommodation is ideal for up to large groups. The area is out of town so it's necessary to take a taxi or shuttle arrangement prior to arrival. There are many shops around, Mall's, Restaurants and basically everything else. The Lodge is a good, clean and friendly environment, equipped with a heated pool and jacuzzi. I just had a great time there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review!

Summary: Because map quest wanted to put us on a toll road that didn't take cash, we became lost on our way to Laguna.  Fortunately, we found our hotel and although we were too early to check in, the receptionist couldn't have been kinder.  He gave us very good directions to the beach and suggestions for restaurants we could walk to from the inn.  When we did check in, the room was clean and quite large.  The bed was comfy and the toiletries were quite nice.  The breakfast was a bit sparse.  All in all this was a great place to stay and I would definitely choose this inn if I was in this area again.
Manager Response: We were glad to hear our Front Desk was helpful ^_^.  Glad you enjoyed your stay, please come back and visit soon.

Summary: I really like this place. I'm kinda not sure exactly why, but I really do. I had to give it 4 stars because, while in many ways it isn't perfect, it really isn't just average. So, this is a motel- you enter your room from the outside. I don't like motels and never stay at them. I prefer hotels and generally ones that are in the mid range. This isn't really mid range either... (I'm going to write a bunch of things that seem negative, but please keep reading anyway.). The beds are old. The bedspreads are the old kind that don't normally get washed between guests, that normally give me the creeps. The breakfast is minimal - cold items (fruit/cereal) and they will toast breads for you. Nonetheless, I really like this place!  It is quaint and cute, and really romantic. I stayed here
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: What a beautiful place Roses every where
Summary: We were very happy staying here if we could we would have stayed another night. The rooms were very clean,the rest room especially was clean.Every one was very nice. I loved the outside so many beautiful flowers,so many roses. The Continental Breakfast was great, plenty to eat.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, and for taking time to provide detial in your comments.  Regarding the beautiful flowers, we 350 varieties of roses and 450 rose bushes so April is a good time to visit ^_^.

Summary: We were so happy to discover the Laguna Hills Lodge! We were warmly welcomed at our late night check in and that hospitality remained throughout our stay. The room was immaculate and quiet. The property is well maintained and the staff is outstanding! Very affordable and a convenient location to many nearby attractions. We will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: We are happy that you discovered us too!  We appreciate your comment that your "room ws immaculate adnd quiet", and you were "warmly welcomed".  Customer feedback is important so we appreciate your remarks. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: The place I go to when visiting CA
Summary: This was the third time I've stayed at Laguna Lodge and it has been consistently great. Affordable and convenient. Its been a number of years since my last stay so it looks a little older, but still clean and friendly. Also, surroundings a little more congested since last time but I was quite surprised how quiet it was at night, The breakfast was more than adequate and the staff very friendly.  New mattresses, very comfy.I will stay there again.  The location is close to major freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your headline "The place I go to when visiting CA"!

Summary: What a wonderful place to stay.  From the moment you get there you are treated as a very special guest.  This is not a chain.  The furniture in the rooms is beautiful, the flower garden takes your breathe away, the staff is friendly and professional.  Skip the expensive chains and enjoy the peace and tranquility of the lodge.  You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review.  Yes, we are a family owned hotel, not a chain.  We value guest feedback so thanks for taking the time to provide details on your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit ^_^.

Summary: We were amazed by the Laguna Hills Lodge! The price was incredibly affordable, which was wonderful. And the property is large and accommodating. What stood out especially, was that the rooms were perfect and the property is so well taken care of. The owners obviously care deeply about the hotel and land. The landscaping is taken care of so well that each day you notice something more wonderful. The staff is beyond kind and helpful.  There is no other hotel in 50 miles of Laguna Hills that cares more about the property or the guests. In a rating of 0-100 Laguna Hills Lodge well earns a 100+
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Yes, we care a lot about this hotel that we have owned since 1972.  I'll pass on your comments to our staff.

Summary Heading: Our twice-annual "home away from home" during family visits
Summary: We're guests for life (OK, for as long as we come during my elderly mom's lifetime, that is) because of the budget-friendly value and first-rate amenities and commodations.  Breakfast choices are excellent (half-dozen cold cereals, toasted-to-order pastries and baked goods, two juices, hard-boiled eggs, fruit, two brands of yogurts). The variety of bakery itenms include muffins, bagels, breads, croissants, English muffins.  Roons are spacious, bright, modern and include mini-fridge with freezer.  Convenient to freeway, malls (including Irvine Spectrum), fine dining and casual restaurantsm, brew oubs and LA Fitness.  Uktra-cordial desk staff and housekeepers, who do a top-notch job each morning by 10 a.m. if wanted.
Manager Response: What a great comment ..."We're guests for life".  Thanks for staying wiht us!  We appreciate your business, and the the details in your review - because it helps us improve.

Summary: I really enjoyed my experience at the Laguna Hills Lodge. The beds are extremely comfortable and the house keepers keep everything really clean and tidy. The landscape is gorgeous, and the complimentary breakfast has a variety of foods to choose from. I also really enjoy the European feel. I would recommend this hotel to everyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We are very proud of our housekeeping staff because they do such a great job of keeping all of our guest rooms very, very clean.  Please visit again soon.  FYI, we are a family owned hotel - since 1972.

Summary: My boyfriend and I loved staying here. The front desk staff was so friendly and was awesome at giving suggestions and directions! The whole place was cute and the bed was SO comfortable! Breakfast in the morning was a plus :)
Manager Response: Glad to hear the front desk staff was so "friendly".  Thanks for staying with us!  I appreciate your comment about the bed being "SO comfortable" because we installed all new Simmons mattresses thrughout the hotel in 2015. Nice to know the mattresses were a good investment.  Please vist us again soon.

Summary: Had a one night stay in the hotel.  It was our first time and I just decided to choose this hotel because of the positive reviews and I was Right!!!!! They have very  good staff and room was spotless.  The moment we opened the door of the room.... We immediately jumped on the bed because it was so clean and smells really good! The hotel has this vintage look , a  little bit old but well maintained.  Very good breakfast and great location.  Will come back again!
Manager Response: Your headline "Spotless" is right on, clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in online guest reviews ^_^.

Summary: A really nice place. Older and unique. Beautiful mature landscaping, roses and bougainvillea. Very helpful staff. Good value. Enjoyable pool area. We walked to medical appointments, retail and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review, we appreciate your feedback.  I will pass on your comments to my staff "really nice place ...  very helpful staff".  Yes, it is an advantage to our guests to have the  Laguna Hills Mall  and Saddleback Memorial Hospital just accross the stret ^_^.

Summary: Laguna Hills Lodge is perfect. The grounds are beautiful, the staff is friendly and helpful and the rooms are clean and comfortable and quiet. It was easy to find off I-5. Breakfast was good with plenty of choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment "Perfect Hotel".  As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: Great location, Directly off of I5.  Laguna Hills Mall across street.  Excellent value.  Clean rooms.  All staff was very friendly.  Breakfast was OK but would have been better with more hot items.  Will stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking time out of your busy schedule to write a review.  We appreciate your comments about "great location ... excellent value ... clean rooms".  Please come back and visit again ^_^.

Summary: Friendly staff, quick check-in, spotless room, everything in working order, comfortable bed, nice toiletries. The WIFI worked well and the coupon for Breakfast at Chick-filet provided a number of breakfast options. The hotel was easy to access from I-5 and close to restaurants, Starbucks and shopping. Lovely property and grounds. It is an older hotel but has been updated and well maontained.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5.

Summary: Very nice room, exceptionally nice staff, great value. Will stay there whenever in that area again.  Better than average free breakfast.  Didn't use heated pool, but it sure looked nice. Convenient location to expressway with easy access.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and comment "Wonderful Experience".

Summary: We were in town for several days.  The previous evening we had stayed at a hotel that was truly awful.  We checked out of there and into Laguna Hills Lodge.  What a relief.  This place was like an oasis.  Firstly, the beds are incredibly comfortable.  Wow.  Got the best night's sleep here.  The room was comfortable, cozy and well decorated.  I love the fact that the decor is more traditional.  I live in a town where everything is contemporary in style and it's gotten old.  So staying at this lodge was great.  Kind of has an english feel to it.  Lace in some windows, shutters in others.  Vines growing up walls, a fountain, boxwood hedges, hummingbird feeders, etc.  And roses everywhere.  Some have complained in the reviews about street noise.  We didn't find it bothersome.  This
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We were happy to receive your feedback that your room was "comfortable, cozy and well decorated".  As a family owned hotel since 1972 we value guest feedback so thanks for taking the time to provide your thoughts on us.

Summary: The staff, to a person, were friendly and helpful.  The rooms are a bit dated, with a rattling AC unit and older bath.  However, the yare quiet (no street noise) and parking is convenient.  A breakfast is included, and there are plenty of restaurants nearly.  We would stay here again in the future.  Location and price are the beiggest sellig points for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your comment about our "friendly staff".  As a family owned hotel since 1972 we make a special effort to hire helpful staff members.  We appreciate the detail in your review and discuss customer feedback at weekly management meetings.  We look forward to your next stay with us and please, if you have a problem with your A/C let us know and our maintenance team will fix it or replace it immediately.

Summary Heading: Great value for the price and polite people
Summary: Friendly, polite staff, clean rooms and pool area; close to major roads to access Laguna Beach / Canyon area.  Lots of options for continental breakfast.  Too bad the balcony in the room is not accessible.
Manager Response: Mary, thank so much for your review and feedback "Friendly...clean...".

Summary: Nothing but good things to say about this place. Fast and efficient check in and out process. Hotel is very clean, immaculately kept grounds. Good breakfast. Very quiet and close to conveniences like grocery stores and such. great location
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review and the details in your feedback ("clean... good breakfast, quiet... great location").  We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  As a family owned hotel since 1972 let me say that we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: On the way down from LAX  to San Diego.  Stopped here as  it's close to the highway.  Delayed at the airport but the reception was cool with it  and had us booked in quickly and efficiently The room  was large clean and welcoming after the flight and entry problems. Breakfast  was supposed to be continental but was enough and varied.  Checkout was as efficient as arrival.
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review.

Summary: Went to San Juan Capistrano for Valentines Day:  See the Mission, concert at the Coach House.  This hotel was only 10 minutes away from both and very easy to get to off the I-5.  Walking distance to a great wine store, numerous restaurants.  Wonderful heated pool, hot tub and male/female dry saunas.  Didn't get the King room I ordered on Expedia, but the Queen was ok.  Stayed for 2 nights.  Very clean room for an older hotel.  Super-friendly staff and very comfy bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for taking time to provide details ("clean room ... comfy bed, walking distance to restaurants... etc.") on your stay with us. We value guest feedback, and discuss reviews at our weekly management meetings.  As a family owned hotel since 1972 let me say thank you for your business!

Summary: We stayed at Laguna hills Lodge for three nights in January 16 ,check in was fast and our room was clean and comfortable ,although the room was quite dated it was spotless.There are shops within walking distance and restaurants .
Manager Response: BTW, "clean" is the #1 compliment we receive in guest reviews.  Thank you for your feedback.  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: Couldn't ask for a better experience
Summary: My Fiance and I were attending a convention in Las Vegas and we decided to vacation prior in and around Los Angelos for a few days. We scoured the reviews prior to booking a hotel and after spending 3 nights at the Laguna Hills Lodge, I am pleased to say we made an excellent choice. The staff was very friendly and accommodating, the room was very nice and the property was quiet and relaxing. I think you would be hard pressed to find a better value. Laguna Hills is a beautiful area and it's close to whatever we wanted to do. Not only would I highly recomend this hotel, I can assure we will be back the next time our travels bring us this way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment "Couldn"t ask for a better experience."

Summary: This Lodge is an oasis in the desert. Its beautifully kept grounds and quaint charm is peaceful and inviting. The rooms are spacious and ours had a balcony overlooking the fountain. The pool spa area is clean and well cared for with sauna and fitness equipment available. The included continental breakfast is quite adequate.  The rates make it a must return stay!
Manager Response: As a family owned hotel since 1972 we appreciate your feedback and love your comment "Lodge is an oasis" ^_^.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Stayed while home was under construction. Staff; Jim & Roland were great professional front desk personnel. Most memorable & treasured was my dear Nevine & Charlie; stellar & compassionate customer service!!!! Great location, close to all the amenities within walking distance. Want to thank owner, Mr. Crawford for creating a lovely lodge making our stay comfortable, a home away from home!!!
Manager Response: We love your comment "Home away from home", and appreciate your feedback about Roland and Jim.  We will pass on your kind words. Thanks for your business. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Stay here frequently for business trips in the area
Summary: This hotel has extremely friendly and competent staff in the front office and equally nice housekeeping staff.  The place is beautifully landscaped and provides a beautiful quiet and tranquil place to escape to after busy day elsewhere.  The majority of my bookings have been through Hotels.com and the staff at Laguna Hills Lodge handled all of those reservations with no issue or difference than other bookings.  In fact, because I stay there frequently, the staff in the front office as well as housekeeping always treat me with courtesy and greet me as a valued returning guest..
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about our "friendly" front desk and housekeeping staffs.  As a family owned hotel since 1972 we value your business.  We have weekly meetings with our managemnt team and share guest reviews so we can improve.  The details in your review are very helpful.  Thanks again for your business!

Summary Heading: IT'S A DUMP. THEY WILL OVERCHARGE YOUR CREDIT CARD. THEY WILL NOT HONOR HOTELS.COM OR HOTWIRE RESERVATIONS
Summary: This place is a scam. If you book and pay like I did via HOTELS.COM or HOTWIRE they will make you pay them directly and not honor your pre-paid room.  I was also charged for additional nights even though I had checked out. They claimed someone else extended my stay, even though the room was in my name, and I checked out after feeling unsafe, and they had no security on site to help with such issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  When you book with Hotels.com (we do not use Hotwire) your reservation contract is with them, so our hotel can not change your reservation. Regarding safety, we are located in a very safe city and the police department is next door.

Summary Heading: A nice place in the middle of it all
Summary: Booked there for 3 days. Clean, reasonable, friendly, and easy access off the I 5. I must say that for the money it is the best deal around. Very satisfied. Continental breakfast is basic, and we found a little something healthy to eat. the Spectrum is nearby ans well as the Laguna Hills mall. I will stay here again the next time I need to go to that area. Served us well for 1/3rd the price of others in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: I stayed overnight at the Laguna Hills Lodge while my place in Laguna Woods was being painted.  I was pleasantly surprised at the friendly service and quality of the room.  I now will recommend it to my friends and will book anyone coming to visit me there.
Manager Response: We are glad you stayed with us. We appreciate your comments about our "friendly service" and the "quality of the room".  Since you live in Laguna Woods, let me say that the Lodge was originally build by twenty gentlemen from Laguna Woods as the spare bedroom for the residents in Laguna Woods (aka Liesure World).  We are strategically located between the Laguna Hills Mall, Laguna Woods and Saddleback Memorial Hospital so it looks like they were pretty smart about the location ^_^.

Summary: I stayed here after weather grounded my flight home. A nice little hotel. I would've stayed here my whole trip if I knew how nice it was. Much better value than the Wyndham I stayed at. Inexpensive but clean rooms and friendly staff. Didn't try the continental breakfast so can't comment.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review score of 5 out of 5.

Summary Heading: Feel at home at the Lodge !
Summary: I received a very warm welcome at the reception desk.  The room was very clean, and comfortable, cleaned every day, by friendly ladies. The people at the restaurant were very nice, very  helpful.They gave me good advice every time I asked them. I really enjoyed feeling they cared for me. At the reception desk , they took time to help me and laugh with me. Next time I travel to Laguna Hills, I will bring presents for them, because they really made me feel like family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business and for taking time to write a review. We appreciate your comments about our friendly staff!!

Summary: I chose to stay here while on a visit to see my daughter as it is the closest property to where my daughter lives. My first impression was of the staff. As friendly as could be and went the extra mile to make me comfortable. I had an immediate request to change rooms from a room with 2 beds to another with just one. Request granted within 5 minutes. Even though they were pretty heavily booked. The rooms are clean and the free wifi, fridge AND microwave were very much appreciated. They also provide a continental breakfast for two daily. Again, the staff attitude was upbeat and helpful. This was a most pleasant stay and I was made to feel very welcome. The big bowl of candy bars at the front desk was a treat. I will be back in a few months and I am already looking forward to my
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review score of 5 out of 5 ^_^.

Summary: This hotel is close to our daughters school and we are international visitors.  Clean, quiet and comfortable. We were lucky to have a courtyard room facing all the beautiful Christmas lights. We are returning for sure :)
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments - "clean, quiet and comfortable".  Glad you liked our Christmas lights. ^_^ We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great accommodations wonderful and helpful staff clean rooms beautiful gardens and especially close to great shopping malls will definitely stay again pool looked and felt refreshing sauna and breakfast were a delight
Manager Response: Hi Michael:  Thanks so much for your feedback "Awesome"!

Summary: Good value! Good choices for continental breakfast, clean rooms, and very reasonable prices. Have stayed here many times over the years and have always been pleased. For a non-chain hotel, I think it's a great choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary Heading: Underwhelmed with facility but breakfast and service very good.
Summary: We read so many good reviews I guess my expectations were too high. We did use our credit card points, and really got a great deal. It is very small, tucked behind a main shopping road, and close to the freeway, far enough away to not hear it but close enough to hope on freeway in your car. The "courtyard" is very cute, but it is tiny, and most of the rooms are facing outward to the parking lot. While you can tell they remodeled inside, it was questionable: the wallpaper was peeling and there was still popcorn ceilings. The biggest surprise was that it is across from a fire station!!! I slept horribly the first night due to sirens, and neighbors upstairs checking in late. Could hear them talking through the thin walls. There was no central thermostat, just a loud heater/ac unit.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We appreciate your comments about our â€œcuteâ€ courtyard, â€œ remodeledâ€ rooms, and â€œnicely keptâ€ pool /spa.  We are sorry about the noise from the fire station.  As you know, some days are busier than others for them, and when duty calls they must respond.  We have installed dual glaze windows throughout the property to mute noise.  We will have our maintenance team look into the wallpaper and A/C issue you brought to our attention.  Again, thank you for your feedback, we are always trying to improve.

Summary: This is a small cute hotel nestled in the middle of city atmosphere. The rooms are average. The Garden is small but wonderfully cute and depending on your mood, it can even be romantic. Breakfast room is a decent size and overall service is great. I had work in the area and simply needed a hotel for the night.  This was perfect for a safe, reasonable, and comfortable night stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us!

Summary: Laugua Hills Lodge is a nice place to stay. It is conveniently located off the freeway and has many shopping and dinning choices close by.   The rooms seem to have been updated not all that long ago and considering it is close by to so many conveniences it was pretty quite. What was truly redressing about Laguna Hills Lodge was their friendly and helpful staff.   For the money this is a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review and feedback "clean".

Summary: Second time staying here.  Very reasonably priced, great location and a lovely setting surrounded by beautiful gardens.  Very clean and comfortable.  Although we did not use the pool area, it looked lovely.
Manager Response: Hello Karen:  Thanks so much for your review!

Summary: In April I stayed here, and sheets were dirty so I had them changed and I stayed. Last week I was to stay again,but after calling them twice to change king bed to queen beds, and received 2 promises it was done,but  the day before my stay they told me that I couldn't do that. Only through Expedia. And Expedia no longer had rooms with them. They have received many bad reviews, but I kept trying to give the benefit of the doubt. They are very unaccommodating, need updating, have a crummy breakfast, and not worth staying with so many better options.
Manager Response: We are sorry you were unhappy with your first and second stay with us.  Since we have a wonderful relationship with Expedia with 2,282 guest reviews, and 97% of guests recommending us, we are unsure which "many bad reviews" you are referring to.  Also, we have won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence in each of the last five years. It perhaps goes without saying that our ratings would not be so high with dirty sheets.  Thank you again for your thoughts.

Summary Heading: Great find in a good location!
Summary: This is an older hotel but well maintained. Rooms were nice and clean. Very nice plants and flowers around the hotel.  We were there for one night so we did not get to use the pool and we did not get to eat breakfast because we wanted to leave before they served breakfast. We enjoyed our brief stay and would stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback "Great find...".

Summary: For the area it offers value.  Rooms, linens, etc are a little "tired" but generally well maintained.  Housekeeping is mostly OK althoigh inconsistent - skimpy with soap, plastic glasses, fresh sheet changes, etc.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  Please come back soon !

Summary: We booked LHL on Tingo and crossed our fingers. It was a great experience for a great price! Check in went smoothly and they fixed my reservation that I'd bungled online. The grounds are lovely and room was comfortable. It's right next to and across from a variety of restaurants. So I highly recommend this little lodge in Laguna Hills!
Manager Response: Hello Ellen:  Thanks for your feedback "Excellent value, location and room".

Summary: Very complete; clean, comfortable, quiet and close to freeway and local shops and restaurants and friendly staff.   My room had an unexpected walkout balcony (small but a nice added space) with full sliding door.   There is a pool with relaxing sitting area and workout room.   Im very glad I tried out the Laguna Hills Lodge and plan to stay there again when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks you for your review score of 5 out of 5^_^.

Summary: We spent 3 nights at the Laguna Hills Lodge while attending a wedding in SoCal.  The rate we received online was exceptional for the area.  The hotel itself is a bit dated, but the location, ambiance, and price more than made up for it.  Our room was very clean and comfortable.  The bed seemed to have a memory foam type of mattress that I personally found quite comfortable.  There was a large arm chair with footstool, a chair and desk, and  a decent sized flat screen tv with plenty of channels.  The toilet and shower area were small and the sink, vanity, and mirror were outside the bathroom itself.  The grounds of this property are just beautiful with a lot of flowers and plants.  The pool and hot tub area are excellent.  The continental breakfast is more than adequate with
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review!!

Summary: Was looking for a new hotel to stay at and I was glad I booked this hotel.Friendly staff close to everything,room was quiet and comfortable.Was nice to have breakfast available had everything that I needed for the day.Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!

Summary: Great place to stay. The staff is very helpfull, a special thank to Charlie who helped us out with our rental car. The rooms are very clean, breakfast has a wide choice. If you are looking for a clean and normal priced hotel, this is the one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback "Great place".

Summary Heading: Continues to be our favorite hotel in Southern Orange County, CA
Summary: Laguna Hills Lodge continues to be our preferred place to stay when we travel to Southern Orange County.  We fly into Orange County Airport at least once a year to visit family.  This hotel is an easy drive south from the airport, and is easily accessible from the freeway.  It is close to people we visit in Mission Viejo, Laguna Hills, and Aliso Viejo (areas south of Irvine).  Even though it is located on busy streets with stores nearby, the hotel grounds contain an abundance of beautiful well-groomed flowers and trees, many of which are located in a quiet garden area between hotel buildings.  The rooms are very adequate for our needs; only one minor complaint is the bathroom is on the small side.  Hotel staff are always very friendly and accommodating.  We always partake in the
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you again soon ^_^.

Summary: Very clean, nice room. Breakfast was good with employees there to help you with anything. They also had trays which we could take back to our room with fresh fruit, coffee, juice, bagels, or muffins. It's a good value and owned and operated by kind people.
Manager Response: Hello Linda:  Thanks for your comment "Great place...".

Summary Heading: Phenomenally good price for this area
Summary: You cannot beat the price for this hotel in the Laguna area. It is close to a mall and multiple restaurants making it extremely convenient for business travelers. It is an older establishment, and that shows, but the staff is very accomodating and courteous. The breakfast was not impressive. I would recommend looking at one of the nearby restaurants unless you only want a minimal continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.

Summary: We were in California for a week to visit family and see the sites.  We only spent two nights here, but it was so nice, we'll be back to stay longer!  It was a good location for the places we wanted to visit, at a very good price.  Our room was large and very tastfully decorated.  The beds were comfortable, and although the breakfast was somewhat limited, it was nice and just enough to get us started on our day.  The grounds are beautiful, and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  It's a family business, and they really enjoy what they do and that shows in their service!  Thanks and we'll be back again.
Manager Response: Many thanks for the five star review!!

Summary: The place i stayed in was a very cleaned and very peaceful. The overall friendliness of costumer service was great.  For couples its a great hotel to enjoy a weekend together. What i really liked was that there was a lot of places to eat and shop near by. The distance to the beach was not far from the hotel. I would greatly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business!

Summary: This was a place I wish I had stayed longer than just 2 nights. Laguna Hills Lodge is very clean, and peaceful. The beds were very comfortable, and the grounds were very well kept and beautiful.  Check-in and check out were easy and the staff was delightful. Parking was an A+ experience.  Definitely would stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your comment "Very pleasant".

Summary Heading: A very good alternative to staying in Laguna Beach
Summary: We needed to visit Laguna Beach for a Wedding in August and didn't fancy the hotels on offer because of price, facilities and reviews. So we looked around and found this gem of a place 10 minutes from Laguna Beach. The booking came with good room size, parking, aircon, good beds and CLEAN bedding every day AND a good breakfast in the deal also. Its also right next door to Laguna Hills shopping Mall and a Brrewhouse. Our friends who had stayed in Laguna Beach joined us for the last of a three day stay and were really impressed by this hotel. You should check it out if you're visiting.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great little hotel in a great location! Very clean! Very homey! A really nice change from the cookie cutter chain hotels! Reasonable driving distance to many beautiful beaches. And the staff was very helpful and accommodating!!! Best customer service we have had at a hotel in a very long  time! Can't wait to go back next time we are in the area!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your headline "Great Hotel! Great Location!"

Summary: My family stayed here for three glorious weeks in August.The hotel is perfect.We could drive right up to the door of the well equipped room.Rooms were immaculately cleaned by pleasant hard working staff.Reception staff were friendly and helpful as were the breakfast staff.The continental breakfast had a wide choice and was complimentary. The pool was beautifully maintained and was a pleasant temperature.The hotel is very family friendly which is such a bonus. Near to eve real shopping malls,lots of restaurants,the freeway and a short drive to lovely beaches. We have stayed here before and are intending to return next Summer
Manager Response: Hi Steve:  Thanks so much for your five star review!!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good value for money
Summary: Stopped here 1 night. Was a very pleasant hotel to stay in. Staff on reception polite and friendly. Room was clean, comfortable, had a dining alcove with fridge and microwave. Close to shopping centres etc. WFI worked well. Would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.

Summary: I stayed for Three days with four people, two adults and two children.  The room was clean and comfortable.  I stayed in a balcony room in building B.  The view of the garden from the balcony was beautiful.  My children had difficulty connecting to the wifi with their tablets.  I had no trouble with my phone.  The pool area was clean and well kept.  The pool was larger than many hotel pools I have seen.  The pool area had comfortable furniture in good repair.  I did not use the gym but I peaked in and it was clean.  It did not smell like a gym.  The laundry room is small but clean.  There are two washers and two dryers.  I did have to wait to use the laundry facilities.  The breakfast was continental.  There were several pastries to choose from.  Bananas, apples, assorted
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review.

Summary Heading: Glad we chose the Laguna Hills Lodge
Summary: No regrets about staying here during s visit to parents at nearby Laguna Woods.  Room not large but well appointed and clean Bed exceptionally comfortable Reception staff very courteous and welcoming  Towels plentiful  Breakfast nothing special, with dry cereals, fruit, yoghurt, bagels and packaged/industrial pastries  Beautifully landscaped gardens.  Book a garden view room for the quiet  Access from the freeway is excellent  Close to stores and amenities
Manager Response: As a family owned business we thank you for your business!

Summary: Good service and location.  Rooms clean and comfortable.  Free continental  breakfast.  Gym, small outdoor pool and jacuzzi add to amenities.  Also, Internet works well, with small business center providing computers and printers.  Overall, excellent value for money.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Disappointed with the check out policy...
Summary: This hotel was perfect for what we were looking for. Just an overnight stay close to the freeway. We stayed in building C and the room was large and clean. Both men working at the front desk were very nice. However, this was the hottest day of the year, the temperature was 100F and our air con was not working properly.  We got in late and when we first turned on the air it was load. 5 minutes later the sound changed and it got extremely load and 12 minutes in we both started to sneeze like it was an old air filter as well. We had to turn it off. We tried to open the window but it was facing the street so it was noisy and since it was so hot outside that did not help. Basically we were twisting and turning all night sweating up the sheets and even having to take cold showers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize that your air conditioner did not work properly.  Whenever we have a problem with an A/C we are more than happy to have our maintenance team fix it immediately or replace it, especially on a hot day.  Regarding our check-out policy, we let guests know that check-out is at 11:00 AM so we can prepare rooms for the next guest who will check-in at 3:00 PM.  I assure you that we try to show as much flexibility as possible.   Thank you for your understanding.

Summary: Stayed with the family for a summer vacation at the beach. The hotel is in a super location with a range of nearby restaurants, shops and fast food outlets and malls and other attractions just a short drive away. The rooms are a little dated but clean and comfortable and the breakfast is varied and well managed. Staff were super friendly, especially to our three young children - would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Hotel is immaculate! Great area, beautiful grounds, and very friendly, and helpful staff! The rooms are large, with a wonderful view, the pool area stays open till 11:00 pm, great to unwind before you pack it in for the night. The continental breakfast is one of the best I've had! Check it out, & Check on in, you won't be sorry!
Manager Response: Many thanks for your  star review ^_^.

Summary: This is a very nice lodge in Lake Forest right off El Toro Road.  The lodge is pleasing from the outside with trellised roses and flowers outside the rooms.  The rooms are good.  The lodge has a heated pool and hot tub with a small exercise room.  They offer a breakfast room and  a very nice breakfast for the guests.
Manager Response: We appreciate your headline "Hidden Treasure".  Please come back soon ^_^.

Summary Heading: It was average all the way around
Summary: As far as hotels go, this will be everything that you expect. There are no surprises. Everything is adequate. Average. The rooms are not good or bad. They are clean but not extraordinary. Service is reasonable but not excellent. The location is convenient but not too luxurious and appointments. There you go. It is solid but not great.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.

Summary: After reading the reviews decided to book 2 rooms for 2 nights.  Check in was fine, the staff did not mention the city was doing any work right in front of our rooms. That afternoon there was some work starting, went to the office they said " they knew nothing about it" but didn't offer to change our rooms. The next morning at 6:30 AM the jack hammers started and didn't stop. Went into the office and spoke with Roland the reservation manager, he was defensive and flat out said since I booked through AAA and booking.com he wouldn't offer us anything and that was that... NEVER going back.  Worst customer service I've encountered in a decade.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the construction next door at the Laguna Hills City Hall.  The city informed us that California Law prohibits construction work beginning prior to 7:00 AM, and the city scheduled its work to begin at 8:00 AM.  Regarding your request to change your room we are sorry that we could not accommodate you.  Please understand that it is the busy summer season and we are sold out. Again we apologize for the noise of our neighbor.

Summary: We had confirmation months in advance, arrived and they could not find our confirmation. I asked for a bottom floor room in advance due to knee replacement and was told they did not reserve one for us. They gave us a room around 4pm which was not cleaned. Asked for additional towels and were told the staff left. Ice machine in building did not work. Cleaning staff actually turned off our air-conditioner on a 90 degree day. Toilet area was so small, very hard for a guy 6'2"-240 lbs to fit. I would not recommend this lodge to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are sorry that your stay with us was unsatisfactory.  When a guest contacts us, and makes special requests, we record their requests in our computer and provide a confirmation number for their reservation.  Since you said that the Lodge had no record of your confirmation we suspect that you made your reservation with an online travel agent. We suggest that you always contact the hotel with special requests, even if you use an OTA, to ensure we can do everything possible to help you.    Extra towels are available 24/7  at the Front Desk.  We assure you that we are very particular and inspect each room to ensure each room is clean.  The number one compliment the hotel receives is on clean rooms. When rooms are unoccupied, our cleaning staff turns off lights and air conditioning units to conserve energy and be responsible stewards of our environment.  Our A/Cs take up to 20 minutes on a very hot day to cool a room.  We apologize for this short delay.  Thank you again for taking the time to write.

Summary: Great location, nice rooms, beautiful grounds & exceptional staff. Their focus is on customer service & customer satisfaction. Location is near the freeway, shopping & the beach.  I always choose this hotel when I go to the Pageant of the Masters.
Manager Response: Hi Linda:  Thank you for your feedback "Best Hotel and Staff".  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I stayed here on a business trip, based on a friend's recommendation. I was really surprised by how nice this hotel was. It is a very relaxed place, the pool is nice, and the location is close to a mall, restaurants, and highways. My only complaint was the breakfast, but in fairness, I'm not a fan of a continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review score of 4 out of 5!

Summary Heading: Hands down the best hotel and staff
Summary: This hotel was one of the best hotels ever!! We had to find a place to stay on a emergency with my father in the hospital right down the street. We are all the way down here from oregon and this was the best place for convenience and the fact that the staff have been VERY accommodating to us. The room was great looking onto their spectacular garden and a very quiet place to relax. The breakfast is good, but the majority of this review is to say thank you to everyone at the front desk. They were all great and I'm horrible with names but they all cared about the situation at hand for us. My father was released from the hospital and we thought he would be best in a room downstairs so they made accommodations to get us into a room downstairs but my father instead wanted to stay
Manager Response: Hello Kristy:  Thank you for your headline "Hands down the best hotel and staff".  We will share your review with our team ^_^.

Summary: Pros (not in order): nice grounds/property; clean room; good location; very fast wifi (over 20 mbps); lots of parking  Cons (not in order): goofy breakfast ticket system so they can make sure you don't get seconds and you must pay for these tickets if you have a child over 10 years old ($5 per child per day) -- this was very disappointing; hard mattress; poor lighting in room (not very bright)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your compliment on our "clean rooms, good location and very fast WIFI".  Regarding the continental breakfast. we are happy to proivde a free continental breakfast for two, children under ten are free, with each room.  Thanks for your comments about our lighting and mattresses. The right lighting and mattresses are important.  In 2015, with the help of Simmons experts, we installed new mattresses throughout the hotel.  We are continually reviewing our lighting with brightness and enviromnetal considertions in mind. Again, thank you for taking time to write to us.

Summary: We just got back from staying at this hotel.  We can not say enough good things about The Laguna Hills Lodge. Beautiful gardens surround the lodge, the staff are professional, helpful and kind, the location is close to stores, banks, gas and right down the hill is Laguna Beach. The breakfast is very good. I would recommend this place if you are looking for a place to stay in Laguna Beach that is reasonable priced. Well worth what you pay per night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your headline "A Hidden Treasure".

Summary: I've lived within the vicinity of the Laguna Hills Lodge all my life, but it wasn't until my recent stay that I have discovered this beautiful little gem in my own backyard!  The grounds are beautiful, and the rooms are updated, clean, and nicely decorated. I stayed at a 5-star hotel earlier in the week, and I must say that my stay at the Laguna Hills Lodge was much better, AND I got a free Continental breakfast here!  I'm traveling alone, and I felt completely safe.  It's right next door to Leisure World... can't get any safer and more quiet than that!!!  And although I didn't utilize the pool, it looks very nice.  I would HIGHLY recommend the Laguna Hills Lodge!!!
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review and headline "Hidden Gem!".

Summary: My husband & I had reservations at The Laguna Hills Lodge for what was supposed to be a 10 day stay because we sold our home of 43 years & needed a place to call "home" until the Escrow on our new home closed. Our 10 day stay turned into a 3 week stay because there was an unexpected delay in the closing of the Escrow on our new home.  We  had initially picked the Laguna Hills Lodge because we were impressed with the look of the Lodge & it's beautiful, well maintained grounds.  We were not disappointed.  The staff, Jim, Mila, our housekeeper, & everyone we encountered were exceptionally kind, helpful, very sympathetic to our stressful dilemma & made our 3 week stay very, very pleasant.  Our first room was a room with 2 queen beds because it was a very large room on the second
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spend one or two nights here each year to attend Pageant of the Masters.  We've never had a bad experience. It's affordable, quiet, clean, and has a friendly staff.  Newspaper and breakfast and plenty of parking is included.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!!

Summary: We just stayed one night - attended the Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach.  The hotel is just off the 5, has pleasant landscaping, continental breakfast, a nice pool, friendly staff.  We used to stay at a very nice place right in Laguna Beach, but they have doubled the price of the rooms and now require a two-night stay, so we looked for something else.  This fit the bill nicely - many restaurants nearby too.  It was a short drive to the Pageant of the Masters.  We walked to and from parking, but there is a shuttle for those who don't want to walk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the last seven years our family enjoys staying at Laguna Hills Lodge. Great price, good location, very quiet. Continental breakfast and free parking are included. The rooms are very clean having all you need: iron, hairdryer, coffee, microwave, and fridge. The staff is very friendly. We always enjoy our stay here. We would absolutely recommend this hotel to friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My elderly mother and I stayed here.  It was a last minute trip and I had difficulty finding a room that was wheelchair accessible.  I contacted this hotel directly and they were able to make arrangements for us.  I understand they had to clients around to accommodate our need.  I am forever grateful for this extra effort!  It is one that is not seen much these days!  The room was clean, the staff fabulous. I have only good things to say!  Roland and Jaime, and I can't recall the gentleman who checked us in, but they were all fabulous!  We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My sisters and I stayed here in July. The staff was great! We had a room with a small balcony on the second floor which looked onto the garden. One needs to walk up stairs to get to the second floor.The room was clean with plenty of room. The beds were quite comfortable. We never had trouble finding a parking spot..  Only two adults per room received breakfast tickets. Additional tickets could be purchased for a small fee.  The hotel is set off from the road and is quiet. It is located right near a shopping mall, several restaurants, and is just a short drive to Laguna Beach . If I am ever in the area again, I would definitely stay here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We always enjoy our stay here. The lodge was full but still very quiet. All the staff is super friendly and helpful. Breakfast is always fresh and the room kept clean. We will stay on our next trip. The rooms were always cleaned up promptly. The grounds are beautiful, so many roses and plants.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very good hotel in imoprtant area
Summary: I spent two weeks in this hotel The breakfast was fine and the room is ok  Two queen beds are ok for family of four It has everything you need  The staff was helpfull specially Mrs. Nivine Parking is free and good to be in front of your room Only remark that the breakfast suppose to include all room residents not only two adults and child under 12 Otherwise everything was perfect
Manager Response: none

Summary: I'm very satisfied with this lodge. The area was nice and safe. The room was very clean and roomy. People at the front desk were very efficient. They coordinated our group's 6 rooms close each other. Breakfast was decent which had many kind of breads, muffins  and serials and served them toasted upon request. There were also yogurt, fruits and hard boiled eggs available. They have free wifi in the entire facility, 1850 watts hair blow dryer and very soft, top of the line face tissues in the room. The lodge is a great deal for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here because it was close to family and the rate was very reasonable for Orange County. The room was clean and spacious and it fit our needs perfectly. Very convenient for everything we were doing. Just minutes to the freeway and ten minutes to Laguna Beach. The breakfast is about normal for anywhere you'd stay, coffee, juice, cereal and pastries but it was enough to get us started in the morning. Will stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms, nice pool, decent free breakfast, though you have to stand inline for toast..  My room was clean and quiet, and I was able to park right in front, since I was on the ground floor.  Also includes free wifi.  Television channels are good, thought the set was small (maybe 30").
Manager Response: none

Summary: It seems that the Lodge is one of those places that never really changes and in this case, that's a good thing.The rooms are clean and comfortable, and hotel personnel are polite, efficient, and helpful. Breakfast, which is included, offers fruit, yogurt, boiled eggs, a selection of cereals, breads, and juice and coffee. The swimming pool is surrounded by a large deck, lots of chairs and a few tables. Water is always warm and clean and there is also a small hot tub. For guests requiring assistance into the pool there is a lift. In the pool area is a small fitness area and guest laundry. Located across the street is the Laguna Hills Mall and a variety of restaurants plus Starbucks all within walking distance. A further walk (about 20 minutes from the Lodge) past the mall yields a
Manager Response: Thank you for your repeat business!!

Summary: I have stayed at the Laguna Hills Lodge about 6 times as my sister lives 2 miles away. The hotel is right across the street from the mall, bars and restaurants. 10 minutes from Laguna Beach .  The staff has always been friendly, the breakfast is ok , even more choices would be great. Beds are comfortable , room, is clean. Will be back again next year.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback about our location ^_^.

Summary: Our room was clean and spacious. Nice linens and a comfortable king size bed. Parking was close and convenient. The pool and whirlpool were clean and we had the pool to ourselves!  The staff was kind, helpful and friendly.  Breakfast was adequate, enought to hold you over until you found an interesting restaurant for lunch. Lots of places to eat close by.  This place has the best location!  It was so easy to get on and off I5.
Manager Response: Hello Debra:  Thank you for your review score of 4 out of 5.

Summary: I booked 1 room for June...needed to cancel...that, after 20 minutes, was cancelled.  Then the gal on the phone told me I had a reservation for October.  I have never booked October, she said that I had to call expedia to cancel (NEVER NEVER BOOKED IT THROUGH EXPEDIA OR ANYONE).  Called expedia they had no reservation...so they could not call to cancel for me.  I started this process on a Tuesday evening...I was on the phone with this place or expedia or hotels . com from 8:15 pm - 10 pm.  I was getting nowhere.  Asked for the manager, (Roland), was told he was not there and he would be in at 7 am.  I called this morning at 7:15 after receiving 2 emails from Roland...lady at front desk was HORRID (Nadine)...I had to actually do a 3-way call myself with them and expedia . com as
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you had difficulty with your Expedia reservation. Since your reservations was booked through Expedia any changes have to be made through them.  Our hotel, or any other hotel, does not have the right to change your contract with Expedia.  After we received the required documentation on your reservation from Expedia we made the change.  Regarding Nevine, we receive a lot of positive customer feedback on how helpful and caring she is.  She is one of the reasons the Laguna Hills Lodge has won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence in each of the last five years.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 days in June-2015.  The staff is very friendly, rooms are very nice, our kids enjoyed the pool, close to alot of good options, and a continental type breakfast was included.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Kane, many thanks for your feedback "Very nice Hotel".

Summary Heading: Wonderful location, close to freeway, shops, restaurants
Summary: We were headed to a wedding Indiana point but didn't want to pay Dana point prices. Laguna Hills Lodge, was a very nice place to stay. In the morning we were able to pop on the freeway quickly and make the 20 min drive to the wedding. Once we checked in, we were given breakfast vouchers. Which was continental, and perfect for our quick morning departure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.

Summary: For the price, this hotel can't be beat.  The rooms were clean and comfortable, the bed was comfortable, the grounds were beautifully landscaped, the pool/hot tub were nice and the breakfast was very good.  I will definitely stay here again when in the area.
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us ^_^.

Summary: From the friendly staff to the nicely appointed rooms to the refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave, to the free breakfast...well, you can't beat this charming, family-owned establishment!  Will always go back when in that area!  A true gem with free wifi and parking on top of it all!
Manager Response: "Beautiful, friendly and wonderful"...thank you for your comments ^_^.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights on the 2nd floor facing the gardens. The rooms were good in size and clean. Every morning the hotel serves breakfast - bagels,oatmeal, fruit, cereal, coffee, tea. We enjoyed a evening in the jacuzzi. The Lodge was located right off the freeway which made travel easy. Located right next to a mall and several restaurants and store. The staff is exceptionally friendly and helpful. About 15-20 minutes (scenic drive) from downtown Laguna Beach, the lodge was very reasonably priced.We would def stay here again.
Manager Response: "friendly staff", thank you for your feedback!!

Summary: I loved this hotel. Staff was friendly and the room was clean. Breakfast was more than adequate with a variety of food that should satisfy anyone's needs. The location worked out very well for us as well since we had business in both LA and San Diego areas.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: One night stay south of Los Angeles
Summary: About 50 miles south along the coast from Los Angeles LAX Airport. Perfect for an overnight stay or longer. Motel is older but has been well cared for and all facilities are well presented and lots of things updated, and room facilities great, also clean and in a safe area. Breakfast simple but good and plenty of choice. Surrounded by well tended gardens with bougainvillea growing up the walls and trained up all the trees, so very pretty. Shopping  Malls all close by and Laguna beach and rest of the sandy beaches are about a 20 drive. Would definitely stay again if passing this way in the future.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your business!

Summary: My wife and I have been traveling down to Laguna to visit with her father every week for over 10 years and have never stayed here.  This trip we were on our way down to La Jolla and decided to stop over for the night.  So I looked up the Lodge on TripAdvisor and recognized that it had gotten some decent reviews.  The price was right, it offered a continental breakfast and was just off the freeway.  Well I have to say that I was somewhat surprised.  The rooms are very clean, great shower, even though it is somewhat small.  I will admit that one has to close the bathroom door should someone want to sit on the toilet, but that is not so terrible.  The bed was very comfortable and after all, this was just a stop over.  Definitely worth the money!!!  The continental breakfast was
Manager Response: none

There's even a sign by the elevator that says there are harmful chemicals present.  Stay down the street at Ayres...ask for a discount, and it's pretty much the same price and what a difference!
Manager Response: We are sorry that your stay with us was not satisfactory.  Cleanliness is important to us so we clean common areas, including hallways, daily.  We also clean guest rooms daily, unless the guest specifies otherwise. FYI, the chemical sign is required for all hotels in California. Thanks for your comment about our wallpaper; if you could specify the room number I will be happy to check the room.  Also, concerning our Wi-Fi â€“ it is complimentary and speedy; we get very few complaints from guests.  Regarding our staff we take great care in keeping good people.  The average tenure for our team is nine years.  We have won the Trip Advisor Award of Excellence in each of the last five years.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Laguna Hills Lodge, especially the beautiful landscaping that was displayed throughout the property.  The breeze through the window and the lovely flowers and plants made for a very relaxing and pleasant stay.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: "Nice rooms", thanks so much for your feedback!

Summary Heading: "Change is in the  air, not the same as in the past!"
Summary: Our family has stayed with the Laguna Hills Lodge for about 16 years now. Our last trip during Memorial Day was different, something has changed about this hotel. For starters, the reservation was incorrect, that has never happened before. Took some time to square away. You would think as many times as I have stayed here they would know my standard request! Continuing, breakfast remains the same, nothing has changed with options. Only this trip, there were limits, especially on bottled water. Strange. Last, while checking out a customer has a legitimate complaint about blood on his sheets. No accommodation was made, in fact the front desk stated he had aggressive behavior and there were done with the discussion. This customer did not raise his voice, only stated the facts. Had I
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel and for staying in our hotel for so many years.  We really appreciate your business and trust in us.  We want to apologize to you for any inconveniences you experienced and address your concerns.     We sincerely apologize for the problem with your reservation, if you could tell us what the issue was we will be happy to look into it (ask for Nevine).    Concerning our breakfast policies, our breakfast room attendant is there to toast bread and bagels to order and hand out pastries to guests for sanitary reasons.  We have a limit on bottled water because unfortunately, there are guests who will walk out with 6 or more bottles and makes it very difficult to ensure every guest has access.  Regarding the guest complaint you are referring to, the damage to several items at the hotel by this guest was dealt with in a discreet manner and the items destroyed per health department guidelines.

Summary Heading: Peaceful gardens a perfect haven after a long day
Summary: I flew down to California to attend a conference. Numerous delays at the San Francisco airport meant I got to the hotel MUCH later than I thought I'd be. The front office staff were very warm and welcoming and made my check-in as easy as possible. When I was accidentally given the wrong type of hotel key, Charlie came back with me with the right key, carried my bag, and made sure it worked before he left. He even turned on the lights in the room for me before I entered!! That was so thoughtful. I was impressed with how clean the room was and how comfy the bed was. They respected my request for a very quiet room and put me on the second floor of the B building, which suited me perfectly. I loved being able to walk over to the Laguna Hills Mall and there were tons of places to eat
Manager Response: "Peaceful", thank you for your feedback.

Summary: For the price this is an excellent choice.  I did have an issue with my first floor room and a child jumping on and off the bed upstairs.  The hotel staff did offer to move me so I appreciated that.  The room was clean and easy walk to restaurants, etc.
Manager Response: We do have a super location just across the street from a regional mall and a short drive to Laguna Beach.  Thank you for your review!!

Summary: Perfect location, near freeway and walking distance to Laguna Hills Mall.  Building has flare of old Laguna with Bouganvillea landscaping. Clean, comfortable and pleasant staff and surroundings. I picked the motel because it was near a destination wedding that we attended.  Having a place to drive to from L.A., to rest and get ready for the wedding in Mission Viejo, and then not to have to drive back that evening was perfect!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was pleasantly surprised how comfortable and spacious our room was.  Clean.  Had everything we needed.  Would definitely recommend this lodge and would stay here again.  Check in was easy and the price was a great value.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ideal for business or pleasure, short stay or an extended visit

Manager Response: Thanks so much for your five star review.

Summary Heading: BEAUTIFAUL ROOM! NICE SETTING ADJACENT TO GARDEN! THIS HOTEL IS VERY CLEAN IN A UPSCALE AREA!

The smells from all the jasmine is wonderful, "BUT YOU HAVE TO STAY HERE TO ENJOY", WELL WORTH IT!!!!!  The complimentary breakfast is very healthy and gets your morning off to a good start!!  Across from the office is a large private pool area which is very secure for folks with children.  Enjoy your stay!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the price, I expected a no-frills & hopefully clean space. I was so pleasantly surprised!  The beautiful exterior vines let us know that some good thought went into caring for this place.  And, the staff was very helpful and friendly at check in.  The room was clean and well appointed. It had everything we needed.  Only suggestion would be that dimmer switches would be nice for the evenings & early mornings. We brought our 4 month old baby on her first trip, and this felt like the perfect spot to stay. The staff positioned us away from other guests so we didn't worry too much about her crying. They were really helpful in arranging a crib, too.   The continental breakfast was an actual, filling breakfast. They provided boiled eggs, pastries, fruit, granola, milk, yogurt,
Manager Response: none

This is a  lovely, clean hotel conveniently located within walking distance of a variety of restaurants and businesses. They also serve a nice variety of breakfast items and good coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review and thanks for your review score of 5 out of 5!

Summary: I have stayed here twice for business. The twin room is spacious and the beds are large enough. It is comfortable for two persons traveling together. The rooms are conducive to working. Staff are always smiling and friendly. Nice landscaping giving pretty ambiance for budget hotel. Close to freeway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very convenient location near major highways.  Lots of amenities including a pool, room safe, flat screen TV, reasonable price, Continental Breakfast, fridge in room, microwave, etc.  Very clean, and the maids spoke English.  Fast check in and check out.

Summary Heading: Great hotel / good price but don't forget...

The only thing I would recommend is taking your earplugs. The rooms are not sound proof: you can hear people on the parking lot and in other rooms (child crying in the middle of night, couple fighting at 6am, bathroom door slammed, conversations ... ) there is of course nothing they can do but again, to sleep well, bring your earplugs!

Noise was very minimal.   The breakfast that comes with the room is fine. Nothing spectacular, but it's nice to get a breakfast before heading out.   Staff was extremely friendly. I appreciated that very much!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us.

I would only stay here and would advise all my family and friends to do the same.

Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review!

Summary: We spent 2 weeks here.A Fantastic  place includind breakfast.The gardens are really very beautiful.Our  room was very nice.The staff are incredible very helful. Close to to shopping malls and bus routes to go everywhere. We use the bus to go the beach a few times. We will stay again

Manager Response: none

So, being in the non-smoking section was preferred this time around. I especially liked how I couldn't smell the scent of cigarettes even when out on the balcony or walking around the property. They have a designated smoking area. The complimentary breakfast is nothing to complain about, it was satisfactory for the price & location of the hotel. The marble counter top for the sink was a nice addition. Room was very well kept, my TV was HDMI ready which was prestine in playing movies/shows for my son that were saved
Manager Response: Hello Stephen:  Thanks you for your feedback "Awesome weekend getaway".

The decor was not fancy, but it was pleasant enough.  I found my room in Building C to be quiet and I never heard the fire trucks at all as some previous reviewers have noted.  My only complaint was that the room was quite warm and
Manager Response: Hi Tracey:  Thanks for your positive review and compliment about our location.  Please come back soon.

Summary: Decent pricing, maintained grounds and clean rooms. Average grab and go continental breakfast with the standard fare.   Downside is the loud location - emergency vehicles sirening off regularly. If you are on a budget, hard off hearing or a very sound sleeper, this is the place for you.

Manager Response: We appreciate your headline "Definitely a place to come back to!"
